trans-unit.source: A New Grassroots Movement By Doctors
trans-unit.target: 医生的一次新的基层运动

trans-unit.source: There’s a new movement in healthcare – and it’s growing from a surprising place. Instead of emerging from government or industry, it’s budding from the grassroots –from everyday physicians. The movement is democratizing health information and giving birth to a new landscape: Interactive HealthInteractive Health is supported by three pillars: quality, access, and care.
trans-unit.target: 在健康医护领域有一个新的运动 - 它的成长从一个惊人的地方开始。并不是从政府或行业涌现而出，它是从基层阶层开始 - 来自每一天里的医师。该运动正在使健康信息民主化，并诞生出一个新的景观：互动式健康的三大支柱：质量，获取方式和医护。

trans-unit.source: NBC Visits HealthTap
trans-unit.target: NBC访问HealthTap

trans-unit.source: NBC Bay Area takes a tour of the HealthTap office and learns about the exciting new features of HealthTap from Ron.
trans-unit.target: NBC湾区参观了HealthTap办公室，并从Ron了解了HealthTap令人兴奋的新功能。

trans-unit.source: Patient-Centric Physician Engagement Online
trans-unit.target: 以患者为中心的医师在线参与

trans-unit.source: Ron presents at ePatient Connections, the industry’s leading patient-centric communication conference. Ron shares how interactive health promotes transparency, quality, and better doctor relationships for patients.
trans-unit.target: Ron展示了ePatient连接，业界领先的以患者为中心的通信会议。Ron分享了促进互动健康中如何为患者促进透明度，质量和更好的医生关系。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the New Era of Interactive Health
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到互动健康的新时代

trans-unit.source: Interactive Health is not about "fixing" the broken healthcare system; it,s about engaging each of us in our health, empowering physicians to actively participate, and making health knowledge, supportive care, and motivation available to us, anytime and anywhere, so that we can live longer, healthier, happier lives.
trans-unit.target: 互动健康不是关于“修复”破坏的健康医护系统; 它是关于让我们每个人参与我们的健康，使医生积极参与，以及为我们随时随地提供健康知识，支持性医护和积极性，使我们能够活得更长，更健康，更幸福的生活。

trans-unit.source: The Untapped Power of Smiling (Video)
trans-unit.target: 微笑未开发的力量（视频）

trans-unit.source: A written transcript of my TED talk on the social, emotional and personal benefits of smiling, with references to some of the amazing studies that provided inspiration for the talk.
trans-unit.target: 关于微笑在社会，情感和个人利益中，我的TED演讲的书面记录，参考了一些为这次演讲提供灵感的令人惊叹的研究。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap: Personalized online health information - Robert Scoble (Video)
trans-unit.target: HealthTap:个性化的在线健康信息 - Robert Scoble（视频）

trans-unit.source: Leading American blogger and technology evangelist Robert Scoble sits down with Ron Gutman, Founder & CEO of HealthTap to talk about what HealthTap has created and the power of personalized health information from thousands of doctors, for free.
trans-unit.target: 免费提供，领先的美国博主和技术传播者Robert Scoble与HealthTap创始人兼首席执行官Ron Gutman坐下来关于HealthTap创造的内容，以及来自数千名医生的个性化健康信息的力量的交谈。

trans-unit.source: The New Health: Transforming Information into Action
trans-unit.target: 新健康：将信息转换为行动

trans-unit.source: A presentation on a new framework for personal health that helps engage people in their health using information, transforming into knowledge, and then into action.
trans-unit.target: 关于个人健康新框架的演讲，帮助通过使用信息，转化为知识，然后采取行动使人们参与到他们的健康中。

trans-unit.source: TEDx Silicon Valley — Insights into Organizing Leading Speakers (Video)
trans-unit.target: TEDx硅谷 — 组织领导演讲者的洞察力（视频）

trans-unit.source: A talk with insights and tips on how to get some amazing thought-leading speakers for your events.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何为您的活动获得一些惊人的领先思维的见解和小贴士的演讲。

trans-unit.source: It,s a New Day. Personalized
trans-unit.target: 这是新的一天。个性化

trans-unit.source: The time has arrived to bring together what we,ve learned and build the foundation for true personalization in health that will help people live in an individualized way and help you lead a healthier, happier life.
trans-unit.target: 汇集我们所学到的，并为健康的真正个性化建立基础的时代已经到来，这将帮助人们以个性化的方式生活，并帮助您的生活更健康，更幸福。

trans-unit.source: SMArt Health
trans-unit.target: SMArt健康

trans-unit.source: A look into the "Substitutable Medical Apps, reusable technologies" program at Harvard, that is working to develop a flexible Health IT environment that will be the foundation for an iPhone like app-store for medical apps, based on shared basic components. Apple like these will help consumers to understand their healthcare data, save time, achieve better outcomes, and reduce costs.
trans-unit.target: 了解哈佛大学胰腺癌的“可替代医疗应用程序，可重复使用技术”计划，它正在努力开发一个灵活的健康T环境，这将是基于iPhone像医疗应用程序的应用商店的基础的分享基本组件。像这样的Apple将帮助消费者了解他们的健康医护数据，节省时间，实现更好的结果，并降低成本。

trans-unit.source: It,s all About the People
trans-unit.target: 这都是与人们相关

trans-unit.source: The story of how TEDx Silicon Valley was born, and an insightful review of it,s first annual event. TEDx Silicon Valley was one of the first licenses given to local communities to enable TEDsters around the world to create local independent TED events and help bring to life "ideas worth spreading."
trans-unit.target: 关于TEDx硅谷诞生的故事，以及对它的深刻见解，是第一次年度盛事。TEDx硅谷是最先授予当地社区来使世界各地的TED能够创建本地独立的TED活动，并第一个授权帮助实现“值得传播的想法”。

trans-unit.source: Leading the mHealth movement
trans-unit.target: 领导mHealth运动

trans-unit.source: Jun. 22, 2012 - Ron Gutman is the CEO and founder of HealthTap, which creates mobile and Web applications with the goal of connecting individuals with medical professionals. Gutman spoke with the Washington Post’s Emi Kolawole about the power of turning doctors into health care information curators for the Web and on mobile. (Emi Kolawole/The Washington Post)"
trans-unit.target: 2012年6月22日－Ron Gutman是HealthTap的CEO和创始人，创建移动和网络应用程序，目的是将个人与医疗专业人士联系起来。Gutman与华盛顿邮报的Emi Kolawole谈到了将医生变成医疗信息管理者的网络和移动的力量。(Emi Kolawole/华盛顿邮报)"

trans-unit.source: TEDx Silicon Valley
trans-unit.target: TEDx硅谷

trans-unit.source: Curator
trans-unit.target: 管理者

trans-unit.source: TEDx Silicon Valley is an independently organized TED event, that gathers some of the world\s leading thinkers, makers, and doers to discuss social innovation. It is a day of stimulating presentations, discussions, entertainment, and art that sparks new ideas and opportunities for all involved.
trans-unit.target: Gutman与华盛顿邮报的Emi Kolawole谈到了将医生变成医疗信息管理者的网络和移动的力量。这是刺激演讲、讨论、娱乐和为所有参与者带来新的想法的和机会的艺术的一天。

trans-unit.source: Hacking 4 Health
trans-unit.target: Hacking 4 Health

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Hacking 4 Health Hackathon brings together the best and most talented engineers and developers in the Bay Area, in conjunction with the HealthTap Developers Network, who are passionate about healthcare and the new Department of Health and Human Services Open Data Initiative. The first Hacking 4 Health event was hosted in 2010 and brought together over 200 developers, engineers and talented designers.
trans-unit.target: The HealthTap Hacking 4 Health Hackathon将旧金山湾区最优秀、最有才华的工程师和开发人员联合在一起，他们热衷于健康医护和新的卫生和人力服务部开放数据计划。第一次Hacking 4 Health活动于2010年举办，汇集了200多名开发人员、工程师和才华横溢的设计师。

trans-unit.source: "Thanks Doc!" Exhibit
trans-unit.target: “谢谢医生!"附件

trans-unit.source: The "Thanks Doc!" exhibit has been created around the care given by doctors and the appreciation shown by patients. Its multimedia format includes art panels, digital "Thanks", and hand-written notes
trans-unit.target: 显示的“谢谢医生”是基于医生提供的照顾以及患者表达的谢意创造的其多媒体格式包括艺术面板、数字“谢谢”和手写笔记。

trans-unit.source: The web’s go-to repository for health info that’s actually reliable. ... over the past five months, 2,963 people have sent HealthTap thank-you notes saying that these doctor answers had saved their lives ... if someone were to ask you why healthtech is important, this is it.
trans-unit.target: 网络的go-to存储库的健康信息实际上是可靠的。…在过去五个月，2963人给HealthTap发送了感谢信，讲述这些医生的回答挽救了他们的生命…如果有人问您为什么健康技术是重要的，这就是原因。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s Q&A Service Sees 7.5M Uniques Per Month, With MDs Spending An Hour Per Session Providing 581M Answers
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的问答服务每月获得7.5M独一无二的问答，医学医生每次花费一小时时间提供581M回答。

trans-unit.source: With New Mobile Apps, Eric Schmidt-Backed HealthTap Brings The House Call Back to HealthCare
trans-unit.target: 有了新的移动应用程序，Eric Schmidt-Backed HealthTap使出诊进入健康医护

trans-unit.source: Both the personal characteristics for patient questions and the curbside consults for doctors leverage a network in ways that can bring faster relief to patients (and thereby, hopefully, reduce costs in the health care system) without risking the privacy of patients.
trans-unit.target: 利用网络的患者问题的个人特征和医生的咨询可以使患者更快地得到缓解（并且希望从而减少医疗保健系统中的成本）且不会危及患者隐私的方式。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap,s growth validates hypotheses about doctors and patients
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的成长验证了医生和患者的研究假设。

trans-unit.source: Its current network of more than 40,000 physicians vindicates CEO Ron Gutman.
trans-unit.target: 其目前超过4万医生的网络证明了首席执行官Ron Gutman的成功。

trans-unit.source: ...bring[ing] more transparency to the quality of care physicians provide.
trans-unit.target: ...使医护医师提供的质量更加透明。

trans-unit.source: 10 great mobile apps
trans-unit.target: 10款优秀的移动应用程序

trans-unit.source: A safe and secure way for consumers to get health advice from reliable sources
trans-unit.target: 消费者从可靠来源获得健康咨询的一个安全方式。

trans-unit.source: As easy as booking a flight online or comparison shopping for a new sofa.
trans-unit.target: 和在网上预定机票或购买一张新沙发一样容易。

trans-unit.source: [HealthTap] gives users a window into the apps that physicians actually find valuable.
trans-unit.target: [HealthTap]给用户一个医师实际上发现有价值的窗口来进入应用程序。

trans-unit.source: ... bring a new level of personalization in health care to the web.
trans-unit.target: ...给网络带来一个新的个性化的健康医护水平。

trans-unit.source: A powerful marketing vehicle for doctors in addition to being a more complete information portal for patients.
trans-unit.target: 为医生提供强大的营销工具，同时为患者提供更完整的信息门户。

trans-unit.source: ...finding out...what doctors think of their peers has been...near impossible, for patients — up until now.
trans-unit.target: ...发现...医生认为他们的同行已经...几乎不可能，对于患者 - 直到现在。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is unique in its ability to connect patients with such a vast network of doctors in real-time.
trans-unit.target: 有着如此庞大的实时医师网络，HealthTap在连接患者的能力上是独特的。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap,s offer to patients: pay %{creditspriceplan} and text with a medical expert in real time
trans-unit.target: HealthTap提供给患者：与医学专家实时支付%{creditspriceplan}和文本。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap...appeal[s] to doctors who are wiling to define their roles and organize their time differently.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap ...吸引愿意定义他们的角色和不同地组织他们的时间的医生。

trans-unit.source: The platform highlights the inherent power of data divorced from identity
trans-unit.target: 该平台突出了从身份中分离的数据的固有能力。

trans-unit.source: Informative for users who need advice on health issues and, potentially, great public relations for doctors in search of new patients
trans-unit.target: 为需要关于健康问题的咨询的用户提供信息，并且潜在地为医生寻找新患者提供强大的公共关系。

trans-unit.source: The power of turning doctors into health care information curators for the Web and on mobile
trans-unit.target: 将医生变成医疗信息管理者的网络和移动的力量

trans-unit.source: It,s a big difference -- the difference between web 1.0 and the new mobile health revolution.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个很大的区别 - Web 1.0和新的移动健康革命的区别。

trans-unit.source: Goodbye doctor,s appointments and waiting rooms, hello HealthTap
trans-unit.target: 告别与医生预约、候诊室等待，加入HealthTap

trans-unit.source: Mobile health startup HealthTap has acquired the health business of Avvo to build out its network of doctors and patients.
trans-unit.target: 移动健康启动HealthTap已经获得Avvo的健康业务，以建立其医生和患者网络。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Adds Micro-Transactions For Remote Doctor Chat
trans-unit.target: HealthTap为远程医生聊天添加了微交易

trans-unit.source: Doctors can build up reputation..and ultimately drive patients to their offline real-world practices
trans-unit.target: 医生可以建立声誉..并最终驱使患者到他们的线下现实世界进行诊疗

trans-unit.source: This is only the start
trans-unit.target: 这仅仅是开始

trans-unit.source: Increasingly, you may be able to access your own medical data—right from your smartphone.
trans-unit.target: 越来越多地，您可以从智能手机访问自己的医疗数据。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap ,just might make you raise both eyebrows in surprise,.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap，只可能会让您惊讶到睁大双眼。

trans-unit.source: Advice for the ill, and points for the doctors.
trans-unit.target: 对生病的建议，以及对医生的见解。

trans-unit.source: This App Will Change Everything About Healthcare
trans-unit.target: 这款应用程序将改变医疗保健的方方方面面

trans-unit.source: Startups Bring Capital, Innovation to Online Health Services
trans-unit.target: 创业为在线医疗服务带来资本、创新

trans-unit.source: It,s a health database and health-focused social network ... with the input of doctors
trans-unit.target: 它是一个健康数据库和以健康为重点的社交网络...随着医生的投入

trans-unit.source: The Ultra-Popular App That Has Convinced Doctors To Give Their Services For Free.
trans-unit.target: 已经说服医生免费提供服务的Ultra-Popular应用程序

trans-unit.source: Making health information accessible to everyone regardless of education or ability to pay.
trans-unit.target: 使所有人都能获得健康信息，无论教育程度或支付能力如何。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap may be on its (ambitious) way to being the default national rating and search destination.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap可能在其（雄心勃勃的）道路上去成为默认国家评级和搜索目的地。

trans-unit.source: What HealthTap is doing is revolutionary
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在做的是革命性的

trans-unit.source: The house call makes a comeback
trans-unit.target: 出诊重新回归了

trans-unit.source: HealthTap ,gives consumers more control over their health,
trans-unit.target: HealthTap，使消费者可以更多的控制他们的健康。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap was created ,to engage people in their health and to help them live healthier, happier lives,
trans-unit.target: HealthTap创建了使人们参与到他们的健康中并帮助他们生活得更健康更快乐。

trans-unit.source: [Increasing] its network of doctors available to answer patients, questions online, Palo Alto-based HealthTap is acquiring Q&A site Avvo Health.
trans-unit.target: [添加]其网络的医生可用于回答患者，在线问题，基于Palo Alto的HealthTap正在获取问答 问答 site Avvo Health。

trans-unit.source: The next time you have a medical question...try asking the doctors on HealthTap. It might save you 50 bucks in co-pays at the very least.
trans-unit.target: 您下次有医疗问题…尝试在HealthTap上询问医生。它可以至少在共同支付中为您节省50美元。

trans-unit.source: Could not have emerged at a better time.
trans-unit.target: 不可能出现在一个更好的时间。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap: Use Your Smartphone To Ask a Doctor How Bad That Rash Is
trans-unit.target: HealthTap:使用您的智能手机询问医生皮疹有多严重

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Brings Real Doctors Back Into Online Medical Advice
trans-unit.target: HealthTap使真实医生回到在线医疗建议

trans-unit.source: HealthTap isn,t the only service that puts real doctors on your computer screen or on your smartphone, but it,s the best we,ve seen
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不是唯一把真正的医生放在您的电脑屏幕或您的智能手机上的服务，但它是我们见到过的最好的。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Puts a Doctor On Your Smartphone, Helps You Find a Good One to See In Person
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在您的智能手机上放置一名医生，帮助您找到一个对您自己来说好的医生

trans-unit.source: Get medical information on the go
trans-unit.target: 随时随地获取医疗信息

trans-unit.source: a great social method to connect you with doctors who can offer real, sensible medical advice
trans-unit.target: 一个联系您和能提供真实、明智的医疗建议的医生的优秀的社会方法

trans-unit.source: It will likely continue to be a go-to source for people who need health advice or resources.
trans-unit.target: 它可能继续是需要健康咨询或资源的人的来源。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Debuts Paid Private Medical Consultations Via Mobile Device
trans-unit.target: HealthTap通过移动设备推出付费的私人医疗咨询

trans-unit.source: Its acquisition of Avvo Health will help it significantly expand its online medical community
trans-unit.target: 其收购Avvo Health将帮助其显著扩展其在线医疗社区

trans-unit.source: HealthTap unveils micropayment system and doctor chat
trans-unit.target: HealthTap推出微支付系统和医生聊天

trans-unit.source: Your personalized health source
trans-unit.target: 您的个性化健康来源

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is helping define the new field of "interactive health"
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在帮助定义“互动健康”这一新领域

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is ,reaching for the edge of what,s possible,
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在靠近可能到达的边缘，

trans-unit.source: A powerful communication tool in the medical industry.
trans-unit.target: 在医疗行业的一个强大的通信工具。

trans-unit.source: Having legit doctors tell you which apps you should download and use makes a lot more sense.
trans-unit.target: 有合法的医生告诉您应该下载和使用哪些应用程序更有意义。

trans-unit.source: No other service has gotten doctors so engaged in answering questions and the reason is the "gamification of health."
trans-unit.target: 没有其他服务让医生如此回答问题，原因是“gamification of health”。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is...involving physicians in the conversations and by personalizing information to each person,s individual needs.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是…在谈话中涉及医生并通过个性化信息来满足每个人的个人需求。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap distinguishes itself from other health education websites by having practicing physicians answer the consumers, questions
trans-unit.target: HealthTap通过诊疗医师回答消费者的问题来与其它健康教育网站区分开来

trans-unit.source: Trust is the cornerstone of HealthTap
trans-unit.target: 信任是HealthTap的基石

trans-unit.source: A sign that healthcare is moving to mobile
trans-unit.target: 健康医护正在转向移动的标志

trans-unit.source: HealthTap,s ,mission is to improve people,s health by helping them make better health decisions,
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的使命是通过帮助人们做出更好的健康决定来改善他们的健康，

trans-unit.source: A reliable resource when you,re looking for answers and helpful information.
trans-unit.target: 当您在寻找回答和有帮助信息时的一个可靠来源。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a brilliant example of high-tech, high-touch medicine: social technology directly connecting practitioners and patients.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是高科技，高个性化医学的一个辉煌例子：社交技术直接与从业者和患者连接。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap aims to harness the mobile revolution to bring the house calls back into vogue - albeit virtually
trans-unit.target: HealthTap旨在利用移动革命将出诊变得流行－尽管是在线的

trans-unit.source: HealthTap adds app suite, doctor consults via text
trans-unit.target: HealthTap添加了应用程序套件，医生通过文本咨询

trans-unit.source: A giant leap for healthcare
trans-unit.target: 健康医护的一个巨大飞跃

trans-unit.source: Palo-Alto-based HealthTap, the doctor question and answer service, care provider directory and referral serviceis branching out once more.
trans-unit.target: Palo-Alto-based HealthTap，医生问答服务，医护提供者目录和转诊服务的分支。

trans-unit.source: Very little, if any, of the information consumers read online comes from their own personal physicians – HealthTap aims to change that.
trans-unit.target: 就算有，消费者在线阅读的信息很少来自他们自己的个人医生－HealthTap旨在改变这一点。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap takes Q&A with your physician mobile
trans-unit.target: HealthTap用您的医师手机进行问答

trans-unit.source: In a nutshell: Patients ask questions, Physicians answer questions
trans-unit.target: 简而言之：患者询问问题，医生回答问题

trans-unit.source: Get in direct contact with an expert physician for free via a smartphone
trans-unit.target: 通过一个智能手机和专家医生直接联系

trans-unit.source: Utilizes technology to better connect patients with their physicians
trans-unit.target: 利用技术使患者与他们的医师更好的连接

trans-unit.source: I am excited ... to provide my medical expertise for free to anyone in the world who needs my medical help or advice as long as they have access to the internet. How fascinating is that?
trans-unit.target: 我很兴奋...向世界上任何需要我的医疗帮助或建议的人免费提供我的医疗专业知识，只要他们能访问互联网。这是多么有趣？

trans-unit.source: All the convenience of symptom-Googling, but with the input and expertise of actual physicians.
trans-unit.target: 有着实际医师的输入和专业知识的所有symptom-Googling的便利。

trans-unit.source: When we first heard about HealthTap, we were intrigued but thought for sure there must be a catch. But after meeting Gutman, I’m sold.
trans-unit.target: 当我们第一次听说HealthTap的时候，我们很感兴趣，但认为肯定是一个圈套。但在会见Gutman后，我购买了。

trans-unit.source: ...the First Global Mobile Health Brand
trans-unit.target: ...第一个全球移动健康品牌

trans-unit.source: [HealthTap is an app that helps you] keep your New Year's resolutions
trans-unit.target: [HealthTap是一个可以帮助您的应用程序]保持您的新年的决心

trans-unit.source: ...the quickest results, was the simplest to use. Helpful advice.
trans-unit.target: ...最快的结果，是最简单的使用。有帮助的建议。

trans-unit.source: A company that is defying the odds
trans-unit.target: 一家无惧困难的公司

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is one of the 'absolute best health apps' available today.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是目前可用的“绝对最好的健康应用程序”之一。

trans-unit.source: Have a pressing medical question? There's an app for that.
trans-unit.target: 有迫切的医学问题？这里有一个应用程序

trans-unit.source: [With HealthTap] everyone gets smarter about health care, and how to navigate the medical industry...
trans-unit.target: [有了HealthTap]每个人都对医疗保健，以及如何在医疗行业中的前进变的更聪明...

trans-unit.source: HealthTap will metamorphose from a Q&A site into a service that doctors, hospitals, or provider organizations will buy to manage their larger patient pools more efficiently.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap将从Q＆A网站转变为医生，医院或提供商组织将更有效地管理其更大的患者库的服务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap helps you 'prepare...to ask smarter questions when [you] get to the doctor's office'
trans-unit.target: HealthTap帮助您'准备...当您到医生的办公室时问一些更聪明的问题'

trans-unit.source: within a few hours you'll have a well-informed answer--no circuitous internet search required
trans-unit.target: 在几个小时内，您会有一个见多识广的回答 - 不需要迂回的互联网搜索

trans-unit.source: Jul 10
trans-unit.target: 7月10日

trans-unit.source: HealthTap gets a home: 575 High St. (July 2010)
trans-unit.target: HealthTap得到了一个家：575大街(2010年6月)

trans-unit.source: After a couple of months at HealthTap's first headquarters (Ron Gutman's white-board equipped home office), we opened our doors at 575 High Street in a Palo Alto office suite formerly occupied by the FBI. It was a suitable location for top secret development work. There, we created the new concept of Interactive Health.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap的第一个总部（Ron Gutman的白板配备的家庭办公室）工作了几个月后，我们在之前被联邦调查局占用的位于Palo Alto办公室的575大街开始了办公室。这是一个合适的位置用于绝密开发工作。在那里，我们创造了互动健康的新概念。

trans-unit.source: Sep 10
trans-unit.target: 9月10日

trans-unit.source: The first ever Hacking 4 Health (September 2010)
trans-unit.target: 第一次Hacking 4 Health（2010年9月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hosts first ever health-data specific Hackathon with support from the Department of Health and Human Services, HHS CTO and HealthTap fan Todd Park. Hundreds participated and 35 teams created 18 apps in under 24 hours.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在健康和人类服务部，HHS CTO和HealthTap fan Todd Park的支持下，首次提供健康数据特定的Hackathon。数百名参加者和35个小组在24小时之内创造了18个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Dec 10
Giving back for the holidays (December 2010)
trans-unit.target: 回馈假期（2010年12月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's holiday Diaper Drive brought families in need basic necessities, directly improving their health and well-being. Our drive bested efforts of large companies (like Cisco) and gathered 40,000 diapers for local moms, making it one of the most successful ever in Silicon Valley.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的假期Diaper Drive带来的家庭基本必需品，直接改善他们的健康和福祉。我们最努力的大公司（如思科）为当地妈妈聚集了4万份尿布，使它成为硅谷最成功的一个公司。

trans-unit.source: Private Beta Launch (December 2010)
trans-unit.target: 私人检验版发布（2010年12月）

trans-unit.source: We opened our doors to a limited audience of new moms and expecting women. After previewing technology to investors in November, we started with hand-picked users in late 2010 to immediate, positive and validating feedback.
trans-unit.target: 我们向有限的新妈妈和期待的女性开放了大门。在11月向投资者预览技术后，我们在2010年年底开始与精选的用户进行即时，积极和有效的反馈。

trans-unit.source: Jan 11
trans-unit.target: 1月11日

trans-unit.source: Planning the future (January 2011)
trans-unit.target: 计划未来（2011年1月）

trans-unit.source: Following months of intense work to release HealthTap to our Beta community, we gathered for our first annual planning retreat to set our goals for 2011. The retreat helped spark many new ideas and established a roadmap and metrics for success.
trans-unit.target: 经过数月的紧张工作发布HealthTap到我们的检验社区，我们聚集了我们的第一次年度规划休假，以制定我们2011年的目标。休假引发了许多新的想法，并建立了成功的路线图和指标。

trans-unit.source: Hello, Dr. Tappy! (January 2011)
trans-unit.target: 您好，Tappy医生！(2011年1月)

trans-unit.source: We care about care and positivity. Dr. Tappy, the smiling image of the helpful physician, was created and immediately became an integral part of the HealthTap experience. Always helpful and happy, Dr. Tappy symbolizes HealthTap's dedication to providing the best, most reliable, health information, available to everyone at all times.
trans-unit.target: 我们关心医护和积极性。Tappy医生，作为有帮助的医生的微笑形象代表，被创建并立即成为HealthTap体验的一个组成部分。Tappy医生象征着HealthTap致力于提供最好，最可靠的健康信息，随时为所有人提供帮助和快乐。

trans-unit.source: Feb 11
trans-unit.target: 2月11日

trans-unit.source: :) we're on TED! (February 2011)
trans-unit.target: :) 我们在TED!(2011年2月)

trans-unit.source: Walking healthy (February 2011)
trans-unit.target: 健康行走（2011年2月）

trans-unit.source: Cool consumer health projects come with even cooler swag! Introducing the HealthTap shoe – if you see them on someone's feet, say hi!
trans-unit.target: 冷酷消费者健康项目带有更冷酷的行囊！介绍HealthTap鞋子- 如果您看到他们在某人的脚上，说您好！

trans-unit.source: Mar 11
trans-unit.target: 3月11日

trans-unit.source: Angel funding announced (March 2011)
trans-unit.target: 宣布天使投资（2011年3月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's angels include some of the best and brightest company builders in Silicon Valley and beyond. Their backing of our shared vision enables us to create the HealthTap you see today.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的天使投资者包括一些在硅谷和其他地区最好和最聪明的公司建设者。他们支持我们的共同愿景，使我们能够创建您今天看到的HealthTap。

trans-unit.source: The First Interactive Health Symposium (March 2011)
trans-unit.target: 第一届互动健康研讨会（2011年3月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hosted the first Interactive Health Symposium right in our office, attracting physician participants from across the state. The symposium created the foundation for a robust, ongoing dialogue between HealthTap and the physician community about the innovations most needed in healthcare today.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在我们的办公室举办了第一次互动健康研讨会，吸引了来自全州的医生参与其中。该研讨会为HealthTap和医生社区之间关于当今健康医护最需要的创新的健康，持续对话奠定了基础。

trans-unit.source: Rocking Interactive Health at SXSW (March 2011)
trans-unit.target: 在SXSW摇摆互动健康（2011年3月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap led in health innovation at the South by Southwest Interactive conference. Paving the way for a strong health presence at this important gathering, we hosted an interactive health meet-up to connect innovators, as well as a major gathering for the entire SXSW health community.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap领导了南方的卫生创新西南交互会议。为在这个重要的聚会上强有力的卫生存在铺平了道路，我们主办了一个互动的卫生会议，以连接创新者，并为整个SXSW卫生界举办一个重要的聚会。

trans-unit.source: Our first expert answer (March 2011)
trans-unit.target: 我们的第一个专家回答（2011年3月）

trans-unit.source: Apr 11
trans-unit.target: 4月11日

trans-unit.source: Public Beta Launch (April 2011)
trans-unit.target: 公开检验版启用（2011年4月）

trans-unit.source: Following our Beta launch, we opened our virtual doors to the public on April 19, 2011, revealing to the world our labor of love. Press included praise in TIME and Forbes, among other national publications.
trans-unit.target: 在检验版发布后，我们于2011年4月19日向公众开放了在线入口，向世界展示了我们的爱的劳动。新闻稿包括在时代和福布斯和其它国家出版物的赞扬。

trans-unit.source: Our first member (April 2011)
trans-unit.target: 我们的第一个会员（2011年4月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's first member outside of our invited Beta group signs up for HealthTap. The immediate adoption of our service by consumers around the country soon leads to users from other countries as well.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的第一个会员在我们邀请的检验组之外注册HealthTap。全国消费者立即采用我们的服务很快也会引来来自其他国家的用户。

trans-unit.source: May 11
trans-unit.target: 5月11日

trans-unit.source: 1,000 doctors! (May 2011)
Our Medical Expert Network grew to 1,000 members within just months of its creation and weeks of its public launch. This rapid initial growth was a positive indicator of great growth to come.
trans-unit.target: 我们的医学专家网络在其创建的几个月内和几周的公开发布后添加到1000名会员。这种快速初始增长是一个显着的增长的积极迹象。

trans-unit.source: TEDx Silicon Valley (May 2011)
trans-unit.target: TEDx硅谷 (2011年5月)

trans-unit.source: Jun 11
trans-unit.target: 6月11日

trans-unit.source: First internship class (June 2011)
trans-unit.target: 第一届实习班（2011年6月）

trans-unit.source: Who better to share our first-hand experience in a growing start-up, building a world-class company, than top students from Stanford and beyond? No one...that's what we think! HealthTap's Internship program is designed to provide a memorable educational experience to students interested in health technology and product development.
trans-unit.target: 谁最好分享我们在一个成长初创企业的第一手经验，建立一个世界级的公司，而不是斯坦福大学和其他顶级学生？没有人… 这是我们所想的！HealthTap的实习计划旨在为对健康技术和产品开发感兴趣的学生提供难忘的教育体验。

trans-unit.source: Jul 11
trans-unit.target: 7月11日

trans-unit.source: We've moved! 101 University (July 2011)
trans-unit.target: 我们搬家了！101大学大街(2011年6月)

trans-unit.source: A heated battle for conference room space marked the end of our tenure at our first offices in 575 High Street. We moved on up to the former Facebook offices at an even better location – 101 University Ave., Suite 100, right across from the Cal Train station in the heart of Palo Alto.
trans-unit.target: 会议室空间的激烈争夺标志着我们在575大街的第一个办公室的使用结束。我们搬到了以前的Facebook办公室，在一个更好的位置 - 101大学大道，套房100，在Calo火车站，帕洛阿尔托的中心对面。

trans-unit.source: Gift horses (July 2011)
trans-unit.target: 礼物马(2011年6月)

trans-unit.source: Working with and learning from horses was just one of the many benefits of a day celebrating our launch with a horseback riding retreat. The event also included horseback riding and other equestrian activities in the wine country near Los Gatos.
trans-unit.target: 使用和学习马只是一个庆祝我们发布与骑马休假的一天的许多福利之一。活动还包括在洛斯加托斯附近的葡萄酒乡骑马和其他马术活动。

trans-unit.source: Sep 11
trans-unit.target: 9月11日

trans-unit.source: Mobile Launch (September 2011)
trans-unit.target: 移动端发布（2011年9月）

trans-unit.source: Oct 11
50,000 answers! (October 2011)

We reach 50,000 useful, relevant and current physician-created answers on HealthTap, all available for free. The Medical Experts on HealthTap stay busy improving the quality of online health information one answer, tip and health guide at a time.
trans-unit.target: 我们在HealthTap上提供了50,000个有用的，相关的和当前医生创建的回答，所有这些都是免费的。HealthTap的医学专家一直忙于提高在线健康信息的质量一个回答、小贴士和健康指南。

trans-unit.source: Nov 11
HealthTap Groups (November 2011)
trans-unit.target: HealthTap群组 (2011年11月)

trans-unit.source: It's not just for individual physicians anymore! Group practices, hospitals and other health organizations join HealthTap. Now, these groups can maintain a presence on HealthTap and connect with individual physicians. 500 physicians now participate in groups.
trans-unit.target: 这不再只是为个别医师！群组诊疗、医院和其他卫生组织加入HealthTap。现在，这些群组可以在HealthTap上保持存在并与个别医生联系。500名医师现在参加群组。

trans-unit.source: Dec 11
Series A (December 2011)

HealthTap is awarded $11.5M in Series A funding, from investors like the Mayfield Fund, Mohr Davidow Ventures and Eric Schmidt's Innovation Endeavors. Their backing of our shared vision enables us to continue to build the HealthTap that you see today.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap获得A轮融资1150万美元，来自梅菲尔德基金，Mohr Davidow Ventures和Eric Schmidt的创新奋进等投资者。他们支持我们的共同愿景，使我们能够继续构建您今天看到的HealthTap。

trans-unit.source: Re-retreat (December 2011)
trans-unit.target: 重新休假(2011年12月)

trans-unit.source: The team hits Carmel for the weekend on the second annual company retreat. There, we brainstormed about where to go and just how to change the world.
trans-unit.target: 该团队在第二次年度公司休假期间突然想到Carmel周末在那里，我们集体讨论了前进方向，以及如何改变世界。

trans-unit.source: Jan 12
trans-unit.target: 1月12日

trans-unit.source: 100,000 agree! (January 2012)
Feb 12
trans-unit.target: 2月12日

trans-unit.source: 10,000 doctors! (February 2012)
Mar 12
trans-unit.target: 3月12日

trans-unit.source: Our second SXSW 2012 Interactive Conference (March 2012)
trans-unit.target: 我们的第二届SXSW 2012互动会议（2012年3月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hosts the hottest Interactive Health gathering at SXSW, with more than 2,000 people on the wait list. Participants enjoyed party perks like big wheel racing and a photo booth, while simultaneously driving the mobile health movement forward.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在SXSW举办最热门的互动健康聚会，有超过2,000人在等待名单上。参加者喜欢派对福利，如大轮赛车和照片摊，同时推动移动健康运动向前进。

trans-unit.source: Super Happy Developer Block Party (March 2012)
trans-unit.target: 超级快乐开发者团体党（2012年3月）

trans-unit.source: June 12
trans-unit.target: 6月12日

trans-unit.source: Fourth Internship Class (June 2012)
trans-unit.target: 第四届实习班（2012年6月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's fourth internship class brought together a diverse array of students from Stanford, Berkley, USC, and UCLA.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的第四届实习班汇集了来自斯坦福大学、伯克利大学、南加州大学和加州大学洛杉矶分校的不同类型的学生。

trans-unit.source: 12,000 doctors! (June 2012)
Our Medical Expert Network continued its remarkable growth, reaching 12,000 U.S.-licensed doctors in June 2012.
trans-unit.target: 我们的医学专家网络继续显着增长，2012年6月达到12,000名拥有美国执业执照的医生。

trans-unit.source: July 12
trans-unit.target: 7月12日

trans-unit.source: Launch of the New HealthTap (July 2012)
trans-unit.target: 发布新的HealthTap（2012年7月）

trans-unit.source: The New HealthTap launched as the first-ever mobile health platform, available for everyone (iPhone, iPad, Android and Web). New features include HIPAA-secure private conversations, transparent doctor-to-doctor ratings, an interactive directory of over one million doctors, in-person appointments, and a personal health timeline. Press included positive praise from Washington Post, Bloomberg, Reuters, Forbes and Mashable, as well as TechCrunch and GigaOm among many other well known publications.
trans-unit.target: 新的HealthTap作为第一个移动健康平台推出，适用于所有人（iPhone，iPad，安卓和Web）。新功能包括HIPAA安全私人对话，透明的医生对医生评级，超过一百万医生的互动目录，个人预约和个人健康时间表。新闻稿包括来自华盛顿邮报，彭博，路透社，福布斯和Mashable，以及TechCrunch和GigaOm在许多其他知名出版物的积极赞扬。

trans-unit.source: Nov 12
DocScore and Top Doctors Competition (November 2012)
trans-unit.target: 医者评分和顶级医生竞赛（2012年11月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s innovative DocScore is an objective numeric rating (like a FICO score) for doctors, taking into account public information (such as years in practice, medical education, awards, and peer-reviewed publications) as well as interactions on HealthTap (including peer-endorsements and agrees). HealthTap’s Top Doctor Competition lets patients and doctors vote for the clinicians they think are the top ones in each field. Each doctor’s HealthTap profile displays the number of votes received from patients and other doctors.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap医者评分的创新是医生的客观数字评级（如FICO评分），考虑到公共信息（如实践中的年份，医学教育，奖项和同行评审的出版物）以及HealthTap上的互动（包括同行评议） 支持和同意。HealthTap的顶级医生竞赛允许患者和医生投票给他们认为在每个领域的最顶级的临床医生。每位医生的HealthTap个人资料显示从患者和其他医生获得的投票数。

trans-unit.source: DOConnect (November 2012)
trans-unit.target: DOConnect (2012年11月)

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s DOConnect is an interactive map showing the referral network of doctors and doctors who treat the same patients at the same time. Over 30 million connections are visible via HealthTap, and each doctor’s connections are visible directly from a doctor’s HealthTap profile page. DOConnect makes it quick and easy to see which doctors are most often referred to by other trusted doctors and which doctors treat the same patients at the same time, providing immediate insights into how physicians share values, methods, and approaches to care.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的DOConnect是一个交互式地图，显示医生和医生的转诊网络，同时对同一患者进行治疗。这会显示出医生的诊断网和在同一时间诊断同一个患者的医生。通过HealthTap可以看到超过3000万个连接，每个医生的连接都可以从医生的HealthTap个人资料页面直接看到。DOConnect使其快速和容易地看到哪些医生最经常被其他受信任的医生提及，以及医生同时治疗相同的患者，提供对医生如何分享价值观，方法和治疗方法的直接见解。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Acquires Avvo Health and Grows Directory to 1.2 Million Doctors (November 2012)
trans-unit.target: HealthTap收购Avvo健康和增长目录到120万医生（2012年11月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s first acquisition, health Q&A and directory service Avvo Health, expanded HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network to over 40,000 doctors in 128 specialties, and broadened local coverage across all 50 states. At the same time, HealthTap announced the expansion of its directory coverage to include 1.2 million U.S.-licensed doctors, with dynamic listings including education, subject matter expertise, specialties and more.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap首次收购，健康问答和目录服务Avvo Health将HealthTap的医学专家网络扩展到了超过40,000名医生，共有128个专科，并扩展了所有50个州的本地覆盖面。同时，HealthTap宣布扩大其目录覆盖范围，包括120万拥有美国执业执照医生，包括教育，话题专长，专科等。

trans-unit.source: Disrupting Healthcare for the better (November 2012)
trans-unit.target: 打破为更好的健康医护（2012年11月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap CEO Ron Gutman was invited to present on CNBC’s “The Disrupters,” a national news series highlighting innovative companies and individuals changing the status quo.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap首席执行官Ron Gutman被邀请参加CNBC的“破坏者”，一个全国新闻系列，突出了创新公司和个人改变现状。

trans-unit.source: Dec 12
Health Resolutions + Health Journey (December 2012)
trans-unit.target: 健康决议+健康之旅(2012年12月)

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's new interface makes it easy and intuitive to browse health information, helping users support their health journeys. New features include health resolutions (with doctor videos and tips for meeting health goals), and a body browser, an easy way to explore symptoms and related conditions and treatments, all by clicking on an image of the human body.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的新界面使您可以轻松，直观地浏览健康信息，帮助用户支持他们的健康之旅。新功能包括健康解决方案（医生视频和达到健康目标的小贴士）和身体浏览器，一种简单的方法来探索症状和相关的条件和治疗，所有通过点击人体的图像。

trans-unit.source: Jan 13
trans-unit.target: 1月13日

trans-unit.source: CNN (January 2013)
trans-unit.target: CNN(2013年1月)

trans-unit.source: CNN highlighted HealthTap as one of the very best apps to help you keep your New Year's health resolutions. The video feature aired on CNN during prime time, and was simulcast on 150 stations across the country.
trans-unit.target: CNN强调HealthTap作为最好的应用程序之一，以帮助您保持您的新年的健康决议。在黄金时段，CNN播出的视频功能，并在全国150个电台同时播出。

trans-unit.source: Winter Retreat (January 2013)
trans-unit.target: 冬季休假（2013年1月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap team members gathered in northern California for our semi-annual retreat, where we hosted a select group of doctors from diverse practices across the country who participated in helping us envision the next generation of HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap团队会员聚集在加利福尼亚北部进行半年度休假，我们在全国各地举办了一系列来自不同诊疗的医生，帮助我们设想下一代HealthTap。

trans-unit.source: Feb 13
trans-unit.target: 2月13日

trans-unit.source: TipTaps (February 2013)
trans-unit.target: 推心小贴士（2013年2月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap brings doctor-created tips straight to your mobile device or computer. To keep healthy living top of mind, users can subscribe to health topics of interest, and receive daily doctor-created tips, suggestions, or bits of advice delivered via email or by SMS push notifications to mobile devices. Users can also discover and browse TipTaps on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap将医生创建的小贴士直接推送到您的移动设备或计算机。为了保持放心健康的生活，用户可以订购感兴趣的健康话题，并且接收通过电子邮件或短信在移动设备上接收每天医生创建的小贴士、建议或一点忠告的推送通知。用户还可以在HealthTap上发现和浏览推心小贴士。

trans-unit.source: Global mobile featuring! (February 2013)
trans-unit.target: 全球移动特色！2013年2月

trans-unit.source: HealthTap, featured globally on Google Play’s Android app market, quickly becomes one of the top 10 most popular health apps worldwide.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap，在Google Play安卓应用程序市场推出，迅速成为全球前十大最受欢迎的健康应用程序之一。

trans-unit.source: Mar 13
trans-unit.target: 3月13日

trans-unit.source: HealthTap personalized! (March 2013)
trans-unit.target: HealthTap个性化！(2013年3月)

trans-unit.source: March 2013 also marked the availability of increased personalization to millions on the HealthTap platform. Now when users ask questions, they are prompted with the option to add additional personal information related to the question they are asking. This provides doctors with relevant context and improves the specificity of the answers users receive.
trans-unit.target: 2013年3月，还在HealthTap平台上标记了数百万用户的个性化增长。现在，当用户提出问题时，系统会小贴士他们添加与他们要求的问题相关的其他个人信息的选项。这向医生提供相关来龙去脉并且改进用户接收的回答的专一性。

trans-unit.source: TODAY Show (March 2013)
trans-unit.target: 今日秀(2013年3月)

trans-unit.source: In March 2013, HealthTap was featured on the TODAY Show as one of the 4 best health apps among the 40,000 health applications available for consumers. Watch the video here!
trans-unit.target: 2013年3月，HealthTap在今日秀上作为消费者提供的4万个健康应用程序中的4个最好的健康应用程序之一。观看视频这里!

trans-unit.source: Curbside Consults (March 2013)
trans-unit.target: 路边问答（2013年3月）

trans-unit.source: This month HealthTap unveiled its new initiative called “Curbside Content.” The program allows a HealthTap physician to use the platform’s network to broadcast a question to other physicians.
trans-unit.target: 本月，HealthTap公布了名为“路边内容”的新计划。该程序允许HealthTap医生使用平台的网络向其他医生广播问题。

trans-unit.source: Apr 13
trans-unit.target: 4月13日

trans-unit.source: The Full Spectrum release! (April 2013)
trans-unit.target: 全局发布！(2013年4月)

trans-unit.source: The full spectrum of doctor knowledge is made available via HealthTap. Doctor-to-doctor Q&A, concise doctor updates, and full-length doctor posts are released.
trans-unit.target: 医生知识的所有范围通过HealthTap提供。医生与医生的问答，简明的医生更新和全职医生的帖子。

trans-unit.source: Growth! (April 2013)
HealthTap reaches 7.5 million monthly unique visitors, 2 million app downloads, and over 0.5 billion doctor answers served.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap每月独立访问人数达750万，应用下载量为2百万，医生回答超过5亿。

trans-unit.source: May 13
trans-unit.target: 5月13日

trans-unit.source: AppRX (May 2013)
trans-unit.target: App医生评测（2013年5月）

trans-unit.source: In May 2013, HealthTap launched ‘AppRX’ so our users can get app recommendations from real doctors. With AppRX, we make it fast and easy to find health and wellness apps by creating intuitive, user-friendly categories, and adding doctor recommendations and written reviews to apps.
trans-unit.target: 在2013年5月，HealthTap推出了“App医生评测”，因此我们的用户可以从真正的医生获得应用程序的建议。使用App医生评测，我们通过创建直观，用户友好的类别，并为应用程序添加医生建议和书面评论，使其快速，轻松地找到健康与保健应用程序。

trans-unit.source: July 13
trans-unit.target: 7月13日

trans-unit.source: Health2020 Event (July 2013)

In the summer of 2013, HealthTap had the pleasure of hosting a group of leading engineers, designers, product managers, data experts, and innovators in diverse industries to envision and design the “future of health” in the year 2020. It was a successful day of thought-provoking debate and ideas of how to disrupt the health space.
trans-unit.target: 在2013年夏天，HealthTap很荣幸地主办了一个领先的工程师，设计师，产品经理，数据专家和不同行业的创新者，以构想和设计2020年的“健康未来”。这是成功的一天，发人深省的辩论和如何破坏健康空间的想法。

trans-unit.source: First doctor conference with Top Doctors (July 2013)
trans-unit.target: 与顶级医生的第一次医生会议（2013年7月）

trans-unit.source: July 2013 marked the first ever HealthTap Doctors’ Conference. Doctors from around the country from multiple specialities, practice sizes, and various stages in their career offered insights and feedback on the past, present and future of HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 2013年7月是史上第一次HealthTap医生会议。来自多个专科，诊疗大小和职业生涯的各个阶段的全国各地的医生提供了对HealthTap的过去，现在和未来的见解和反馈。

trans-unit.source: Oct 13
10,000 lives saved (Oct 2013)

In October 2013, HealthTap received the 10,000th user note telling us that information on HealthTap saved a life. By making digital health personal, we're working hard to help many more thousands all over the world live longer, healthier lives.
trans-unit.target: 在2013年十月，HealthTap收到了第10,000条用户通知告诉我们在HealthTap上挽救一条生命。通过使电子健康私人化，我们致力于帮助全世界更多人活得更长久更健康。

trans-unit.source: 1 billion answers served (Oct 2013)
trans-unit.target: 提供了十亿条回答（2013.10）

trans-unit.source: Since launching our mobile health platform in July 2012, we've served over 1 billion answers in response to users' health questions, and have created and organized the world's most extensive knowledge base of user questions matched to answers from trusted doctors.
trans-unit.target: 自从我们在2012年七月发布了移动健康平台，我们向用户的健康问题提供了超过十亿条回答，我们也创建了世界上最广泛的将用户问题和受信任的医生的回答相匹配的知识库。

trans-unit.source: Nov 13
Talk To Docs (Nov 2013)
trans-unit.target: Talk To Docs (2013年11月)

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Labs launches it’s first app – Talk To Docs. Just speak a question, the app reads back answers from top doctors. Talk To Docs uses advanced natural language processing, artificial intelligence and advanced voice recognition technology to recognize the health topics you’re interested in, and delivers the most appropriate answer for you.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap实验室创建了它第一个软件——Talk To Docs。仅仅说出一个问题，这款应用程序就会从顶级医生那里获取回答。Talk To Docs使用先进的自然语言处理、人工智能和先进的声音识别技术来识别您感兴趣的话题并向您推送最适合的回答。

trans-unit.source: Continued National Press (Nov 2013)
trans-unit.target: 持续的全国新闻（2013年11月）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap continued to be featured in national press, with articles in Inc. Magazine (November 2013) (here) and Forbes (November 2013) (here), among many others.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap继续在国家新闻界发表，其中包括华纳出版社（2013年11月） (here) 和福布斯（2013年11月） (here), 许多其他。

trans-unit.source: Keith Rabois
trans-unit.target: Keith Rabois

trans-unit.source: When revolutionary startups need bold advice, active coaching, and honest feedback, they go to Keith Rabois. Keith began his career as a senior executive at PayPal, subsequently serving on the leadership teams at LinkedIn and at Square, as the company's Chief Operating Officer. As a Board member, he guided Yelp! and Xoom from their first year of inception through successful IPOs, while simultaneously investing in other like-minded entrepreneurs. Keith is an early investor in YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite and other successful Silicon Valley startups.
trans-unit.target: 当革命性的初创公司需要大胆的建议、有效的训练和诚恳的反馈时，他们向Keith Rabois求助。Keith最初是贝宝的一名高级主管，接着在领英为领导团队供职，又在Square担任公司首席运营官。作为一名董事会会员，他从第一年开始带领Yelp!和Xoom通过成功的首次公开募股，同时也向其他志同道合的企业投资。Keith是YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite 和其他硅谷成功初创公司的早期投资人。

trans-unit.source: Bill Ericson
trans-unit.target: Bill Ericson

trans-unit.source:
Bill Ericson has been working with startups his entire career as a founder, key advisor, counselor and investor. He believes that entrepreneurship drives the American economy, and that the best venture capitalists see their role as supporting and challenging entrepreneurs to their best performance. Bill’s current investment focus is the big data revolution that is driving the commercial, consumer media and health care worlds. Bill serves on the Board of Northwestern University School of Law and received his B.S.F.S. from Georgetown University of Foreign Service and J.D. from Northwestern University School of Law.

%{open_tag}MDV%{close_tag} has over $1.4 billion under management and partners with entrepreneurs to architect and build successful companies. MDV invests in businesses that address significant challenges and opportunities, including personalizing medicine. MDV-funded companies that have gone public or been acquired include: Agile; Broadbase (KANA); Brocade; Epigram (BRCM); FormFactor (FORM); Freshwater Software (MERQ); Ipsilon Networks (NOK); Kalpana (CSCO); Numerical Technologies (SNPS); ONI Systems (CIEN); Pivotal Technologies (BRCM); Rambus; Vantive; Vitesse; and Zip2 (AltaVista).
trans-unit.target:
Bill Ericson终生在初创公司中担任创始人、关键顾问、咨询师和投资人。他坚信企业家精神驱动了美国经济，最好的风险资本家将自身角色定位在支持和鼓励企业家做到最好。Bill当前的投资焦点在驱动商业、消费者媒介和医疗世界的大数据革命。Bill在西北大学法学系董事会任职，他从乔治城大学外事部获得了学士学位并于西北大学法学系获得了博士学位。

%{open_tag}MDV%{close_tag} 管理超过14亿美元，与企业家合作，共同建筑和建立成功的公司。MDV投资那些带来包括个性化药物在内的重大挑战和机遇的商业。MDV投资的已经公开或获得成果的企业包括：Agile; Broadbase (KANA); Brocade; Epigram (BRCM); FormFactor (FORM); Freshwater Software (MERQ); Ipsilon Networks (NOK); Kalpana (CSCO); Numerical Technologies (SNPS); ONI Systems (CIEN); Pivotal Technologies (BRCM); Rambus; Vantive; Vitesse; and Zip2 (AltaVista).

trans-unit.source: Tim Chang
trans-unit.target: Tim Chang

trans-unit.source:
Tim Chang is the Managing Director of the %{open_tag}Mayfield Fund%{close_tag}. Tim is a proven venture investor and experienced global executive. He was named on the 2011 Forbes Midas List of Top 100 Dealmakers and was featured by The Deal as one of five emerging VCs to watch. Tim invests in the mobile, gaming, digital media and enterprise applications sectors. Prior to joining Mayfield Fund, Tim spent five years as a Partner at Norwest Venture Partners, and prior to Norwest, Tim worked for Gabriel Venture Partners, and as part of the founding team of CTR Ventures. Currently, Tim serves on the advisory boards of the Verizon 4G Venture Forum, Gamestop Corporation, Yoshimoto Kogyo, the Silicon Valley Telecom Council, MIT/Stanford VLAB, CasualConnect, and GamesBeat/MobileBeat. Tim holds an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business, and an M.S. and B.S. from the University of Michigan.

The %{open_tag}Mayfield Fund%{close_tag} has over $2.7 billion under management, and has a 41-year history of investing in relationships with entrepreneurs, institutions and our community to transform bold ideas into industry-leading companies. Mayfield's mission is to create global impact and investor value, by partnering with visionary entrepreneurs who are addressing disruptive markets. Mayfield has invested in more than 500 companies, resulting in over 100 IPOs and more than 100 mergers and acquisitions. Select notable investments include 3Com, Citrix, Compaq, and Genentech.
trans-unit.target:
Tim Chang是%{open_tag}梅菲尔德基金%{close_tag}的董事总经理。Tim是一名经过证明的风险投资家和资深的全球总经理。他被2011年福布斯迈达斯列表提名为最好的100位交易人之一并被认为是新出现的五位值得关注的风险投资家之一。Tim在移动、游戏、电子媒介和企业申请领域进行投资。在加入梅菲尔德基金之前，Tim在西北风险投资公司担任了五年合伙人，在进入西北风险投资公司之前，他为Gabriel Venture Partners工作并担任CTR Ventures创始团队的会员。目前，Tim担任Verizon的4G投资论坛, GameStop公司, 吉本兴业株式会社, 硅谷电信委员会, 麻省理工学院/斯坦福VLAB, CasualConnect, and GamesBeat/MobileBeat的顾问团的一员。Tim从斯坦福大学商学院拿到了管理硕士学位并从密歇根大学拿到学士和硕士学位。

The %{open_tag}梅菲尔德基金%{close_tag}管理超过27亿美元，并有41年的投资与企业家，机构和社区的关系的历史，将大胆的想法转变为业内领先的公司。梅菲尔德的使命是通过和致力于改善受扰乱的市场的有远见的企业家的协作来创造全球影响力和投资价值。梅菲尔德投资了超过500家企业，其中有超过100家进行首次公开募股，另有超过100起并购。选择包括3Com, 思杰公司, 康柏和基因泰克在内的值得注意的投资。

trans-unit.source: Eric Schmidt
trans-unit.target: Eric Schmidt

trans-unit.source: Eric Schmidt is Executive Chairman of Google and the founder of %{open_tag}Innovation Endeavors%{close_tag}. Since joining Google in 2001, he has helped grow it from a Silicon Valley startup to a global leader in technology. From 2001 to 2011, Eric served as Google's Chief Executive Officer, overseeing its technical and business strategy. Eric joined Google from Novell, where he served as Chief Executive Officer from April 1997 to July 2001 and as Chairman. Prior to Novel, he held various positions at Sun Microsystems, including serving as Chief Technology Officer and as Corporate Executive Officer. Before joining Sun in 1983, Eric served as a Member of the Research staff at the Computer Science Lab of Xerox Palo Alto Research Center (PARC), and held positions at Bell Laboratories and ZiLOG. Eric has also served as the Chairman of the New America Foundation, Google, Novel, and InSight Venture Partners, and as a Director of Google, Apple, and Seibel Systems. Eric is also a member of the President's Council of Advisors on Science and Technology and the Prime Minister's Advisory Council in the U.K. Eric has Bachelor of Science and M.S. degrees in Electrical Engineering from Princeton University, and a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of California-Berkeley.
trans-unit.target: Eric Schmidt是Google的执行主席，也是%{open_tag}Innovation Endeavors%{close_tag}的创始人。自从2001年加入谷歌，他帮助谷歌从一个硅谷初创公司成长为一个世界性科技领军企业。从2001到2011年，Eric担任谷歌的首席执行官，监管它的技术和商业战略。Eric从Novell加入谷歌，之前他在1997年4月到2001年7月间担任首席执行官和主席。在进入Novel之前，他在微系统担任多职，包括首席技术官和首席执行官。Eric也担任新美国基金会, 谷歌, Novel, 和InSight Venture Partners主席和谷歌, 苹果,和塞贝尔系统的总监。Eric也担任新美国基金会, 谷歌, Novel, 和InSight Venture Partners主席和谷歌, 苹果,和塞贝尔系统的总监。Eric也是总统科学技术顾问委员会和英国总理咨询委员会的会员。他从普林斯顿大学获得科学学士学位，加利福尼亚大学大学伯克利分校获得电气工程硕士学位以及计算机科学博士学位。

trans-unit.source: Vinod Khosla
trans-unit.target: Vinod Khosla

trans-unit.source: Vinod Khosla is the founder of Khosla Ventures, a leading venture capital firm focusing on large problems amenable to technological solutions, with an particular interest in mobile technologies. Khosla Ventures pursues both for-profit and for social impact investments. Prior to founding Khosla Ventures, he was the co-founder and former CEO of Sun Microsystems, where he pioneered open systems, and was a general partner at venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers, where he continues to serve as a Partner Emeritus. Vinod has a passion for nascent technologies that can have a beneficial effect and economic impact on society, and as an investor he seeks to make a difference by helping to build companies that drive positive change by leveraging innovation.
trans-unit.target: Vinod Khosla是科斯拉风险投资公司的创始人，这是一家带着对移动科技特殊兴趣的关注科技方法对解决大问题的效益的领军风险资本公司。Khosla Ventures同时追求经济效益和社会影响投资。在成立科斯拉风险投资公司之前，他是Sun微系统公司的联合创始人以及前任首席执行官，在那里他初创开放式系统。他也是投资公司Kleiner帕金斯Caufield & Byers风险资本公司的一个主要合伙人，他继续在那里担任Partner Emeritus。Vinod对于拥有很好的社会和经济效益的初生科技有浓厚兴趣，作为投资人，他寻求运用创新杠杆来帮助带来积极改变的企业有所创新。

trans-unit.source: Mark Leslie
trans-unit.target: Mark Leslie

trans-unit.source: Mark Leslie is the managing director of Leslie Ventures and a professor at the Stanford Graduate School of Business. Previously, Mark was the founding Chairman and CEO of Veritas Software. His board seats have included VMWare, Avaya, and NetApp, and he is the Chairman of the New York University Science Advisory Board.
trans-unit.target: Mark Leslie是Leslie Ventures的总经理，也是斯坦福商学院的研究生导师。在这之前，Mark是维尔软件的创始主席和首席执行官。他的董事会席位涵盖了VMware和NetApp，Avaya公司，他也是纽约大学科学顾问委员会的主席。

trans-unit.source: Esther Dyson
trans-unit.target: Esther Dyson

trans-unit.source: Esther Dyson (EDventure) is one of the world's most renowned and accomplished angel investors and advisors. Her board seats include: 23andMe, Boxbe, Eventful, Evernote, Meetup, NewspaperDirect, and Yandex (Russia). Her investments (and acquiring companies) include: Flickr and Del.icio.us (Yahoo!), BrightMail (Symantec), Orbitz (Cendant), Medstory and Powerset (Microsoft), Plazes (Nokia), and Tacit (Oracle).
trans-unit.target: 埃丝特•戴森（edventure）是世界上最负盛名和最有成果的天使投资人和顾问之一。她的董事会席位包括：23andMe, Boxbe, Eventful, Evernote, Meetup, NewspaperDirect, 和Yandex (俄罗斯)。她的投资（和收购公司）包括：Flickr and Del.icio.us (雅虎), BrightMail (赛门铁克), Orbitz (圣达特), Medstory and Powerset (微软), Plazes (诺基亚), and Tacit (甲骨文)。

trans-unit.source: Aaron Patzer
trans-unit.target: Aaron Patzer

trans-unit.source: Aaron Patzer is the Founder and CEO of Mint.com (acquired by Inuit) and a Vice President and General Manager of Inuit's Personal Finance group. Prior to founding Mint, Aaron was an Architect and Technical Lead for Nascentric, worked for IBM, and founded two web development and online marketing companies.
trans-unit.target: Aaron Patzer是Mint.com的创始人和首席执行官，他也是因纽特人的个人理财组织的副总统和总经理。在创建Mint之前，Aaron是Nascentric的一名建筑科技领导，为IBM工作，并成立了两家网络发展和在线营销公司。

trans-unit.source: Gil Penchina
trans-unit.target: Gil Penchina

trans-unit.source: Gil Penchina was previously the CEO of web hosting service Wikia (co-founded by Wikipedia's Jimmy Wales). Previously, Gil served as eBay's Vice President and General Manager (International) and Vice President of International Expansion. Gil's investments include: PayPal, Linkedin, Become.com, Evite, and Flock.
trans-unit.target: Gil Penchina是网页寄存服务商Wikia的前任首席执行官。之前，Gil担任易趣网的副主席和国际总经理以及国际扩张部的副主席。Gil的投资包括：贝宝, 领英, Become.com, Evite, 和Flock。

trans-unit.source: William C. Kessinger
trans-unit.target: William C. Kessinger

trans-unit.source: Will is the co-founder and a primary investor of Vformation, LLC, and the Chief Investment Officer of Parthenon Capital, a $1.8 billion middle-market private equity firm. Previously, Will was a Partner of GTCR Golder Rauner, a $4 billion private equity firm.
trans-unit.target: Will是Vformation有限责任公司的联合创始人以及初期投资人，他也是帕特农神庙资本的首席投资官，这是一家拥有18亿资金的中间市场私募股权公司。之前，Will是GTCR Golder Rauner的合伙人，这是一家拥有40亿资金的私募股权公司。

trans-unit.source: David Whorton
trans-unit.target: David Whorton

trans-unit.source: Dave is the founder and Managing Director of Tugboat Ventures. Dave has also served as an Associate Partner of Kleiner Perkins, a Managing Director of TPG Ventures, and as a co-founding board member of Newschools Venture Fund. Dave was also the CEO and on the board of Good Technology (acquired by Motorola) and co-founded Drugstore.com.
trans-unit.target: Dave是拖轮公司的创始人和总经理。Dave也担任过凯鹏华盈的副合伙人，TPG投资的总经理以及NewSchools风险投资基金的联合创始会会员。Dave也是Good Technology的首席执行官和董事会的一员，他也联合创办了Drugstore.com。

trans-unit.source: Sonja Perkins
trans-unit.target: Sonja Perkins

trans-unit.source: Sonja Perkins is the Managing Director of Menlo Ventures, where she focuses on Internet, communications and software. Her investments and board seats include: Socialcast (VMware), Acme Packet (APKT), AssureNet Pathways (Symantic), Eloquent (ELO1), F5 Networks (FFIV), Solidcore (McAfee), and Vermeer Technologies (Microsoft). She serves as a director of the Western Association of Venture Capitalists (WAVC).
trans-unit.target: Sonja Perkins是门罗风投的总经理，她关注互联网、通讯和软件。她的投资和董事会席位包括：Socialcast (VMware), Acme Packet (APKT), AssureNet Pathways (赛门铁克), Eloquent (ELO1), F5 Networks (FFIV), Solidcore (迈克菲), 和Vermeer Technologies (微软)。她在西方风险资本家协会担任总监。

trans-unit.source: Joe Lonsdale
trans-unit.target: Joe Lonsdale

trans-unit.source: Joe is a co-founder (with Peter Thiel) of Palantir Technologies, which develops mission-critical analysis systems used by government and financial organizations around the world. Joe is also the CEO of Addepar, a leading private wealth management technology company, and is the President of early-stage venture investing firm Anduin.
trans-unit.target: Joe是帕兰提尔技术公司的一名联合创始人，她开发的任务关键性分析系统被全世界的政府和金融组织采纳。Joe也是Addepar的首席执行官，这是一家私人财富管理的科技型领导企业，她也是早期风险投资公司Anduin的总裁。

trans-unit.source: Andrew K. Boszhardt Jr
trans-unit.target: Andrew K. Boszhardt Jr

trans-unit.source: Andy is the Founder, President, and Managing Partner at Great Oaks Capital Management. Previously, he was a Managing Director at Neuberger-Bermanhas. He also served as the CEO of Oscar Capital Management, and was a Vice President at Goldman Sachs. Andrew has also served as a Director at Knowledge Mechanics Group, and XBOX Technologies.
trans-unit.target: Andy是大橡树资本管理公司的总裁、创始人和总经理。之前，他是Neuberger-Bermanhas的总经理。他也是奥斯卡资本管理的首席执行官并担任过高盛集团的副总裁。他也在知识力学组和Xbox技术担任总监。

trans-unit.source: Karl A. Jacob
trans-unit.target: Karl A. Jacob

trans-unit.source: Dr. Bernardo A. Huberman
trans-unit.target: Bernardo A. Huberman博士

trans-unit.source: Bernardo directs Hewlett-Packard's Social Computing Lab, is a Senior HP Fellow, and serves on the faculty of Stanford University. Bernardo's work focuses on enhancing privacy and trust in e-commerce, discovering and aggregating information in distributed systems, and understanding large network information dynamics. He is a Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science.
trans-unit.target: Bernardo领导惠普的社交计算实验室，是一名惠普研究员，他也在斯坦福大学任教。Bernardo的工作聚焦加强电子商务中的私密性和信任，在分布式系统中发现和聚集信息并理解巨大的网络信息动态。他是美国科学促进会的研究员.。

trans-unit.source: Mari Baker
trans-unit.target: Mari Baker

trans-unit.source: Mari is the CEO of online and social gaming company PlayFirst, and a Trustee Emeritus at Stanford University. Previously, Mari was the CEO of Navigenics, President of BabyCenter, a Senior Vice President of Intuit, and an Executive in Residence at Kleiner Perkins. Her board seats have included Navigenics and Cozi Group.
trans-unit.target: Mari是在线社交游戏公司PlayFirst的首席执行官，同时也是一名在斯坦福大学的名誉董事。之前，Mari是Navigenics的首席执行官，BabyCenter总裁，Intuit的高级副总裁以及凯鹏华盈的行政官。她的董事会席位涵盖了Navigenics和科济组。

trans-unit.source: Noam Ziv
trans-unit.target: Noam Ziv

trans-unit.source: Noam is a vice president of engineering in the Corporate R&D division of Qualcomm, where he works with Qualcomm's Health and Life Sciences group on developing technologies and strategies to successfully engage Qualcomm in healthcare. He also serves as a technical advisor on Qualcomm programs including peer-to-peer technologies. Noam has been granted more than 20 patents.
trans-unit.target: Noam是高通公司研发部门的工程副总裁，在那里他和高通的健康与生命科学集团一起开发健康医护方面的科技和战略。他也在项目中担任技术顾问包括点对点技术。他拥有超过20项专利。

trans-unit.source: Emily Melton
trans-unit.target: Emily Melton

trans-unit.source: Emily Melton has served as a partner at Mayfield Fund and Draper Fisher Jurvetson, where she helped build each firm's consumer investment portfolio. She has served on the boards of NearbyNow, RedFin and ShareThis, and was responsible for investments in Alphonso Labs, Meebo, Kudo (Google), RichRelevance and Flux (MTVNetworks).
trans-unit.target: Emily Melton是梅菲尔德基金和德丰杰的合伙人，她帮助各个公司组建消费投资组合。她在NearbyNow, RedFin和ShareThis的董事会任职并负责Alphonso Labs, Meebo, Kudo (谷歌), RichRelevance 和Flux (MTVNetworks)的投资。

trans-unit.source: Skip Fleshman
trans-unit.target: Skip Fleshman

trans-unit.source: Skip is a Partner with Asset Management Company, where he invests in mobility, datacenter, and health science technology sectors. He has founded two startups, and has extensive experience in operational experience in software, visual systems and government sales. He also serves on the board of the Johnson Foundation.
trans-unit.target: Skip是资产管理公司的合伙人，他向移动性，数据中心和健康科学科技部门投资。他创建了两个初创公司并在软件、视觉系统和政府销售中拥有广泛的运营经验。他也在约翰逊基金会的董事会任职。

trans-unit.source: Aaron Levie
trans-unit.target: Aaron Levie

trans-unit.source: Aaron Levie is the CEO and co-founder of Box, which he originally created as a college business project with the goal of helping people easily access their information from any location. Box was launched from Aaron's dorm room in 2005 with the help of CFO Dylan Smith. He is the visionary behind Box's product and platform strategy, which is focused on incorporating the best of traditional content management with the most effective elements of social business software. He has spoken about content and collaboration tools at events such as Fortune Brainstorm Tech, Web 2.0, Dreamforce, Accenture Global Summit, South by Southwest, and Svase. Aaron studied business at the Marshall School of Business at the University of Southern California before taking a leave of absence.
trans-unit.target: Aaron Levie是Box的首席执行官和联合创始人，创建之初它只是一个旨在帮助人们从任意地点简便的获取信息的大学商业项目。Box在首席财务官Dylan Smith的帮助下于2005年发行。他是Box产品和平台战略背后的预言家，聚焦于合并最佳的传统内容管理和最有效的社会商业软件。他曾在财富头脑风暴技术，Web 2，Dreamforce，埃森哲全球峰会，South by Southwest和svase等场合说过关于内容和合作工具的话题。Aaron在离开前在南加州大学的马歇尔商学院学习商业。

trans-unit.source: Greg Badros
trans-unit.target: Greg Badros

trans-unit.source: Greg Badros is the Vice President of Engineering & Products at Facebook. Previously, Badros was a Senior Director of Engineering at Google, responsible for Gmail, Calendar, Reader, Orkut, etc. from 2007 to 2009, and responsible for Ads (focusing on AdSense) from 2004 to 2007.
trans-unit.target: Greg Badros是脸书的工程和产品副总裁。之前，Badros担任谷歌的工程高级总监，在2007年到2009年负责Gmail，日历，阅读器，Orkut,等，在2004到2007年负责Ads。

trans-unit.source: Tim Chang, Managing Director at Mayfield Fund
trans-unit.target: Tim Chang是梅菲尔德基金的总经理。

trans-unit.source: Patients and doctors alike have long been frustrated by the one-size-fits-all approach to healthcare and the limited opportunities for finding personally relevant health information online. Ron and his team are successfully addressing the critical need for a source of trusted medical information that allows consumers to interact with doctors online in an efficient and meaningful way. The rapid growth of the HealthTap community coupled with this round of funding is further evidence of the tremendous opportunity at the intersection of web-enabled social networks and more personalized, data-driven healthcare.
trans-unit.target: 患者和医生一样长期以来对于单一形式适合所有的健康医护途径和寻求私人化健康信息的有限机会表示沮丧。Ron和他的团队成功的开发了对于受信任的医疗信息的资源的关键性需求，为患者能够使用有效率和有意义地方法来在线与医生互动创造了条件。HealthTap在这一轮融资后的快速增长证明了在网络社交系统和更私人化、数据驱动型的健康医护之间巨大机会。

trans-unit.source: Rowan Chapman, Partner at Mohr Davidow Ventures
trans-unit.target: Rowan Chapman是达维多风险投资公司的合伙人。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is helping define the new field of "Interactive Health"- the sector that is moving consumer health information to new platforms, like smartphones and tablets, to provide portability and immediate access to actionable information. Consumers and physicians are increasingly joining the online conversation, and interactive health deserves the close attention of the investment community. HealthTap demonstrates the potential of this emerging space.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在界定交互式健康的新领域——这个领域正在将消费者的健康信息移向新的平台，比如智能手机和平板电脑，来提供可携带性和即时的信息获取。消费者和医生越来越多地加入在线咨询，互动式健康值得投资界的密切关注。HealthTap证明了这个新领域的潜力。

trans-unit.source: Bill Ericson, General Partner at Mohr Davidow Ventures
trans-unit.target: Bill Ericson, Mohr Davidow风险投资公司的普通合伙人

trans-unit.target: Vinod Khosla在Khosla Ventures

trans-unit.source: HealthTap focuses on an easy user interface that allows quick, informative interactions between patients and physicians... HealthTap is a powerful form of online participatory medicine.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap关注一种简单的提供患者和医师间快捷的信息互动的界面。HealthTap是一种在线参与式医疗强有力的形式。

trans-unit.source: Dr. Michael Thompson
trans-unit.target: Michael Thompson医生

trans-unit.source: Oncologist (Waukesha, WI)
trans-unit.target: 肿瘤学家（Waukesha，威斯康辛州）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a wonderful way to get good and straightforward information out to patients who need it most beyond my own practice... HealthTap (is) the newest evolution and concept of health information on the Internet.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是需求最大的患者获得优质且直接信息的好途径。HealthTap是互联网上最新的健康信息的进化及理念。

trans-unit.source: Family Physician (Coronado, CA)

trans-unit.source: HealthTap gives you a better way to connect with your doctor, rather than when you just see him face-to-face. Using social media to get patients information ahead of visits also improves care. The more information we can get to you ahead of time, the more engaged you are as a patient.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap为您提供和医生交流的更好办法，如同是面对面交流。在患者到访之前使用社交媒介获得患者信息也可以提高医护。我们提前为您提供越多信息，您作为患者就可以了解更多。

trans-unit.source: Ob/Gyn (Irving, TX)
trans-unit.target: 产科学 (欧文, 得克萨斯州)

trans-unit.source: Through HealthTap, I can help patients become empowered with education to make better choices about their care.
trans-unit.target: 通过HealthTap，我能帮助患者获得更多知识来使对他们的健康做出更好的选择。
