trans-unit.source: Download our apps today For:
trans-unit.target: 立刻下载我们的应用程序：

trans-unit.source: Who are the doctors on HealthTap? Are they all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing? How are they selected?
trans-unit.target: HealthTap上的医生是谁？他们都是信誉良好的美国拥有执业执照的医生吗？他们是如何被挑选的？

trans-unit.source: All doctors on HealthTap are licensed to practice medicine in the U.S. and are in good standing. They include doctors from leading U.S. medical institutions (like Stanford and Harvard), as well as private practices from across the country. HealthTap Medical Experts are independent third parties, and are not employed by or affiliated with HealthTap. Admission to the HealthTap network is by application and invitation only.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上所有的医生都持有用药证书并且有良好的信誉。他们包括美国顶级医学院（比如斯坦福和哈佛）的医生，也包括美国的私人医生。HealthTap的医学专家独立于第三方，他们并不受雇或附属于HealthTap。只有申请或受邀才能进入HealthTap网站。

trans-unit.source: Diagnosis & Treatment
trans-unit.target: 诊断和治疗

trans-unit.source: Can I get a prescription, a medical diagnosis or medical treatment on HealthTap?
trans-unit.target: 我能在HealthTap获得处方、医疗诊断或医学治疗吗？

trans-unit.source: No. Prescriptions, diagnosis and medical treatment are not available on HealthTap. Please see your doctor or medical care provider for these as you normally would. Even if your real-life doctor is on HealthTap, prescriptions, diagnosis and treatment should not take place on or over the HealthTap service. HealthTap is not intended or designed to replace your doctor's independent judgment about the appropriateness or risks of symptoms, conditions or treatments (including procedures) for any given person, including you.
trans-unit.target: 不可以。在HealthTap上不可获得处方、医疗诊断或医学治疗。请照常去见您的医生或医学医护服务提供者来获取这些。即使您真实世界的医生也在HealthTap上，处方、医疗诊断或医学治疗也不应该被包含在HealthTap的服务内。HealthTap并不旨在代替您的医生为任何人根据症状、病症或治疗（包括临床操作）等独立做出的合理判断，包括您。

trans-unit.source: Asking Doctors
trans-unit.target: 询问医生中

trans-unit.source: Can I really submit a question to thousands of doctors for a free answer?
trans-unit.target: 我能向很多医生免费提交一个问题来获得回答吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes - it’s true!  Health questions submitted to HealthTap are submitted to our network of thousands of doctor across the U.S.  These doctors try to answer every question that’s submitted.  Questions are most likely to be answered when they have not already been asked and answered, and they are good health questions (easy to understand and useful to the entire HealthTap community). Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 是的 - 当然可以！HealthTap的问题将会上传到我们数以千计的医生网络中。这些医生会尝试回答每个被提交的问题。HealthTap的问题将会上传到我们数以千计的医生网络中。这些医生试着回答每个被提出的问题。了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: Why is question length limited? Can I ask a longer question?
trans-unit.target: 为什么问题的长度受限制？我能询问更长的问题吗？

trans-unit.source: Questions on HealthTap are limited to 150 characters to make them easy to view on mobile devices, and so that they can quickly be read and answered. Try re-phrasing or leaving out personal details to shorten questions. If you have a longer question to ask, you can make a 99 cent charitable donation and submit your question with 50 more characters, or you can ask a private question to a specific doctor on HealthTap (for a small fee).
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上的问题被限制在150个字符内以便它们可以在移动设备上被浏览，这样它们可以得到快速回答。试着重新组织语言或剔除个人信息来缩短问题。如果您有更长的问题需要询问，您可以付出99美分的价格来提交一个可拥有50个额外字符的问题，或者您也可以向HealthTap上的一名特定医生询问一个私人问题（需要很少的费用）

trans-unit.source: How fast will I get a response to my question?
trans-unit.target: 我多快才能获得我的问题的回答？

trans-unit.source: Almost every question submitted to HealthTap receives an answer – especially those that are well-written. Most questions are answered promptly, often within 24 hours (some questions are answered within a few hours, or even a few minutes). Well written questions useful to the HealthTap community have the best chance of being quickly answered. The response time for questions asked for free depends on the number of other unanswered questions. If you’d like your question to receive priority (and to increase the likelihood of a fast response), you can make a charitable donation at the time you ask it.
trans-unit.target: 几乎所有的HealthTap的问题都会获得回答——尤其是那些精心提出的。大多数问题都会快速地被回答，一般是24小时之内（一些问题只需要几个小时甚至几分钟）。对HealthTap社区有益的精心提出的问题最有可能被快速回答。免费提出的问题的回答时间基于其他未回答的问题的数目。如果您希望您的问题被优先回答（或者添加快速回答的概率），您可以在询问时进行慈善捐赠。

trans-unit.source: Premium Service
trans-unit.target: 高级服务

trans-unit.source: Where does my money go when I pay to send my question to doctors?
trans-unit.target: 当我就我的问题向医生付款时，我的钱去了哪里？

trans-unit.source: All profits from payments to improve question response time and increase question length are donated to one of the many medical charities supported by HealthTap, including: Operation Smile, Doctors without Borders, American Red Cross, Susan G. Komen for the Cure, Direct Relief International, African Medical & Research Foundation (AMREF), Against Malaria Foundation, Nurse Family Partnership, Naya Health, Schistosomiasis Control Initiative (SCI), MAP International, Global Partners for Development, and others.
trans-unit.target: 所有加快问题回答速度和添加问题长度的费用都捐给了HealthTap支持的众多医疗慈善会中的一个，包括：微笑行动，无国界医生，美国红十字会，苏珊•科门乳腺癌防治基金会，国际直接救济组织，非洲医学&研究基金会，疾基金会，护士家庭合作计划，纳亚健康，血吸虫病控制计划，MAP国际，全球发展伙伴和其他

trans-unit.source: How much do Private Conversations cost? How long will it take to get an answer to a private question, and what if it’s is not answered?
trans-unit.target: 私人咨询的价格是多少？私人咨询多久才能收到回答，如果没有被回答呢？

trans-unit.source: There is a small fee (less than the cost of a typical co-pay for someone with comprehensive health insurance) to ask a private question directly to the doctor of your choice on HealthTap. When you submit a private question to a doctor on HealthTap, that doctor has up to 72 hours to answer the question. You will receive a full refund if the question is not answered within that time. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上您可以通过付出一笔很小的费用（低于有全面健康保险人的典型共同支付的费用）来直接向医生询问一个私人问题。当您在HealthTap上向医生提交一个私人问题的时，医生最多有72个小时来回答这个问题。如果在规定期限内您没有收到回答，您将会收到全额退款。了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: Private Conversations
trans-unit.target: 私人咨询

trans-unit.source: Is it possible to ask a question privately to a specific doctor of my choice using HealthTap and how are private questions different from public ones?
trans-unit.target: 我能在HealthTap上根据我个人的选择向特定的医生询问问题吗？私人问题和公共问题的区别是什么？

trans-unit.source: To ask your question to a specific doctor on HealthTap, send a doctor a direct message and start a Private Conversation. These messages are private and HIPAA-secure, and let you upload files (like scans or reports). Public questions submitted on HealthTap are distributed to multiple doctors and are public – both the question and the answer are visible to anyone who becomes a member on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 为了在HealthTap向一个特定医生询问您的问题，向他发送直接消息并开始私人咨询。这些消息是私人并是HIPAA安全的，您可以自己下载资料（如扫描或报告）。在HealthTap上提交的公共问题是分发给众多医生并公开可见的——问题和回答都对所有HealthTap的会员可见。

trans-unit.source: How long will it take to get an answer to this private question? What if it’s not answered?
trans-unit.target: 私人问题多久才能获得回答？如果它没有被回答怎么办？

trans-unit.source: When you submit a private question to a doctor on HealthTap, that doctor has up to 72 hours to answer the question. You will receive a full refund if the question is not answered within that time.
trans-unit.target: 当您在HealthTap上向医生提交一个私人问题的时，医生最多有72个小时来回答这个问题。如果在规定期限内您没有收到回答，您将会收到全额退款。

trans-unit.source: Can I make appointment requests using HealthTap?
trans-unit.target: 我能使用HealthTap进行预约请求吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes! HealthTap lets you request appointments with doctors on their Virtual Practice pages. Just hit the “Request Appointment” button and send the doctor your details. The doctor or his or her office should then contact you to schedule the appointment.
trans-unit.target: 可以！HealthTap使您可以在医生的在线诊疗网页上预约。点击“预约诊疗”按键并向医生发送您的详细信息。医生或他/她的办公室随后会联系您来确定预约时间。

trans-unit.source: What’s a DocScore and what does it mean?
trans-unit.target: 医者评分是什么，它意味着什么？

trans-unit.source: A DocScore is a number that reflects both publicly available information as well as a doctor’s reputation, experience, and engagement on HealthTap. The higher the number, the better. A high DocScore shows you (among other things) that the doctor is both active on HealthTap and that other doctors frequently agree with the answers that he or she provides on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 医者评分是反应医生公开可获取的信息以及在HealthTap上的声誉、经验以及参与度的综合数字。数字越高越好。较高的医者评分告诉您医生不仅在HealthTap上保持活跃，而且经常获得其他医生对他在HealthTap上发表的回答的认同。

trans-unit.source: What is my Health Activity, what it is used for, and how do I edit it?
trans-unit.target: 我的健康活动是什么，它被用来做什么，我怎么编辑它？

trans-unit.source:
Your Health Activity is a record of the health and related information you enter into and share with HealthTap. It is completely secure and private. Your Health Activity is used to provide you with better information on HealthTap.
 
 Your Health Activity is never visible to other members on HealthTap, but if you choose to start a private health conversation with a doctor on HealthTap using our new House Call feature, your real name and your Health Activity will be visible to that doctor. 
 
 You can edit your Health Profile and add to your Health Activity at any time.
trans-unit.target:
您的健康活动是您在HealthTap上输入并分享的您的健康及相关信息的记录。它完全是安全的和私密的。您的健康活动用于为您提供有关HealthTap的更好信息。
 
 HealthTap上的其他会员永远不会显示您的健康活动，但如果您选择使用我们的新的出诊功能与HealthTap上的医生开始私人健康咨询，您的真实姓名和您的健康活动将向该医生显示。
 
 您可以随时编辑您的健康档案并添加到您的健康活动。

trans-unit.source: Logging In
trans-unit.target: 登录中

trans-unit.source: Why can’t I log in?
trans-unit.target: 我为什么不能登录？

trans-unit.source: To log in to HealthTap you must first register and create an account. When you do this, you’ll pick an email address and password to use. You can change your log in information in your settings at any time. If you’ve already registered and are having trouble logging in, please contact us.
trans-unit.target: 要登录HealthTap您必须先注册并创建一个账户。当您在做这些的时候，您需要选择一个邮箱地址和密码。您可以随时在设置中修改您的登录信息。如果您已经注册，但是无法登录，请联系我们。

trans-unit.source: Follow ups
trans-unit.target: 跟进

trans-unit.source: How can I follow up with a doctor, or ask for a second opinion?
trans-unit.target: 我如何跟进一名医生并询问第二意见？

trans-unit.source: If you’ve asked a public question and want to follow up with the doctor who answered it, you can start a private conversation with that doctor. Similarly, if you’ve received a doctor’s opinion, you can start a private conversation on HealthTap to receive a second opinion. Private conversations allow you to upload and share documents and your health activity with the doctor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提出了一个公开问题并想跟进那位回答了您问题的医生，您可以和那个医生开始私人咨询。同样的，如果您获得了一名医生的建议，您可以和他进行私人咨询来获得第二意见。私人咨询允许您与那位医生上传并分享您的档案和健康活动。

trans-unit.source: Dr. Roy Benaroch
trans-unit.target: Roy Benaroch医生

trans-unit.source: Pediatrician (Alpharette, GA)
trans-unit.target: 儿科医生 (阿法乐特, 乔治亚州)

trans-unit.source: A new patient commented recently that they Googled my name and the HealthTap link came up in the first 5 links, so I am already noticing some increased visibility. That is particularly important for me, having just relocated to Irving Texas. Thank you for starting HealthTap!
trans-unit.target: 一位新的患者最近评论他们并搜索了我的名字，在HealthTap链接中前五个链接中显现出来，我已经注意到添加了一些可见性。这对于刚刚搬迁到德克萨斯州欧文市的我来说尤其重要。感谢您开始HealthTap！

trans-unit.source: Dr. Visalakshi (Lalli) Vallury
trans-unit.target: Visalakshi (Lalli) Vallury医生

trans-unit.source: Family Medicine (Irving, TX)
trans-unit.target: 家庭医师(欧文, 得克萨斯州)

trans-unit.source: After 22 years in practice, I have worn out my dentures giving the same answer to the same questions over and over. HealthTap is an opportunity for my mature, distilled answers to be seen by thousands.
trans-unit.target: 经过22年的诊疗，我已经厌倦了对于相同的问题给出相同的回答。HealthTap对我来说是成熟的机遇，从数千中筛选出回答。

trans-unit.source: Dr. Anatoly Belilovsky
trans-unit.target: Anatoly Belilovsky医生

trans-unit.source: Pediatrician (Brooklyn, NY)
trans-unit.target: 儿科医生(布鲁克林, 纽约)

trans-unit.source: While there are many online patient and physicians forums, HealthTap focuses on an easy user interface that allows quick, informative interactions between patients and physicians. HealthTap is a powerful form of online participatory medicine.
trans-unit.target: 尽管有许多在线医患论坛，HealthTap旨在创建一个医患间快捷的信息互动界面。HealthTap是一种在线参与式医疗强有力的形式。

trans-unit.source: To add other group affiliations to your HealthTap profile, edit your Virtual Practice page. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 如果要在您的HealthTap档案中加入其它群组联系，请在您的在线诊疗页面编辑它。了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: Providing helpful answers: answer more
trans-unit.target: 提供有帮助的回答：回答更多

trans-unit.source: Accepting new private messages from patients
trans-unit.target: 接受来自患者的新私人消息

trans-unit.source: Fill out the "about" section of your Virtual Practice page with all of your background information and highlights of your practice and expertise. Make sure to include important office location and hours information.
trans-unit.target: 在您的在线诊疗页面的“关于”栏目中填写所有您的背景信息和突出您的诊疗与专业技能。确保包括了重要的办公室位置和时间信息。

trans-unit.source: Join & Get Benefits
trans-unit.target: 加入和获得优势

trans-unit.source: What are the benefits of joining the Medical Expert Network and how do I join?
trans-unit.target: 加入医学专家网络的优势是什么？如何加入？

trans-unit.source: The benefits of HealthTap for doctors are spelled out on our doctors page. If you are a U.S.-licensed doctor you can sign up online or by downloading the number one featured HealthTap MD app for iPhone, iPad and Android. Signing up is quick and easy — and getting started takes less than a minute. During the sign up process we will ask for information that is required to verify that every Medical Expert on HealthTap is a U.S. licensed physician in good standing. If you need assistance during the sign up process, please reach out to our support team here.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap对医生的优势在我们的医生页面。如果您是拥有美国执业执照的医生，您可以在线注册或下载一个适用于iPhone，iPad和安卓的HealthTap MD应用程序.注册便捷且容易——只需不到一分钟即可开始。在注册过程中，我们会询问并证实所有的HealthTap的医学专家都是具有良好信誉的美国拥有执业执照的医生。如果您在注册过程中需要帮助，请在这里寻求我们的支持团队的帮助。

trans-unit.source: How do I join the Medical Expert Network?
trans-unit.target: 我如何加入医学专家网络？

trans-unit.source: If you are a U.S. licensed doctor you can sign up online or by downloading the number one featured HealthTap MD app for iPhone, iPad and Android. Signing up is quick and easy — and getting started takes less than a minute. During the sign up process we will ask for information that is required to verify that every Medical Expert on HealthTap is a U.S. licensed doctor in good standing. If you need assistance during the sign up process, please reach out to our support team here
trans-unit.target: 如果您是拥有美国执业执照的医生注册一个在线或下载 HealthTap Md应用程序为 iPhone, iPad和安卓。注册便捷且容易——只需不到一分钟即可开始。在注册过程中，我们会询问并证实所有的HealthTap的医学专家都是具有良好信誉的美国拥有执业执照的医生。如果您在注册过程中需要帮助，请在这里寻求我们的支持团队的帮助。

trans-unit.source: What is Verification?
trans-unit.target: 什么是验证？

trans-unit.source: Everyone claiming to be a U.S. licensed doctor that wants to join the Medical Expert Network is verified through a manual review process. This process ensures that all of the doctors on HealthTap have met the necessary requirements to legally practice medicine in the United States. After successful verification, a notification is sent out to confirm membership in the network. Verification typically takes between 24 and 48 hours.
trans-unit.target: 所有声称是美国拥有执业执照的医生并想加入医学专家网络的人都会经过的人工验证过程。这个过程确保了所有HealthTap上的医生都在美国拥有合法的诊疗医学。在验证成功之后，您会在网络中收到确认会员信息的通知。验证通常需要24到48个小时。

trans-unit.source: Medical Groups
trans-unit.target: 医学团队

trans-unit.source: Can Medical Groups register on HealthTap?
trans-unit.target: 医学团队可以注册HealthTap吗？

trans-unit.source: File Sharing
trans-unit.target: 文件分享中

trans-unit.source: What is file sharing and how does it work?
trans-unit.target: 什么是文件分享以及如何操作？

trans-unit.source: Patients and doctors are now able to send digital files on HealthTap through a HIPAA-secure process. Documents and images may be uploaded and sent worry-free to assist in the transfer of information and care. Files that you are sharing and that have been shared with you are accessible in your library, which can be reached by clicking the button in the left-side menu.
trans-unit.target: 患者和医生现在能够通过HIPAA安全处理在HealthTap上传送电子文件。文件和图像能够上传并且无忧无虑的传送，来帮助传递信息和医护您分享的文件以及分享给您的文件都可在您的图书馆里看到，只需点击左边菜单按钮即可。

trans-unit.source: Reimbursement
trans-unit.target: 补偿

trans-unit.source: Can I get reimbursed for my participation?
trans-unit.target: 我的参与的有补偿吗？

trans-unit.source: Can I choose whether or not to respond to a private message? What is expected if I reply?
trans-unit.target: 我可以选择是否回复一条私人信息吗？如果我回复的话，期望我回复什么？

trans-unit.source: You have the power to decide if you will respond to a private message. When you do respond to a private message you will have access to the patient’s Health Activity and any shared files associated with the message. Responding consists of answering the question posed by the patient in a 600-character answer field. You are encouraged to use photos if they will help support the information you are providing. When you are satisfied with the information. If you elect not to respond to a particular private message you may do so by selecting the “Can’t Help” button. When you do so, you have the option of referring the patient’s message to a colleague in your network. If a private message is unattended for 72 hours, your Responsiveness score will decrease, although the message is still available to view and respond to beyond 72 hours.
trans-unit.target: 您有权决定是否回复私人信息当您回复私人信息的时候，您可以使用患者的健康活动以及任何与该信息相关的已分享的文件。回复需要回答患者提出的问题，字数为600字以内。我们期望您使用能够帮助补充您提供的信息的照片当您满意该信息时。如果您选择不回复个别私人信息，您需要选择“无法帮助”按钮。当您这么做的时候，您可以选择将该患者的信息在您的网络内推荐给同事。如果私人消息72小时没有被查看，您的反应灵敏分数将会减少，尽管该消息还可以查看，并且可以在超过72小时之后回复。

trans-unit.source: Any tips on how to answer a question?
trans-unit.target: 有任何关于如何回答问题的小贴士吗？

trans-unit.source: When providing an answer for a patient, be mindful of the style, language, and tone of your answer in addition to the relevance of your answer in relation to the question asked — just like in your clinic! Providing thoughtful and informative answers that really “hit the mark” for a patient will increase your chances of receiving a “Thank You” which has a direct impact on your DocScore.
trans-unit.target: 当为患者回答问题时，除了与问题的相关性以外，请注意您回复的风格，语言和语调——就像在您的诊所一样！提供体贴的有益的的回答将非常“hit the mark”患者，这将添加您收到“谢谢”的几率，这对您的医者评分有直接影响。

trans-unit.source: Are follow up questions allowed?
trans-unit.target: 允许后续问题吗？

trans-unit.source: Patients will have an opportunity to pay for a shorter follow up question if they desire. You will be reimbursed for providing a short reply to follow up questions in a similar manner to the original question and responsiveness and helpfulness scores are impacted in the same fashion. Follow up answers are limited to 250 characters. Follow up questions are reimbursed at the rate of half a full question.
trans-unit.target: 如果患者要求，可以通过支付的方式再询问一个更短的后续的问题。您以回答原始问题相同的方式对后续问题给出简要回复将获得补偿，并且您的反应灵敏和乐于助人分数将以相同的方式添加。后续问题需控制在250字以内。后续问题将按半个问题的比例获得补偿

trans-unit.source: How do I make a withdrawal?
trans-unit.target: 我如何提款？

trans-unit.source: To make a withdrawal you must have a minimum balance of $100.00. Withdrawals can be made at any time in your setting menu. After your request is received you will be issued a check in the mail, PayPal payment, or a receipt confirmation your donation to a charity.
trans-unit.target: 您必须有$100.00的最小余额才可进行提款。提款可随时在您的设置菜单中进行。收到您的要求之后，将会给您发确认邮件，PayPal支付，或者确认您的善款已到达某慈善机构的收据。

trans-unit.source: Where do I go if I'd like help or support on HealthTap?
trans-unit.target: 如果我想在HealthTap上帮助他人，我应该去哪里？

trans-unit.source: You can reach out to our support desk at any time by selecting the “Feedback” button under “About HealthTap” in the left navigation menu.
trans-unit.target: 通过选择左侧导航菜单中“关于HealthTap”下的“反馈”按钮，您可以随时到我们的支持台。

trans-unit.source: What are “Known for” topics?
trans-unit.target: 什么是“专攻”话题？

trans-unit.source: By registering, you have already selected a specialty, but we recognize that most doctors have several areas of practice that they are “known for” based on past training or cumulative clinical experience. We want you to be able to attract patients to your practice based on the topics you are known for in medicine and so we created topics for you to choose from that will allow you to customize your Virtual Practice on HealthTap. You are allowed to choose up to 5 known for topics and you can change them at any time.
trans-unit.target: 通过注册，您已经选择一个专长领域，但是我们知道大多数医生在过往培训或积累的临床经验基础上都有几个“专攻”领域。我们希望您能够在专攻的医药问题上吸引住您的患者，并且我们会为您产生一些话题供您选择帮助您自定义在HealthTap上的在线诊疗。您可以至多选择5个专攻话题，并且您可以随时更换。

trans-unit.source: What is the Top Doctors Competition”?
trans-unit.target: 什么是顶级医生竞赛？

trans-unit.source: Once you have declared your “Known For” topics you have the ability to showcase your expertise in this area and earn the #1 spot on your block, in your neighborhood, city, state, and beyond! You can be the best in your known for areas simply by doing what you do best — helping people who are looking for your expertise. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 一旦您宣布您的“专攻”话题，您将可以展现您在该领域的专业知识并且在您所在的街区，城市，州，甚至是州以外获得第一。您只需要做您最擅长的事——帮助那些需要您专业知识的患者，您就能在您的专供领域上成为最优秀的人了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: Customization
trans-unit.target: 定制

trans-unit.source: How do I get my own customized HealthTap App or Widget?
trans-unit.target: 我如何获取我的自定义HealthTap应用程序或小工具?

trans-unit.source: Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: Membership
trans-unit.target: 会员资格

trans-unit.source: What is ClubMD?
trans-unit.target: ClubMD是什么

trans-unit.source: Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: What is a Founding Expert?
trans-unit.target: 发起的专家是什么?

trans-unit.source: Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: New Patients
trans-unit.target: 新患者

trans-unit.source: How can I use HealthTap to attract new patients?
trans-unit.target: 我该如何使用HealthTap来吸引新患者？

trans-unit.source: There are several ways that you can leverage you HealthTap Virtual Practice to gain more recognition and direct more traffic to your profile and real-world practice. Here are some of the best ways to get more visibility with HealthTap:
trans-unit.target: 您有几种方式来实现您在HealthTap在线诊疗上的影响力进而赢得更多认可和更多直接交易。这里有几种在HealthTap获得更多关注度的好方法：

trans-unit.source: Points & Levels
trans-unit.target: 积分和等级

trans-unit.source: What are points and levels?
trans-unit.target: 什么是积分和等级？

trans-unit.source: Points are a reflection of the body of your work as a Medical Expert on HealthTap, such as your engagement with users looking for your medical expertise, the size of your network of patients and colleagues, your contribution to the collective wisdom of the community and your support of others. Unlike DocScore, which reflects a more “real-time” snapshot of your recent participation, your points and level only rise over time.
trans-unit.target: 积分是反应您作为HealthTap上的医学专家的主体工作，比如您对于寻求您的专业医疗知识的患者的参与度，您的患者和同事的关系网大小，您对于社区集体智慧的贡献程度和其他人对您的支持。不像医者评分，其反应更多的是您近期参与的”实时”简单印象，您的积分和等级随着时间的推移只会上升。

trans-unit.source: How do I add or remove publications that I’ve co-authored?
trans-unit.target: 我该如何添加或删除我与他人合著的出版物？

trans-unit.source: Peer reviewed publications are now listed on HealthTap, and are part of your Virtual Practice. You can add, edit or remove articles that you’ve co-authored within your Profile, or add yourself as an author directly from the publications page.
trans-unit.target: 同行评审的出版物已经列在了HealthTap上，也是您在线诊疗的一部分。您可以添加，编辑或者删除您与您资料库中合著的文章，或者直接添加您作为作者的出版物的那一页。

trans-unit.source: Who can add add a description or comments to a publication?
trans-unit.target: 谁可以添加对于出版物的描述或评论？

trans-unit.source: Co-authors can add and edit a shared description of an article (so consider checking with them when modifying an existing description). Any registered medical expert on HealthTap can add comments to an article. Comments and descriptions are publicly visible, and help highlight your expertise and authorship.
trans-unit.target: 合著者能够添加编辑该文章的共同介绍（因此请在修改已有介绍的时候注意检查）。任何在HealthTap上注册的医学专家能够添加对于文章的评论。评论和介绍是对任何人可见的，帮助突出您的专业知识和原创作者

trans-unit.source: What are Curbside Consults and how do they work?
trans-unit.target: 什么是路边咨询，他们是如何工作的？

trans-unit.source: Currently in beta, Curbside Consults are a way for our expert doctors to consult with the thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors on HealthTap for free. Doctors can select the specialty their consult is distributed to, and can receive relevant, detailed peer responses to their requests. Consults submitted by doctors who answer more patient questions on HealthTap are given priority – speed up the responses you receive by answering patient questions on HealthTap today.
trans-unit.target: 目前处于检验阶段，路边咨询是一种我们专业医生向数千拥有美国执业执照医生在HealthTap上免费咨询的一种方式。医生能够选择分配给他们的咨询专长，而且能够接受关于他们要求的相关，详细的同行回复。在HealthTap上回答更多患者问题的医生所提交的咨询将排在前列——加快您今天在HealthTap上回答患者问题后收到的回复。

trans-unit.source: Doctor Videos
trans-unit.target: 医生视频

trans-unit.source: How can I submit a video for healthy living resolutions?
trans-unit.target: 我该如何上传健康生活方式的视频？

trans-unit.source: Adding a video to a Wellness page is a great way to inspire others to improve their health and well-being. Learn more here about our Wellness pages and how to submit your videos directly on HealthTap or via email.
trans-unit.target: 在Wellness页上添加视频是一种激励他人增强健康的好方式。在这里了解更多 关于我们的健康网页以及如何直接在HealthTap或通过电子邮件提交您的视频。

trans-unit.source: Group was successfully created.
trans-unit.target: 群组已成功创建

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is such an amazingly complex concept made simple, which will change how patients seek information forever. I am very excited to be a part of it!
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是如此一个令人惊奇的将复杂概念简单化的地方，其将永远改变患者如何搜寻信息的方式。我非常激动能成为其中的一员！

trans-unit.source: Dr. NeeOo Chin
trans-unit.target: NeeOo Chin医生

trans-unit.source: Ob/Gyn (Cincinnati, OH)
trans-unit.target: 产科学(辛辛那提，俄亥俄州)

trans-unit.source: An integral part of the future of health care will be the ability to impart education and advice through ecommunication. HealthTap is at the cutting edge of this trend.
trans-unit.target: 未来健康医护不可分割的一部分将是能够通过在线交流的方式给予指导和建议。HealthTap处于该潮流中的先锋地位。

trans-unit.source: Pediatrician (West Amherst, NY)
trans-unit.target: 儿科医生（West Amherst，纽约）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a brilliant example of high-tech, high-touch medicine: social technology directly connecting practitioners and patients. Building relationships with patients is why I became a pediatrician, and HealthTap helps me do that in a highly efficient and engaging way.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是高科技，高个性化医学的一个辉煌例子：社交技术直接与从业者和患者连接。与患者建立联系是为什么成为儿科医师的原因，HealthTap帮助我以高效高参与度的方式去实现它。

trans-unit.source: Dr. Lawrence Rosen
trans-unit.target: Lawrence Rosen医生

trans-unit.source: Pediatrician (Oradell, NJ)
trans-unit.target: 儿科医生 (Oradell, 新泽西)

trans-unit.source: HealthTap allows patients to cut through the clutter of Internet health information. HealthTap fills a much needed vacuum in the way health information is delivered through the Internet.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap允许患者切断互联网健康信息的混乱。HealthTap通过网络传递健康信息的方式填补了一个十分需要的真空地带。

trans-unit.source: Dr. Ruben Nazario
trans-unit.target: Ruben Nazario医生

trans-unit.source: Pediatrician (Falls Church, VA)
trans-unit.target: 儿科医生 (Falls Church, 维吉尼亚州)

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap website is an exciting and promising new way for physicians experts to share trusted information to parents in a way that is user-friendly. I,m excited to see this new forum for exchanging medical information.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap网站是一个对于内科医生很值得兴奋很有前景的分享真实值得信赖信息给患者的容易使用的新方式。我看到这个交换医疗信息的新论坛感到非常激动。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap allows me to interact with existing and potential patients, giving patients better clinical advice than a random search may turn up.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap 为我提供了与现有的和潜在的患者接触的机会，给予患者更好的诊疗建议而不是出现随机搜索。

trans-unit.source: Dr. Eugene Louie-Ng
trans-unit.target: Eugene Louie-Ng医生

trans-unit.source: OB/Gyn (Washington, DC)
trans-unit.target: 产科学(华盛顿特区)

trans-unit.source: Marianne DiNapoli, Columbia University
trans-unit.target: Marianne DiNapoli,哥伦比亚大学

trans-unit.source: Been playing around with HealthTap today and having a blast! I enjoy the points system a lot and find the interface intuitive and helpful.
trans-unit.target: 希望今天在HealthTap上很开心！我非常享受评分系统，并且其界面也非常直观有帮助。

trans-unit.source: Emily Lu, University of Chicago
trans-unit.target: Emily Lu,芝加哥大学

trans-unit.source: Just added a review of my sample questions & answers (and recommendations) to my school portfolio! Welcome to a new way of mentoring, learning, and validation of experience. Go HTU!
trans-unit.target: 添加了一个我的样本问题和回答（以及推荐）的综述到我学校的资料库里。欢迎指导，学习，和经验认证的新方式去HTU！

trans-unit.source: Mike Moore, Pacific Northwest University of Health Sciences
trans-unit.target: Mike Moore, 太平洋西北大学健康科学

trans-unit.source: Danielle Jones, Texas Tech University Health Sciences Center
trans-unit.target: Danielle Jones, 德州理工大学健康科学中心

trans-unit.source: I love that HealthTap is backed by doctors in all areas of health, so I know the information I find is validated. I,m not going online in the middle of the night and getting some crazy parent. I also love that you can connect with your doctor on HealthTap or with the other doctor,s at their practice so in-and-out of the office, I feel at ease.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢HealthTap由关于健康的所有领域的医生支撑起来的平台，所以我知道我找到的信息都是经过验证的。夜半时我将不会上网去为那些疯狂的患者回答问题。我也喜欢能在HealthTap上与自己的医生或与其他医生联系的感觉，我感到轻松。

trans-unit.source: The absolute best feature of HealthTap is the level of involvement from experts in the Medical community. It makes me feel confident that when I search a condition or have a question, the knowledge and insights are not only helpful, but they,re accurate. It makes me feel at ease as a new mom.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的最佳特征是医学社区专家的参与程度。它使我有信心，当我搜索一个条件或有一个问题，知识和见解不仅有帮助，但他们，更准确。作为一个新的妈妈它让我很安心。

trans-unit.source: Alison J.
trans-unit.target: Alison J.

trans-unit.source: I just went on and become a member of HealthTap. I love the concept and already found some useful information for my daughter!
trans-unit.target: 我只是继续成为HealthTap的会员。我爱这个概念并已经为我女儿已经找到一些有帮助的信息！

trans-unit.source: Kate
trans-unit.target: Kate

trans-unit.source: I love having HealthTap doctors ,on call., It,s better than a... copay... or waiting 2 hours for the pediatrician,s office to open
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢有HealthTap的医生，随传随到，它比一个...更好共同支付...或等待2小时的儿科医生办公室打开

trans-unit.source: Ileana B.
trans-unit.target: Ileana B.

trans-unit.source: I think Googling for information is great for many things, I just don,t think your health is one of them. With HealthTap, you know you,re hearing from a doctor, not just another parent, or an anonymous stranger in cyberspace who doesn,t really know what they,re talking about.
trans-unit.target: 我认为对于很多事情而言，在谷歌上搜寻信息很不错，我只是不认为健康也是其中之一。通过HealthTap，您知道您是从一个医生处收到的回复，而不仅仅是另一个家长，或一个网络空间里并不真正知道他们在谈论什么的匿名的陌生人。

trans-unit.source: Jennifer J.
trans-unit.target: Jennifer J.

trans-unit.source: ...with recognition, increased positive Internet visibility and even monetary compensation.
trans-unit.target: ...通过注册，添加的积极网络关注甚至是货币性补偿。

trans-unit.source: ...in a positive, collaborative environment with colleagues and patients passionate about promoting health and well-being.
trans-unit.target: ...在一个积极的合作的环境中，与同事和患者热烈讨论如何增强健康和幸福。

trans-unit.source: ...in a safe, private, HIPAA-secure online environment with private conversations and curbside consults.
trans-unit.target: ...在一个安全，私密，HIPAA安全的在线环境，有私人通讯和路边咨询。

trans-unit.source: ...by connecting with trusted colleagues, as well as other specialty leaders from respected private practices and top institutions like Cleveland Clinic and Harvard.
trans-unit.target: ...通过与值得信赖的同事相联系，以及来自声誉很高的私人诊所和顶级机构比如克里夫兰诊所和哈佛中的专业领域的先驱人物相联系。

trans-unit.source: ...to get your name out into the mobile world and connect with your patients on the go.
trans-unit.target: ...将您的名字进入到移动世界，随处与您的患者联系。

trans-unit.source: ...with your medical school classmates and with colleagues from residencies, fellowships and practices who are waiting to connect with you on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: ...与您的医学院的同学一起，与想和您在HealthTap上建立联系的曾经实习，获得奖学金的和诊疗的同事一起。

trans-unit.source: by sharing your expertise and promoting your professional qualifications, accolades, posts, and publications all in one place.
trans-unit.target: 通过在同一个地方分享您的专业知识，提高您的专业资格，获得赞誉，发帖和出版作品。

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap focuses on an easy user interface that allows quick, informative interactions between patients and physicians... HealthTap is a powerful form of online participatory medicine."
trans-unit.target: “HealthTap注重简单的用户界面，能帮助患者和医生之间进行快速的有信息的互动...HealthTap 是一种强有力的在线参与医学的形式。"

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap is a wonderful way to get good and straightforward information out to patients who need it most beyond my own practice... HealthTap (is) the newest evolution and concept of health information on the Internet."
trans-unit.target: "HealthTap是对于需要的诊疗超过我领域的患者来说，一种非常好的方式来获得有质量的直接的信息...HealthTap是对于在线健康信息一种最新的革新和理念。"

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap gives you a better way to connect with your doctor, rather than when you just see him face-to-face. Using social media to get patients information ahead of visits also improves care. The more information we can get to you ahead of time, the more engaged you are as a patient."
trans-unit.target: “HealthTap给您提供一种比较好的与医生联系的方式，而不是仅仅面对面的方式。在患者到访之前使用社交媒介获得患者信息也可以提高医护。“我们提前能获得越多关于您的信息，您作为患者也就越能参与其中。”

trans-unit.source: "Through HealthTap, I can help patients become empowered with education to make better choices about their care."
trans-unit.target: “通过HealthTap,我能帮助患者具备相关的知识背景来帮助其选择更好的治疗。"

trans-unit.source: "[On HealthTap I am able] to use my medical knowledge to help people with the health/medical questions without them having to worry that it has been biased by an industry or political/ratings agenda."
trans-unit.target: "【在HealthTap上我能】用我的医学知识去帮助那些对健康/医学有问题的人们，而他们不必担心有产业或政治的/评级议程上的偏见。

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap is a great place to see what others are thinking, and answering the questions is challenging and fun."
trans-unit.target: “如果您想看看别人是怎么想的或者您想感受一下回答问题的挑战性和有趣性，那么HealthTap是一个很不错的地方。”

trans-unit.source: You guarantee your availability to take consults for the duration of the shift, and in exchange, are eligible for guaranteed minimum compensation payments for shifts as a function of patient demand. These doctors are preferentially routed patients before On Standby or Try Me doctors.
trans-unit.target: 您保证您可以在轮班期间接受咨询，作为交换，您有资格根据患者的需求确保轮班的最低补偿金。这些医生在待命或Try Me doctors之前优先规定患者。

trans-unit.source: You will be treating patients with non-emergency clinical care issues. The most common issues include coughs, colds, respiratory problems, abdominal pain, allergies, muscular pains, minor infections, fever, influenza, nausea, rashes, sports injuries, and strep throat. The patients you will be seeing will be physically located in the states in which you hold active medical licenses. Or they may be patients contacting HealthTap from overseas locations.
trans-unit.target: 您将治疗非紧急临床医护问题的患者。最常见的问题包括咳嗽，感冒，呼吸问题，腹痛，过敏，肌肉疼痛，轻微感染，发热，流行性感冒，反胃，皮疹，运动损伤和链球菌性咽喉炎。您将看到的患者将实际位于您持有有效医疗执业执照的州。或者他们可能是从海外地点接触HealthTap的患者。

trans-unit.source: . Doctors are chosen based on taking an active role in the HealthTap community, demonstrating clinical excellence, and getting high ratings from your colleagues and patients for your answers to questions, curated news and research, and Virtual Consults.
trans-unit.target: .医生的选择是基于在HealthTap社区中发挥积极作用，展示临床卓越性，以及从同事和患者那里获得高评分，以回答问题，策划新闻和研究以及在线咨询。

trans-unit.source: Yes. Because we are a 24/7/365 service, we expect our doctors to fulfill their shifts on federal holidays. If, for any reason, you will not be available for your shift, please notify us of this with at least one-week notice.
trans-unit.target: 是。因为我们是一个全年全天候的服务，我们期望我们的医生在联邦假日也能完成他们的班次。如果由于任何原因，您无法进行轮班，请至少提前一周通知我们。

trans-unit.source: (0.25Mbps or better). We strongly advise against taking video calls on 2G, 3G, or other mobile data connections. They tend to lack sufficient bandwidth to stream videos in high quality. Mobile 4G and LTE connections are often sufficient, but these video consults will use data that count towards your monthly data plan.
trans-unit.target: (0.25 mbps或更快)。我们强烈建议您不要在2G，3G或其他移动数据连接上接听视频通话。他们往往缺乏足够的带宽，以高质量网速传输视频。移动4G和LTE连接通常是足够的，但这些视频咨询将使用计入您的每月数据计划的数据。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap, a startup enabling patients and doctors to connect via the Internet for consultations and care, is adding a significant weapon to the arsenal it already provides its physicians: lab tests.

trans-unit.source: Starting today, doctors can prescribe lab tests, get your data back to the doctor rapidly, get it interpreted in no time.
trans-unit.target: 从今天开始，医生能够开实验室检查，快速收到数据，立刻解释化验单。

trans-unit.source: Thanks to progress in telemedicine, some patients no longer have to go to the doctor to see a doctor. It’s an approach that could mean that both health care providers and patients save money and time by cutting down on the number of visits to the doctor’s office.
trans-unit.target: 多亏远程医疗的进步，一些患者不再必须去看医生了。这是一种通过降低到医生办公室看病数量来使健康医护提供者和患者都能节约金钱和时间的方式。

trans-unit.target: HealthTap上视频聊天的医生想要结束您的WebMD MeltdownsHealthTap是唯一的能立刻满足患者的需要的公司，他们有关于病症的问题进行在线咨询，如果有必要的话，可以直接去诊断和开处方。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Offers Uber-Like Service For Seeing A Doctor. During his demo with Forbes he was able to see the doctor in two minutes...
trans-unit.target: HealthTap为查看医生提供像Uber一样的服务。在他的福布斯演示期间，他能够在两分钟内看医生...

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Wants To Be Your New On-Call Doctor...founder Ron Gutman now wants to take HealthTap further, providing actual health care in addition to information.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap 想要成为您新的随传随到的医生……创始人Ron Gutman 现在想要进一步发展HealthTap,提供除信息之外真实的健康医护。

trans-unit.source: Khosla-backed startup hopes to bring doctors to patients' mobiles...the HealthTap experience is differentiated by high-definition video and checklists for people to manage their health after receiving a formal diagnosis. It is advertising-free and intends to remain that way.
trans-unit.target: Khosla支撑的创业公司期望将医生带入患者的移动世界……HealthTap经历与在接受正规诊断后通过高清视频和清单帮助人们管理他们的健康是不一样的。它的广告是免费的并且打算持续下去。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launches virtual doctor visits on your phone. HealthTap...is taking a look at the entire patient experience and offering support, guidance, and information the whole way, from wellness to sickness and back again.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap开发了在手机上就可实现的在线医生访问。HealthTap……正在检查整个患者体验并全程提供从健康到患病支持，指导和信息。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launches $99 per month Prime option, including live HD video calls with doctors. The idea behind it isn’t to replace a visit to the doctor, but rather to provide peace of mind on-call.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap开发每月99美元的会员选项，包括与医生实时高清视频呼叫。其背后的想法是不会真正替代去看医生，而是提供了一种随传随到的安全感。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime lets you video call a Doctor whatever the hour. Unless you're rich, run a hospital or have medical professionals in the family, it's not likely that you have instant access to a doctor whenever you need. ...for a monthly fee, [HealthTap] will let you video chat with specialists as and when you require.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap会员让您不论什么时间都可与医生进行视频通话。除非您很富有，开一家医院或家庭中有医药专家，否则不太可能在您需要的时候立即联系到医生。...每月的费用，[HealthTap]将如您要求让您与专家进行视频聊天。

trans-unit.source: Skype Your Doctor For Your Next Checkup With This App. HealthTap is bringing back the “fun” in seeing your doctor.
trans-unit.target: 通过Skype与您的医生进行下一步的健康检查。HealthTap正在使看医生这件事重新变得“有趣”。

trans-unit.source: Medical Q&A site HealthTap adds consultations, for a fee. HealthTap says a key differentiator is that it provides ongoing support after consultations. This can include customized checklists, personalized health news, as well as reminders and notifications.
trans-unit.target: 医疗问答网站HealthTap添加了付费咨询。HealthTap表明一个主要的不同是其提供咨询之后的持续支持。这个包括定制的健康清单，个性化的健康新闻，以及提醒和通知。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime Launches Today. When you need an answer and you need it now, HealthTap Prime is an incredible and safe resource. Did we mention you can video chat with a doctor almost instantly?
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime今日发布。当您需要一个回答并且立即需要的时候，HealthTap Prime是一个惊人的且安全的资源。我们曾提到过您可以使用视频聊天立即与医生交流吗？

trans-unit.source: All-access medical app delivers prescriptions via smartwatch HealthTap Inc., an interactive health company, unveiled its next generation digital health service today, redefining how people connect with doctors.
trans-unit.target: 完全开放的医疗应用软件通过智能手表HealthTap Inc.来传递处方，一家交互式的健康公司，今天揭开其下一代的数字健康服务，改善了人们如何与医生联系的方式。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap reinvents itself as a mobile health concierge service. New features like virtual, mobile doctor visits and integration with pharmacy systems to process prescriptions.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap对其作为一个移动健康贵宾台服务的形式进行彻底改造。新的特性，比如在线，移动端医生访问和整合药店系统来处理处方。

trans-unit.source: Can’t get out of bed? Health Tap. Prime brings the doctor to your phone (or watch) Unlike other medical apps, HealthTap’s doctors can talk with patients and then prescribe medication all without actually seeing the patient in the real world.
trans-unit.target: 无法下床？Health Tap.Prime将医生带入到您的手机（或手表）上，不像其他的医疗应用软件，HealthTap的医生能够与患者聊天，然后开处方，不需要在现实环境中见到患者。

trans-unit.source: Hypochondriacs rejoice! HealthTap Prime puts a doctor on your iPad at any hour HealthTap Prime service will put you in touch with a real doctor via a live video chat feature, and it will do it whenever you want.
trans-unit.target: 疑病症患者高兴！HealthTap Prime 随时将医生带到您的iPad上，HealthTap Prime 服务将帮助您与真实医生通过实时视频聊天相联系，并且在您任何想要的时候。

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Prime App Helps You Video Chat With Doctors. The app lets you indulge in video chats with medical specialists as and when you need to.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prim应用程序帮助您与医生进行视频聊天。该应用程序将依照您的需要让您与医药专家进行视频聊天。

trans-unit.source: The new HealthTap Prime service means virtual house calls are just an iPhone away. HealthTap Prime is the first end-to-end virtual care solution that’s available to everyone, anytime, with a simple tap on a smartphone or a tablet.
trans-unit.target: 新的HealthTap Prime服务意味着在线出诊只需要在iPhone上进行。HealthTap Prime是首个端对端为每个人随时提供在线诊疗方案，只需在智能手机上或平板电脑上简单滑动即可。

trans-unit.source: Each doctor gets a score...It also lets doctors learn from one another.
trans-unit.target: 每个医生都会得到一个分数……它也使得医生能互相学习

trans-unit.source: A company that is defying the odds.
trans-unit.target: 一家无惧困难的公司。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's growth validates hypotheses about doctors and patients
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的成长验证了医生和患者的研究假设。

trans-unit.source: 10 Great Mobile Apps
trans-unit.target: 10款优秀的移动应用程序

trans-unit.source: A safe and secure way for consumers to get health advice from reliable sources.
trans-unit.target: 消费者从可靠来源获得健康咨询的一个安全方式。

trans-unit.source: ... bring[s] a new level of personalization in health care to the web.
trans-unit.target: ...给网络带来一个新的个性化的健康医护水平。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's offer to patients: pay #{Credits::PricePlan.test_drive_price} and text with a medical expert in real time
trans-unit.target: HealthTap提供给患者：与医学专家实时支付#{Credits::PricePlan.test_drive_price} 和文本。

trans-unit.source: The platform highlights the inherent power of data divorced from identity.
trans-unit.target: 该平台突出了从身份中分离的数据的固有能力。

trans-unit.source: Informative for users who need advice on health issues and, potentially, great public relations for doctors in search of new patients.
trans-unit.target: 为需要关于健康问题的咨询的用户提供信息，并且潜在地为医生寻找新患者提供强大的公共关系。

trans-unit.source: It's a big difference -- the difference between web 1.0 and the new mobile health revolution.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个很大的不同——web1.0和新的移动健康革新之间有很大的不同。

trans-unit.source: Doctors can build up reputation ... and ultimately drive patients to their offline real-world practices.
trans-unit.target: 医生可以建立声誉..并最终驱使患者到他们的线下现实世界进行诊疗。

trans-unit.source: This is only the start.
trans-unit.target: 这仅仅是开始。

trans-unit.source: It's a health database and health-focused social network ... with the input of doctors.
trans-unit.target: 它是一个健康数据库和以健康为重点的社交网络...随着医生的投入。

trans-unit.source: The Ultra-Popular App That Has Convinced Doctors To Give Their Services For Free
trans-unit.target: 已经说服医生免费提供服务的Ultra-Popular应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The house call makes a comeback.
trans-unit.target: 出诊重新回归了。

trans-unit.source: Get medical information on the go.
trans-unit.target: 随时随地获取医疗信息。

trans-unit.source: Its acquisition of Avvo Health will help it significantly expand its online medical community.
trans-unit.target: 其收购Avvo Health将帮助其显著扩展其在线医疗社区。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is 'reaching for the edge of what's possible'
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在靠近可能到达的边缘

trans-unit.source: No other service has gotten doctors so engaged in answering questions and the reason is the 'gamification of health.'
trans-unit.target: 没有其他服务让医生如此回答问题，原因是“gamification of health。”

trans-unit.source: A sign that healthcare is moving to mobile.
trans-unit.target: 健康医护正在转向移动的标志。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's 'mission is to improve people's health by helping them make better health decisions'.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的使命是通过帮助人们做出更好的健康决定来改善他们的健康“。

trans-unit.source: A reliable resource when you're looking for answers and helpful information.
trans-unit.target: 当您在寻找回答和有帮助信息时的一个可靠来源。

trans-unit.source: A giant leap for healthcare.
trans-unit.target: 健康医护的一个巨大飞跃。

trans-unit.source: Palo-Alto-based HealthTap, the doctor question and answer service, care provider directory and referral service is branching out once more.
trans-unit.target: Palo-Alto-based HealthTap，医生问答服务，医护提供者目录和转诊服务的分支。

trans-unit.source: In a nutshell: Patients ask questions, Physicians answer questions.
trans-unit.target: 简而言之：患者询问问题，医生回答问题。

trans-unit.source: Get in direct contact with an expert physician for free via a smartphone.
trans-unit.target: 通过一个智能手机和专家医生直接联系。

trans-unit.source: Utilizes technology to better connect patients with their physicians.
trans-unit.target: 利用技术使患者与他们的医师更好的连接。

trans-unit.source: Within a few hours you'll have a well-informed answer--no circuitous internet search required.
trans-unit.target: 在几个小时内，您会有一个见多识广的回答 - 不需要迂回的互联网搜索。

trans-unit.source: The App is more than just an encyclopedia of health information. It is a way for consumers to store and track their own health information.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序不只是一个健康信息的百科全书。这是一个储存和追踪他们健康信息的方式。

trans-unit.source: There is an incredible amount of information available right at your fingertips, anytime, day or night.
trans-unit.target: 这里有大量的信息就在您的指尖，随时，不论白天还是黑夜。

trans-unit.source: TipTaps are a simple way to manage your daily health and get inspired to live a healthier, happier life.
trans-unit.target: 推心小贴士是一个非常简单的方式来管理您的日常的健康和得到生活的更健康，更幸福的灵感。

trans-unit.source: I say it is about time. The greatest minds would do well to work together for a common goal… Their patient’s health!
trans-unit.target: 我说是时候了。最伟大的领导们将为了一个共同的目标一起努力……他们患者的健康！

trans-unit.source: It is just crazy good. I was very impressed with the quality of information, and the range of expertise.
trans-unit.target: 它真的非常好。我对信息的质量和专业知识的范围印象深刻。

trans-unit.source: “I was traveling in Spain and noticed a rash on my legs. Just took 5 minutes from an app on my phone to get a face-to-face consult with a doctor, and received a checklist that helped clear my rash in just two days!"
trans-unit.target: “我在西班牙旅行，注意到我腿上有皮疹。只需花5分钟就可以从我的手机上的应用程序得到面对面咨询医生，并收到一份清单，在短短两天里帮助清除我的皮疹！

trans-unit.source: “When my dad got sick, we were in California and he was in Thailand. Thanks to HealthTap, we were able to get him the help he needed, stay in the loop, and get peace of mind."
trans-unit.target: “当我爸爸生病了，我们在加利福尼亚，而他在泰国。因为HealthTap，我们能够放心地不断地提供他所需要的帮助。

trans-unit.source: “I received call from a patient who was worried about potential side effects of the new treatment recommended by local doctors, and initiated a HealthTap Prime consult for second opinion - from a hospital in Saudi Arabia."
trans-unit.target: “我收到一名来自沙特阿拉伯的一家医院的患者的电话，他担心当地医生推荐的新治疗的潜在副作用，并发起了HealthTap Prime咨询以获得第二意见。”

trans-unit.source: “At first I was not a person with good health. I was lazy and weak but by following doctors’ tips and advice on HealthTap, I am now a healthy and strong person."

trans-unit.target: 您希望现在想看医生吗？其他医生和我自己随时恭候通过视频或文本聊天与您联系。

trans-unit.source: Is this something you would like to discuss right away? You can talk to a doctor immediately via video, voice, or text chat if you like. Just press continue!
trans-unit.target: 这是您希望马上讨论的东西吗？如果您愿意，您可以通过视频，语音或文本聊天立即与医生交谈。只需按下即可继续！

trans-unit.source: Do you want to discuss this with me or another doctor now? You can talk to a doctor immediately. Just press continue, and you can specifiy whether you connect via video, voice, or text chat.

trans-unit.source: Doctors are standing by now to help you. Just press continue to be connected to one of our U.S. board-certified doctors by video, voice, or text chat.
trans-unit.target: 医生随时恭候帮助您只需按下即可继续，即可通过视频，语音或文本聊天与我们的一位美国医学委员会认证医生联系。

trans-unit.source: You can talk to a doctor now, via video, voice, or text chat. Just press continue--we have doctors standing by to help!

trans-unit.source: Doctors are available now to talk to you live via video, voice, or text chat. Just press continue to connect!

trans-unit.target: 价值

trans-unit.source: IMAGINE
trans-unit.target: 想象

trans-unit.source: When revolutionary startups need bold advice, active coaching, and honest feedback, they go to Keith Rabois. Keith began his career as a senior executive at PayPal, subsequently serving on the leadership teams at LinkedIn and at Square, as the company's Chief Operating Officer. As a Board member, he guided Yelp! and Xoom from their first year of inception through successful IPOs, while simultaneously investing in other like-minded entrepreneurs. Keith is an early investor in YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite, and other successful Silicon Valley startups.
trans-unit.target: 当革命性的初创公司需要大胆的建议、有效的训练和诚恳的反馈时，他们向Keith Rabois求助。Keith最初是贝宝的一名高级主管，接着在领英为领导团队供职，又在Square担任公司首席运营官。作为一名董事会会员，他从第一年开始带领Yelp!和Xoom通过成功的首次公开募股，同时也向其他志同道合的企业投资。Keith是YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite 和其他硅谷成功初创公司的早期投资人。

trans-unit.source: Sonja Perkins is the Managing Director of Menlo Ventures, where she focuses on Internet, communications, and software. Her investments and board seats include: Socialcast (VMware), Acme Packet (APKT), AssureNet Pathways (Symantic), Eloquent (ELO1), F5 Networks (FFIV), Solidcore (McAfee), and Vermeer Technologies (Microsoft). She serves as a director of the Western Association of Venture Capitalists (WAVC).
trans-unit.target: Sonja Perkins是门罗风投的总经理，她关注互联网、通讯和软件。她的投资和董事会席位包括：Socialcast (VMware), Acme Packet (APKT), AssureNet Pathways (赛门铁克), Eloquent (ELO1), F5 Networks (FFIV), Solidcore (迈克菲), 和Vermeer Technologies (微软)。她在西方风险资本家协会担任总监。

trans-unit.source: Emily Melton has served as a partner at Mayfield Fund and Draper Fisher Jurvetson, where she helped build each firm's consumer investment portfolio. She has served on the boards of NearbyNow, RedFin, and ShareThis, and was responsible for investments in Alphonso Labs, Meebo, Kudo (Google), RichRelevance, and Flux (MTVNetworks).
trans-unit.target: Emily Melton是梅菲尔德基金和德丰杰的合伙人，她帮助各个公司组建消费投资组合。她在NearbyNow, RedFin和ShareThis的董事会任职并负责Alphonso Labs, Meebo, Kudo (谷歌), RichRelevance 和Flux (MTVNetworks)的投资。

trans-unit.source: Skip is a Partner with Asset Management Company, where he invests in mobility, datacenter, and health science technology sectors. He has founded two startups, and has extensive experience in operational experience in software, visual systems, and government sales. He also serves on the board of the Johnson Foundation.
trans-unit.target: Skip是资产管理公司的合伙人，他向移动性，数据中心和健康科学科技部门投资。他创建了两个初创公司并在软件、视觉系统和政府销售中拥有广泛的运营经验。他也在约翰逊基金会的董事会任职。

trans-unit.source: Luc builds and grows teams, leads innovative Web products and optimizes SEO, SEM, and viral to scale online businesses to reach millions of customers. When he was 21, Luc founded www.travelpod.com, the world’s first travel blogging platform, which was later acquired by TripAdvisor/Expedia. As general manager at Expedia and then at TripAdvisor, Luc led the creation of two award-winning products: TripWow (“WebAward for Outstanding Achievement”—Web Marketing Association) and the Traveler IQ Challenge (Excellence in Social Media – CNMA). Today, he manages a top-notch team of analysts and engineers as VP of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) at TripAdvisor. He's the general manager for several TripAdvisor products like TripWow, the Traveler IQ Challenge, and TravelPod, which was named by PC Magazine as a “Top 100 site you can’t live without”. In addition to advising for HealthTap, Luc also acts as an advisor for several other incubators and high-growth startups, including FounderFuel and BusBud.
trans-unit.target: Luc构建和增强团队，领导创新的网络产品，并优化搜索引擎优化，标准电子组件和病毒来扩展在线业务，以覆盖数百万客户。当他21岁时，Luc创立了www.travelpod.com，这是世界上第一个旅行博客平台，后来被猫途鹰/智游天下收购。作为智游天下的总经理，后来在猫途鹰，Luc领导了两个获奖产品的创建：TripWow (“WebAward卓越成就&rdquo - 网络营销协会)和地理 IQ大挑战（社交媒体卓越—通信网络与制造应用标准）。今天，他作为猫途鹰的副总裁在搜索引擎优化（SEO）方面管理着一个顶级的分析师和工程师团队。他是几个猫途鹰产品的总经理，如TripWow，地理IQ大挑战和TravelPod，它被PC杂志命名为“100强您无法离开的网站”。除了担任 HealthTap的顾问，Luc还是其他几个孵化器和高增长初创公司的顾问，包括FounderFuel和BusBud。

trans-unit.source: Alex is the VP of Growth at Facebook and manages user acquisition and retention, helping drive mobile adoption, self-service advertiser/page admin acquisition, and helping drive other product adoption as required. The channels he uses tend to be: SEO/SEM, email/sms/push notification marketing and onsite merchandising. Alex also manages the internationalization team at Facebook. Prior to Facebook in 2007, Alex spent three years at eBay in email marketing. Alex holds an MSc degree in Physics from the University of Cambridge.
trans-unit.target: Alex是Growth at Facebook的副总裁，管理用户的获取和保留，帮助推动移动应用，自助服务广告客户/网页管理员获取，以及帮助推动其他产品的采用。他使用的渠道往往是：搜索引擎优化/ 标准电子组件，电子邮件/短信/推送通知营销和现场商品销售。Alex还在脸谱网管理国际化团队。在2007年的脸谱网之前，Alex花了三年时间在eBay在电子邮件营销方面。Alex拥有剑桥大学物理学硕士学位。

trans-unit.source: In its current state, our healthcare system is expensive, difficult to access, and error prone. On the brink of a massive reform in healthcare, dedicated, bright entrepreneurs and technologists can bring a great deal to the table by developing creative, forward thinking solutions that leverage health care professionals. HealthTap is at the forefront of this development, improving patient care by creating quick, easy, and affordable access to doctors everywhere. The future of healthcare is at the confluence of big data, smart algorithms, and simple-to-use interfaces that will provide amplification of our MD's resources: HealthTap is breaking ground in all three, and we're excited to help them make their compelling vision a transformative reality.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的状态下，我们的健康医护系统是昂贵的，难以访问，并且容易出错。在医疗保健大规模改革的边缘，专注，聪明的企业家和技术专家可以通过开发利用健康医护专业人士的创新，前瞻性的解决方案，带来很大的好处。HealthTap 处于这一发展的前沿，通过创建快速，轻松，价格实惠的医疗服务，改善患者医护。健康医护的未来是大数据，智能算法和简单易用的接口的融合，将提供我们MD的资源的放大：HealthTap 在所有三个方面都取得突破，我们很高兴能帮助他们使他们令人信服的愿景成为一个变革性的现实。

trans-unit.source: Everyone will soon become the CEO of their own health. HealthTap, with its phenomenal growth in combination with its unique technology, has the potential to become the triaging platform for everyone's health. I am excited to work with the HealthTap team as the company scales to provide people with unparalleled immediate access to the most trusted medical knowledge, doctors, and health services.
trans-unit.target: 每个人都很快就会成为自己健康的CEO。HealthTap, 凭借其独特的技术与其惊人的增长，有可能成为每个人的健康的分类就诊平台。我很高兴与HealthTap 团队一起工作，随着公司规模扩大，为人们提供无与伦比的即时可访问最可信的医学知识，医生和健康服务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has the opportunity to touch everyone on the planet and to become a great enterprise—maximizing both social and economic value. It delivers value for patients, who will gain unprecedented access to doctors; value for doctors, who can treat more people more easily and cost-effectively; and value for society, which has been searching for a long time for a way to solve the healthcare dilemma of rising costs and an aging population. And given its unique and imaginative business model HealthTap is poised to become one of the most profitable businesses in the world. It’s a real game changer.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap有机会接触地球上的每个人，并成为一个伟大的企业 - 最大限度地提高社会和经济价值。它为患者提供价值，他们将获得前所未有的医生访问; 医生的价值，可以更容易地和更具成本效益地治疗更多的人; 还有社会的价值，它一直在寻找一个方法来解决成本上升和人口老龄化的长期的健康医护困境。鉴于其独特的和富有想象力的商业模式HealthTap有望成为世界上最赚钱的企业之一。这是一个真正的改变游戏规则。

trans-unit.source: Mark Leslie at Leslie Ventures
trans-unit.target: Mark Leslie的莱斯利风险投资

trans-unit.source: HealthTap embodies the powerful consumer Internet trend of moving high-value mainstream offline experiences, such as doctor-patient interactions, to the online world. The company leverages the three key innovation drivers that I'm most excited about: mobile apps that enable new kinds of rich, personalized interactions via smartphone and tablet; gamification that enhances user engagement and retention; and social mechanics, such as expert-based Q&A and reputation graphs, that facilitate deep interest and trust. It's this kind of fresh thinking that will accelerate the “consumerization” of healthcare, and re-invigorate an extremely important and valuable industry that has been behind the IT curve and mired in inefficiency for decades.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap体现了强大的消费者互联网趋势，将高价值的主流离线体验（如医生与患者之间的互动）转移到在线世界。公司利用我最激动的三个关键创新驱动因素：通过智能手机和平板电脑实现新型丰富的个性化互动的移动应用程序; 增强用户参与和保留的游戏化; 和如基于专家的问与答和声誉图的社会机制，促进深厚的兴趣和信任。这种新的思维将加速消费化” 的健康医护，并重新激励这个已经由于背后的IT曲线和陷入无效率几十年的一个极其重要和有价值的行业。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is helping define the new field of “Interactive Health”—the sector that is moving consumer health information to new platforms, like smartphones and tablets, to provide portability and immediate access to actionable information. Consumers and physicians are increasingly joining the online conversation, and interactive health deserves the close attention of the investment community. HealthTap demonstrates the potential of this emerging space.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在界定交“交互健康&rdquo的新领域——这个领域正在将消费者的健康信息移向新的平台，比如智能手机和平板电脑，来提供可携带性和即时的信息获取。消费者和医生越来越多地加入在线咨询，互动式健康值得投资界的密切关注。HealthTap展示了这一新兴空间的潜力。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's approach is brilliant. It delivers what people miss about medicine most: a highly engaging personalized experience, with trusted doctors sharing helpful information.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的方法非常出色。它提供了人们最想知道的药物信息：高度个性化的体验，与值得信赖的医生分享有帮助的信息。

trans-unit.source: Mari Baker, Investor, Board of Trustees of Stanford University
trans-unit.target: 斯坦福大学董事会投资者Mari Baker

trans-unit.source: I tend to [invest in] things that are e-commerce, like healthcare. Things that are actually more complex to do and solving a real problem in a big market where there's nobody else doing what HealthTap is doing. What HealthTap is doing is revolutionary.
trans-unit.target: 我倾向于[投资于]电子商务的东西，如健康医护。事实上，在一个没有其他人做HealthTap正在做的事情的大市场上，做更复杂的事情并解决一个真正的问题。HealthTap正在做的是革命性的。

trans-unit.source: Ellen Sebastian
trans-unit.target: Ellen Sebastian

trans-unit.source: I love working at HealthTap! I’ve already worked on several exciting projects on the engineering team. This is the first internship I’ve had where I’m really making a difference. It’s been awesome to work in such a positive environment with other passionate people, while helping to save lives and make people feel good, not to mention the awesome perks like Isaac's/Gagan's chocolate shop. :)
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢在HealthTap工作！我已经在工程团队里从事几个令人兴奋的项目。这是我第一次实习，我真的有所作为。在与其他热情的人一起工作在这样一个积极的环境，同时帮助拯救生命，给人的感觉真的很好，更不用说津津乐道像Isaac’s/Gagan的巧克力店。:)

trans-unit.source: Stanford University
trans-unit.target: 斯坦福大学

trans-unit.source: BS in Computer Science
trans-unit.target: 计算机科学学士

trans-unit.source: Arda Ayvaz
trans-unit.target: Arda Ayvaz

trans-unit.source: Speaking from past experience, a good internship is one where you're empowered to take initiative and be able to make a difference even as an intern in such a short time. In that sense, the internship experience at HealthTap delivered in spades. Very happy to be part of such a great team at such an important time for the company.
trans-unit.target: 从过去的经验来看，这是一个您有权利采取主动的好的实习，是一个能够在这么短的时间内作为实习生有所作为的实习。在这个意义上，坦率的交付HealthTap的实习经验很高兴在这样一个重要的时刻成为如此伟大的一个团队的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Stanford Graduate School of Business
trans-unit.target: 斯坦福商学院研究生院

trans-unit.source: MBA
trans-unit.target: MBA

trans-unit.source: Nat Roth
trans-unit.target: Nat Roth

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is great. The people are friendly and really dedicated to trying to help make the world a healthier place; the problems the team are working on are both technically interesting, and extremely important. I am honored to have had a chance to get to be a part of that environment.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是伟大的。人们是友好的，真正致力于帮助使世界成为一个更健康的地方; 团队正在开发的问题在技术上都很有趣，而且非常重要。我很荣幸能有机会成为这个环境的一部分。

trans-unit.source: B.A.S Classics and Mathematical & Computational Science
trans-unit.target: 经典和数学与计算科学

trans-unit.source: Lachlan Busby
trans-unit.target: Lachlan Busby

trans-unit.source: I have learned so much by interning at HealthTap, not only about engineering but also about having passion for a mission. I have gotten to work on projects that have a direct impact on the product while also being surrounded by people who are always looking towards the bigger picture. It’s been such an amazing experience and I would totally do it all over again.
trans-unit.target: 我通过在HealthTap实习不仅学习了很多，不仅是关于工程，还有对任务的热情。我已经开始工作，对产品有直接影响，同时被总是在寻找更大的前景的人们包围着。这是一个如此惊人的经验，我希望再完全的做一遍。

trans-unit.source: BS Candidate in Computer Science
trans-unit.target: 计算机科学学士候选人

trans-unit.source: Cameron Vanderwall
trans-unit.target: Cameron Vanderwall

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has been amazing so far. I took this internship looking for the "startup experience" and can honestly say I've got it plus much more. There is always something interesting to work on, which makes each day unique and exciting. It has truly been a pleasure working for HealthTap this summer.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap到目前为止是惊人的。我在这个实习期间寻找"初创公司体验" 并可以诚实地说，我学到了很多。总有一些有趣的工作，这使得每一天都不同和令人兴奋。在今年夏天，这真的是很高兴为HealthTap工作。

trans-unit.source: BA in Psychology
trans-unit.target: 心理学学士学位

trans-unit.source: Arthur Brant
trans-unit.target: Arthur Brant

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has been an invaluable experience. The work that the interns are given has been technically challenging and extremely important for the product, for the mission. Everyone is friendly, smart, and extremely hard working.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是一个非常宝贵的经验。实习生的工作在技术上是具有挑战性的，对于产品，对于任务来说都非常重要。每个人都是友好的，聪明的，而且非常努力地工作。

trans-unit.source: BA in Computer Science
trans-unit.target: 计算机科学文学学士

trans-unit.source: Eric Kristensen
trans-unit.target: Eric Kristensen

trans-unit.source: There aren’t many places that you can get an experience like you would at HealthTap. From day one you are empowered to take on projects that make a significant difference and you are expected to achieve those goals but given the support to learn and hone new skills to get there. That would be a fulfilling internship in it of itself but what separates HealthTap is the opportunity to solve challenging and important problems with an incredibly talented and passionate group of people.
trans-unit.target: 没有很多地方，您可以得到一个像您在HealthTap的经验。从第一天起，您有权力承担起有重大意义的项目，并且希望实现这些目标，但是因为支持学习和磨练新的技能来实现这一目标。这将是一个充实的实习，HealthTap是一个机会，解决具有挑战性和重要的问题，成为一个拥有令人难以置信的才华和激情的人。

trans-unit.source: Kellogg School of Management
trans-unit.target: 凯洛格管理学院

trans-unit.source: Tom Picot
trans-unit.target: Tom Picot

trans-unit.source: It's been a pretty amazing learning opportunity to spend a summer at a company filled with talented people, who are driven by a mission to change health care. The internship experience is exactly what I was hoping for - I've really valued the time people have been willing to give me, and the opportunity to have an impact from day one. I unreservedly recommend the internship program!
trans-unit.target: 这是一个非常惊人的学习机会，花一个夏天在一个充满了人才的公司，那些人都是把驱动健康医护的改变作为自己的使命。实习经验正是我所期望的 - 我真的非常珍惜人们愿意给我的时间，并从第一天起就有机会产生影响。我毫无保留地推荐实习计划！

trans-unit.source: Tyler Davis
trans-unit.target: Tyler Davis

trans-unit.source: Working at HealthTap this summer has been a great experience. I immediately jumped into a number of cool projects, which was a little overwhelming at first, but really rewarding and empowering as well. I am learning so much, and the best part has been that I've contributed to real products and projects that will help form the infrastructure of this growing company. The people here are so friendly! And, there's free chocolate.
trans-unit.target: 今年夏天在HealthTap工作是一个伟大的经验。我立即加入一些很酷的项目，虽然一开始有一些压力，但也有真正的奖励和授权。我学习了很多，最好的部分是，我已经贡献真正的产品和项目，这将有助于形成这个成长中的公司的基础设施。这里的人是如此友好！并且，还有免费的巧克力。

trans-unit.source: B.S., Computer Science
trans-unit.target: 计算机科学

trans-unit.source: Arianna Wassmann
trans-unit.target: Arianna Wassmann

trans-unit.source: My time at HealthTap cannot be described as anything less than revolutionary. I have had the privilege of working with brilliant, passionate and innovative people from every field as we all strive to re-design the doctor-patient experience. From challenging projects and meaningful mentorships to balcony lunches and physics-defying chairs, HealthTap has it all. :)
trans-unit.target: 我在HealthTap的时间不能说是革命性的。我有幸与来自各个领域的杰出，热情和创新的人一起工作，我们都努力重新设计医生-患者体验。从挑战性的项目和有意义的导师，阳台午餐和物理辩论椅子，HealthTap有这一切。:)

trans-unit.source: B.S. Biology
trans-unit.target: 学士学位生物学

trans-unit.source: Sidharth Menon
trans-unit.target: Sidharth Menon

trans-unit.source: My internship at HealthTap has not only exposed me to the fabled "startup experience", but also given me the opportunity to be part of a team that aims to change the world. The energy around the office is nothing short of infectious, and I've learned so much in the little time that I've spent here. I can honestly say that I love coming into work every single day.
trans-unit.target: 我在HealthTap的实习不仅让我看到了传说中的"初创公司体验"，而且给予我机会成为一个旨在改变世界的团队的一部分。办公室周围的能量没有传染性，我在这里度过的小时间里学到了很多。我可以诚实地说，我喜欢每天的工作。

trans-unit.source: University of Southern California
trans-unit.target: 南加州大学

trans-unit.source: B.A Biology
trans-unit.target: 生物学文学学士

trans-unit.source: Heather Aholt
trans-unit.target: Heather Aholt

trans-unit.source: There are so many reasons why I'm excited to walk into the HealthTap office every morning. In many internship programs, mentors play a supportive role and teach students a lot. What makes the HealthTap internship program unique, though, is that I have been given some real, important responsibilties and I am therefore able to play a role in the growth of a movement. The people here are energetic and inspiring. Every day, I'm challenged to take charge of a project and see it through to completion. It's so exciting to work at HealthTap!
trans-unit.target: 有很多的原因解释为什么我每天早上进入HealthTap办公室很兴奋。在许多实习计划中，导师扮演支持角色，并教会学生很多。但是，HealthTap实习计划的独特之处在于，我获得了一些真正重要的责任，因此我能够在运动的成长中发挥作用。这里的人是充满活力和受到激励的。每天，我都有责任承担一个项目，并完成任务。在HealthTap工作非常令人兴奋！

trans-unit.source: B.S. in Biology
trans-unit.target: 生物学学士学位

trans-unit.source: Jasmine Wei
trans-unit.target: Jasmine Wei

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has a supportive community, either your boss, colleagues, or people from other groups are happy to provide help at anytime. I've learned a lot every week during my work here, I'm appreciative for the opportunity.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap有一个支持社区，您的老板，同事或其他团体的人都乐意随时提供帮助。我在这里的工作的每一周都学到了很多，我很感激这个机会。

trans-unit.source: MS in Civil Environmental Engineering

trans-unit.source: The excitement about HealthTap Prime, our new special service that connects you and your loved ones with a top doctor via video or text chat anytime, anywhere, has been phenomenal. Real HealthTap users and doctors were so inspired by using HealthTap Prime, they couldn’t wait to share their experiences. “As parents, using HealthTap Prime has really given us peace of mind knowing that we can contact a doctor 24/7,” shared dad Tristen OBrien on %{open_link}Good Morning America%{close_link}.
trans-unit.target: 关于HealthTap Prime已经成为了一种现象的令人兴奋的我们新的特别服务，通过视频或文本聊天，随时随地通过顶级医生连接您和您的亲人。真正的HealthTap用户和医生通过使用HealthTap Prime受到激励，他们想要迫不及待地分享他们的体验。“作为父母，使用HealthTap Prime真的让我们放心，知道我们可以全天24小时与医生联系，”爸爸Tristen OBrien对%{open_link}早安美国%{close_link}的分享。

trans-unit.source: If you’d like more information on how you might participate in these media interviews to inspire more caring doctors and help more people like you, please %{open_link}share details of your story here%{close_link} or email us at stories@healthtap.com with the best way to reach you. There are no associated costs, and if there are any travel expenses, we’ll cover them for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想了解更多关于如何参与这些媒体采访以鼓励更多关心的医生，并帮助更多像您一样的人，请选择您最方便的方式，在这里%{close_link}分享您的故事%{open_link}或发送电子邮件到我们stories@healthtap.com没有相关的费用，如果有任何旅行费用，我们将为您解决。

trans-unit.source: Congratulations on your pregnancy and thank you for taking us with you on this exciting journey. Pregnancy can come with many questions, and we’re here to answer them every step of the way. We’re delighted to offer you a %{open_link}free trial of HealthTap Prime%{close_link}, our new special service that connects you and your loved ones with a top doctor via video or text chat anytime, anywhere. You too can get doctor advice, prescriptions and even reminders from top doctors right from your mobile device or personal computer.
trans-unit.target: 恭喜您怀孕了，并感谢您与我们一起分享这个激动人心的旅程。怀孕可以带来许多问题，我们在这里回答它们的每一步的问题。我们很高兴给您提供%{open_link}HealthTap Prime的免费试用%{close_link}, 我们的新的特别服务，将随时随地连接您和您的亲人与顶级医生通过视频或文本聊天。您也可以从您的移动设备或个人计算机获得来自顶级医生的建议，处方，甚至是提醒。

trans-unit.source: Have a question about your prenatal care or test results? Need advice on preparing for labor? Talk to a doctor live now!
trans-unit.target: 有关于您的产前医护或检验结果的问题？需要有关准备劳动的建议？立刻与医生交谈！

trans-unit.source: Congratulations on completing a checklist for your health goal! You’ve just taken a huge step towards living a happier, healthier life and we hope you’re feeling good.
trans-unit.target: 恭喜您完成了您的健康目标的清单！您已朝着一个更快乐，更健康的生活迈出了巨大的一步，我们希望您feel good。

trans-unit.source: We’re delighted to offer you a %{open_link}free trial of HealthTap Prime%{close_link}, our new special service that connects you and your loved ones with a top doctor via video or text chat anytime, anywhere. You too can get doctor advice, prescriptions and even reminders from top doctors right from your mobile device or personal computer.

trans-unit.source: I came across HealthTap when I was short of breath. I was suffering with lower back pain and HealthTap doctors said it could be a collapsed lung. Seeing this, naturally I was worried. I called 911 and was transported to the emergency room. I was released 2 days ago & I'm healing nicely..thanx 2 ur website...you saved my life! I thank you from the bottom of my heart :-)
trans-unit.target: 当我呼吸短促时，我碰到了HealthTap。我患有腰痛，HealthTap医生说可能是肺功能衰竭。看到这一点，我自然很担心我拨打了911，被送到急诊室。我被释放2天前和我正在愈合..thanx 2 ur网站...您挽救了我的生命！我从心底感谢您 :-)

trans-unit.source: Be easy to understand: Questions must be in English, easy to understand, and about health or wellness topics.
trans-unit.target: 易于理解：问题必须用英语，易于理解，以及关于健康或健康话题。

trans-unit.source: Check spelling of words and medicines: Medications in different countries use different names, so be sure to include the generic name of the medication. Our experts are U.S.-licensed doctors and rarely answer questions about uniquely foreign medications they are not familiar with, or about hospitals or procedures in other countries that they have not visited.
trans-unit.target: 检查单词和药物的拼写：不同国家/地区的药物使用不同的名称，因此请务必包含药物的通用名称。我们的专家是拥有美国执业执照的医生，很少回答关于他们不熟悉的国外独特的药物，或他们没有访问的其他国家的医院或临床操作的问题。

trans-unit.target: 开始您的免费试用

trans-unit.target: 使用电脑或任何移动设备24/7全天候与医生无限咨询！

trans-unit.source: Total peace of mind with a doctor always "on call" for you and your loved ones
trans-unit.target: 完全放心的为您和您的亲人经常与“随传随到”的医生

trans-unit.source: Prescriptions, referrals, and more
trans-unit.target: 处方，转诊等

trans-unit.source: Ask meaningful questions: Questions must include enough detail to be meaningful and answerable. Naming a topic (for example, “headache?”) without asking something specific, doesn,t give the doctor enough information to accurately answer. You can consider mentioning gender, duration, age range, or body area affected.
trans-unit.target: 询问有意义的问题：问题必须包含足够有意义的和有责任的详细信息。命名一个话题（例如，“头痛？”）而不询问具体的东西，不给医生准确地回答的足够信息。您可以考虑提到有影响的性别，持续时间，年龄范围或身体区域。

trans-unit.source: Stay private: Do not include your name, names of other people, or doctors, names.
trans-unit.target: 保持私密：不要包括您的姓名，其他人的姓名或医生，姓名。

trans-unit.source: We know you’ve been waiting a while for an answer to your question, and we’d like to thank you for your patience. We also want to let you know that not all questions on HealthTap receive answers. A question is likely to go unanswered if it lacks detail, if the question is unclear, or if it contains terms with which the doctors are not familiar. Your question is much more likely to receive a response if you improve it by editing and resubmitting it.
trans-unit.target: 我们知道，为了您问题的回答，您已经等待了一段时间，我们要感谢您的耐心等待。我们也想让您知道不是所有在HealthTap的问题都能得到回答。如果一个问题不详细，问题不清楚，或者如果包含了医生不熟悉的术语，那么这个问题可能不会得到答复。如果您通过编辑以及重新提交来改进问题，您的问题很可能会收到回复。

trans-unit.source: If you’d like to get your question answered faster, you can also become a HealthTap Prime subscriber for priority status in receiving answers. Being a HealthTap Prime subscriber also gives you unlimited real-time video or audio Virtual Consults with top doctors so you can ask your question of a doctor personally.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想更快地得到您问题的回答，您也可以成为一个在接收回答时是优先级状态的HealthTap Prime订购户。作为HealthTap Prime订购者还为您提供与顶级的医生无限的实时视频或音频在线咨询，所以您可以当面向医生提出您的问题。

trans-unit.source: We encourage you to look around HealthTap+ at other questions, tips, checklists, and relevant information, and use it to improve your question. With our huge database of questions and health topics, chances are you’ll find similar questions that have the answer you’re looking for.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议您在HealthTap +查看其他问题，小贴士，清单和相关信息，并使用它来改进您的问题。有了我们庞大的问题和健康话题的数据库，您会发现您正在寻找的类似问题的回答。

trans-unit.source: We know you've been waiting a while for an answer to your question, and we'd like to thank you for your patience. Unfortunately, we had to remove your question from consideration at this time. Not all questions on HealthTap receive answers. A question is likely to go unanswered if it lacks sufficient detail, if the question is unclear to our doctors, or if it contains terms with which the doctors are not familiar. Your question unfortunately fell into this category.
trans-unit.target: 我们知道，为了您问题的回答，您已经等待了一段时间，我们要感谢您的耐心等待。很抱歉，我们必须在此时删除您的问题。在HealthTap上不是所有问题都能得到回答。如果问题不够详细，如果我们的医生不清楚问题内容，或者如果问题涉及到含医生不熟悉的术语，则问题可能不会得到答复。不幸的是，您的问题属于这个类别。

trans-unit.source: Our doctors are working on an even higher volume than usual inflow of questions. We know you’re eager for an answer—so we encourage you to take one of the following actions to get a helpful answer from a top doctor faster:
trans-unit.target: 我们的医生正在处理比平时更多的问题。我们知道您渴望得到回答—因此我们建议您采取以下行动之一，以便更快地获得顶级医生的有帮助的回答：

trans-unit.source: Become a HealthTap Prime subscriber
trans-unit.target: 成为一个HealthTap Prime订购者

trans-unit.source: If you’d like to get your question answered more quickly, you can become a HealthTap Prime subscriber for priority status in receiving answers. Being a HealthTap Prime subscriber also gives you unlimited real-time video or audio consults with top doctors so you can ask your question of a doctor personally.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想更快地得到您问题的回答，您可以成为一个在接收回答时是优先级状态的HealthTap Prime订购者。作为HealthTap Prime订购者还为您提供与顶级的医生无限的实时视频或音频咨询，所以您可以当面向医生提出您的问题。

trans-unit.source: Review similar content

trans-unit.source: With our huge database of millions of questions and answers from leading doctors, chances are good that you can find similar questions to yours—questions that already have great answers that were even peer reviewed by other doctors!

trans-unit.source: Virtual Consults are great for treating non-urgent symptoms, learning more about a condition or treatment, getting prescriptions — when your doctor is unavailable or when you want a second opinion. Virtual Consults are for primary care, and are not available for specialty care.

trans-unit.source: It seems you started a Virtual Consult%{name} but it ended after a very brief amount of time. Our goal is one hundred percent patient satisfaction, and we want to be sure you receive the care you need.

trans-unit.source: We’re delighted that your virtual consult with %{expert} was a success! Having a primary care doctor on call, 24/7 provides a level of care unlike any other service. trans-unit.source: True Wealth Through Sharing:
trans-unit.target: 真正的财富分享：

trans-unit.source: I am so thrilled that I am part of your Heath Tap consultant group because you have given me the opportunity to share my unique combination of knowledge and experience as a retired US Air Force Colonel medical officer with experience in general surgery, aerospace medicine, cancer medicine, emergency medicine, and anatomic and clinical pathology.
trans-unit.target: 作为您Heath Tap顾问团队的一部分，我非常激动，因为您让我有机会分享我作为退休的美国空军上校医生，在普通外科，航空航天医学，癌症医学 ，急诊医学，解剖和临床病理学上，独特的知识和经验的结合。

trans-unit.source: This is our chance as physicians to create true wealth by sharing our knowledge and experience with those who seek elucidations of different illnesses and comfort in their inner selves before proceeding in making their own difficult decisions on what to do next. We are all humans helping humanity and that is why we are physicians who offer comfort and who are always willing to heal the very sick and the least fortunate in life, and making certain to do no harm to anybody, anywhere, anytime.
trans-unit.target: 这是我们作为医生，通过分享我们的知识和经验给那些，就下一步做什么很难做出决定的，寻求澄清在自己内部不同的疾病和舒适的人，来创造真正的财富机会。这是我们作为医生，通过分享我们的知识和经验给那些，就下一步做什么很难做出决定的，寻求澄清在自己内部不同的疾病和舒适的人，来创造真正的财富机会。

trans-unit.source: This is Dr. Geoff Rutledge, the Chief Medical Officer at HealthTap. I'd like to personally offer you a benefits solution that will significantly reduce healthcare costs for your clients, deliver peace of mind for their employees, and strengthen your customer relationships. Our award-winning approach is already delighting hundreds of millions of people across the world and rapidly displacing traditional telemedicine offerings within dozens of Fortune 500 companies. Today, we are offering this proven solution to you at an unprecedented value that will help you make more money and retain your book of business.
trans-unit.target: 这是HealthTap的首席医务官Geoff Rutledge医生我想亲自为您提供一个福利解决方案，这个方案将显着降低您客户的健康医护成本，让他们的员工放心，并加强您的客户关系。我们获奖的方法已经使全世界数亿人感到愉快，并迅速取代了数十家财富500强公司的传统远程医疗产品。今天，我们以一个前所未有的价值为您提供这个成熟的解决方案，它将帮助您赚更多的钱，并保留您的业务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a Silicon Valley based company that is revolutionizing healthcare by providing individuals with immediate access to personalized information and guidance from over 71,000 highly qualified doctors with over 20 years of experience on average. We are the World Economic Forum Technology Pioneer of 2016, joining the ranks of past winners like Google, Twitter, AirBnB and Uber. Other recent accolades include:

trans-unit.source: You may have heard that the very first case of Ebola in the U.S. was diagnosed in Texas last week. HealthTap doctors are ready and willing to help with any questions you have, including information about early symptoms and how the virus spreads. With HealthTap Prime you don’t need to schedule and wait for an appointment, or even leave your home; connect immediately with a doctor on HealthTap Prime, and get the peace of mind that you and your family are safe.
trans-unit.target: 您可能已经听说，美国的第一例埃博拉病毒，上周在德克萨斯被确诊。HealthTap医生已经准备好并愿意帮助您的任何问题，包括关于早期症状和病毒如何传播的信息。使用HealthTap Prime您不需要安排和等待预约，甚至离开您的家; 您可以立即与HealthTap Prime的医生取得联系，让您和您的家人安全无忧。

trans-unit.source: The all new HealthTap Prime is the revolutionary service that gives you unlimited Virtual Consults with top primary-care doctors 24/7 from anywhere, via HD video or text chats. Ask any question, get a prescription refill, and even receive a second opinion about your health and well-being, right from any computer or mobile device.
trans-unit.target: 所有全新的HealthTap Prime是革命性的服务，通过高清视频或文本聊天随时随地为您提供无限的，与顶级普通门诊医生的全天24小时在线咨询。您可以询问任何问题，获得再配方处方，甚至从任何计算机或移动设备收到关于您健康和幸福的第二意见。
