trans-unit.source: Thanks very much for your question. There are quite a few questions similar to yours that the medical experts on HealthTap answered, so I put those answers together for you on one page here: %{url}. I think you will find your answer there,plus many answers on related questions. If this isn't a complete answer for you, I encourage you to ask a followup question. Warm regards, Geoff
trans-unit.target: 非常感谢您的问题！有很多问题类似于您的在HealthTap上的医学专家回答的，所以我把这些回答一起总结在了这个页面：%{url}.我想您会在那里找到您的回答，以及许多关于相关问题的回答。如果这为您不是一个完整的回答，我鼓励您询问一个后续问题。温暖的问候，Geoff

trans-unit.source: Welcome to HealthTap! Congrats on taking a leap forward on your health journey! To get started, search for a health question, doctor, or interest.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到HealthTap！恭喜您迈向健康之旅！开始，请搜索健康问题，医生或兴趣。

trans-unit.source: Did you know that you can send images, test results and documents using our HIPAA-secure conversations? Try it now.
trans-unit.target: 您知道吗，您可以使用我们的HIPAA安全对话发送图像，检验结果和文件？立刻尝试。

trans-unit.source: Connect with doctors! Search using any keywords in our 1-Million-Doctor Directory and request an appointment from the doctor's Virtual Practice. Connect today.
trans-unit.target: 与医生联系！在我们的1百万医生目录中使用使用任何关键字搜索，并请求医生的在线诊疗。立刻连接。

trans-unit.source: Your Health Activity and Profile are powerful tools for engaging with your health. Update your profile.
trans-unit.target: 您的健康活动和个人资料是参与您健康的强大的工具。更新您的个人资料。

trans-unit.source: Happy birthday from all of us at HealthTap! Here's wishing you the best of health this year.
trans-unit.target: 来自在HealthTap上的所有人祝您生日快乐！这这里祝您今年身体健康。

trans-unit.source: A free second opinion! A question you've answered was just answered again. Read the answer.

trans-unit.source: We are delighted to provide you with a free opportunity to learn from your trusted colleagues by asking for a curbside consult. However, to better serve you and support the community of patients everywhere, we limit the number of consults to three per day. Please try again tomorrow.
trans-unit.target: 我们很高兴为您提供向您信任的同事免费学习路边咨询的机会。然而，为了更好地为您服务和帮助社区的每一位患者，我们限制每天的咨询人数为三人。请明天再次尝试。

trans-unit.source: Thank you and Happy Thanksgiving! In the spirit of the Holidays, I’m delighted to send you a note of gratitude for sharing your knowledge on HealthTap. Thank you for helping me and so many others everywhere live healthier, happier lives.

trans-unit.source: from Query-to-Cure
trans-unit.target: 从询问到治愈

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is an international award-winning service, recognized by the World Economic Forum as a Technology Pioneer 2015 and by the 2015 Webby Awards as the best Health & Fitness website and app. Press coverage has included The New York Times, Forbes, TIME, San Francisco Chronicle, CNN, and TechCrunch.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是一项享誉国际的一流服务，被世界经济论坛评为2015年技术先锋，作为最佳健康和健身网站及应用程序获得2015年威比奖。媒体的报道，包括纽约时报、福布斯、时代杂志、旧金山纪事、美国有线电视新闻网和科技博客。

trans-unit.source: SmartHealth offers an opportunity for Waikato's health professionals to provide unparalleled service to our community. We can provide patients and their families with care where and when they need it. Better, sooner and more convenient at its best. I can’t wait to get started!
trans-unit.target: SmartHealth为Waikato的健康专业人员提供了为我们的社区提供无与伦比的服务的机会。我们可以为需要的患者及其家人随时随地提供医护。尽全力做到更好，更快和更方便。我迫不及待要开始啦！

trans-unit.source: Virtual healthcare removes the boundaries of bricks and mortar that are placed upon the patient in our current hospital dependant environments. HealthTap technology provides us with an exciting new way to communicate with our patients to provide care that is patient focused in a better, faster and more convenient way.
trans-unit.target: 在线健康医护消除了我们目前在医院依赖环境中与患者之间的障碍。HealthTap技术为我们提供了一个令人兴奋的与患者沟通并提供医护的新方式，即将患者以更好、更快、更方便的方式集中。

trans-unit.source: I am finding SmartHealth really helpful as I can go on the site to do peer review or CME and I have been able to ask colleagues for advice which has prevented me having to refer a patient to the hospital. GPs will find HealthTap really useful and I see great benefits for patients.
trans-unit.target: 我发现Smarthealth真的很有帮助，因为我可以在网站上做同行评审或CME，我能够征求同事意见，选择将患者送往哪家医院。普通医生会发现HealthTap 真的很有帮助并且我见证了为患者的巨大好处。

trans-unit.source: It was extremely helpful for me. My mom accidentally took the wrong medication late one night. I tried calling my family doctor, who did not pick my call. I didn’t know what to do, but suddenly remembered this application. I clicked “Talk to a doctor,” and HealthTap immediately connected me to a doctor. We talked about what happened, and he helped me with first aid and sent me a to-do list for more help. It was extremely helpful at midnight, when I couldn't get any doctor help. It also helped me understand other health issues and benefits suggested by many other doctors. I recommend our employees use this application
trans-unit.target: 这对我来说是非常有帮助的。我妈妈昨晚不小心吃错药了。我尝试联系我的家庭医生，但他并没有接我的电话。我不知道该怎么办，但突然想起这个软件。我点击了“与医生交谈”，HealthTap立刻为我联系了一位医生。我们谈论了发生的事情，他帮我做了急救，给我发了一份待办事项清单以获得更多帮助。HealthTap在午夜，当我不能得到任何医生的帮助时，它很帮助。它还帮助我了解其他健康问题和其他医生的建议。我建议我们的员工使用这个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: I am very thankful to be part of this Flex family. Post-flood, we were in the process of cleaning our house, which took more than 1-2 weeks. My wife has been carrying twins, and she was in her second trimester. She had sudden onset of pain and continuous vomiting early in the morning. I was left with very few options to get her to hospital. Fortunately, HealthTap helped me at that time. Dr. Radwan assisted me by virtually checking my wife’s condition and giving appropriate advice, which saved us. Particularly, his personal attention towards our concern and his detailed explanation on the treatment plan was very much appreciated.
trans-unit.target: 我非常感谢成为Flex家庭的一员。洪水过后，我们在打扫房子的过程中，花了1-2周时间。我妻子怀着双胞胎，她在妊娠中期。清晨她突然出现疼痛和持续呕吐.。我几乎没有办法带她去医院。幸运的是，HealthTap在那时帮助了我。Radwan医生在线帮助我检查我妻子的状况并给出适当的建议，这救了我们。特别是他个人对我们的情况的关心以及他详细的治疗方案非常值得赞赏。

trans-unit.source: We have thousands of employees in Chennai, and providing each with care and support during natural disasters is a top priority with Flex. Thanks to HealthTap, our employees were able to immediately access high-quality health and medical information.
trans-unit.target: 我们在金奈有数千名员工，在自然灾害中提供医护和支持的首选就是Flex。感谢HealthTap，我们的员工能够立即获得高质量的健康和医疗信息。

trans-unit.source: I woke up in the middle of the night with severe abdominal cramps and immediately did a HealthTap Prime consult. The doctor calmed me down, told me to take ibuprofen, and recommended a treatment plan. I'm now fully recovered and incredibly grateful to have had access to a caring, intelligent doctor in the middle of the night without the cost and agony of an ER visit.
trans-unit.target: 伴随着严重的腹部绞痛，我在半夜惊醒了，我立即进行了一次HealthTap Prime咨询。医生让我冷静下来，让我服用了布洛芬，并为我给出了治疗计划。我现在已经完全康复，非常感谢能够在大半夜的时候无需费时费力前往急诊室就能够获得一名既聪明又有爱心的医生的帮助。

trans-unit.source: Wonderful interface to speak directly face to face with patients, provide them a database of expert answers to health questions, and ongoing coaching for health and wellness through checklists.
trans-unit.target: 与患者直接面对面的精彩的界面，为他们提供一个专家回答健康问题的数据库，并通过清单不断进行健康与保健指导。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap isn’t just a fantastic source of diagnosis and treatment advice. You really do feel the sense of support and a feeling of trust. The fact that you can privately seek professional advice using various methods of communication is without doubt an amazing feature. This is a breath of fresh air and very much appreciated by all my family and me. Everyone would benefit by using HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不仅仅是一个神奇的诊断和治疗建议的来源。您真正的感受到了支持与信任。事实上，您可以通过各种沟通方式私下寻求专业意见，这无疑是一个惊人的特点。这是一股清新的空气，我和我的家人都非常感激.。每个使用HealthTap的人都能获益。

trans-unit.source: Me levanté a medianoche con cólicos abdominales terribles y enseguida hice una consulta en HealthTap. Estaba super preocupada, pero el doctor me tranquilizo y me dijo que tomara ibuprofeno y programara un examen pélvico cuyo ultrasonido diagnosticó un quiste dermoide de 8 cm en mi ovario izquierdo. Enseguida tuve que ir a cirugía. Ahora me encuentro completamente recuperada y estoy increíblemente agradecida por haber tenido acceso a un doctor atento e inteligente a la mitad de la noche.
trans-unit.target: Me levanté a medianoche con cólicos abdominales terribles y enseguida hice una consulta en HealthTap.Estaba super preocupada, pero el doctor me tranquilizo y me dijo que tomara ibuprofeno y programara un examen pélvico cuyo ultrasonido diagnosticó un quiste dermoide de 8 cm en mi ovario izquierdo.Enseguida tuve que ir a cirugía.Ahora me encuentro completamente recuperada y estoy increíblemente agradecida por haber tenido acceso a un doctor atento e inteligente a la mitad de la noche.

trans-unit.source: saber que puedo preguntar cualquier cosa y aprender si es un asunto importante o algo de lo que no me tengo que preocupar.
trans-unit.target: saber que puedo preguntar cualquier cosa y aprender si es un asunto importante o algo de lo que no me tengo que preocupar.

trans-unit.source: Neló
trans-unit.target: Neló

trans-unit.source: Mi historia empezó cuando me detectaron colitis ulcerativa. A menudo buscaba información acerca de lo que no sabía. Me preocupaba y me avergonzaba hablar de mi condición con el doctor y gracias a HealthTap, me ha ayudado a obtener respuestas a mis preguntas. Quiero agradecer a los doctores de HealthTap quienes han sido inmensamente amables respondiendo mis preguntas. Sin ellos, aun estaria buscando.
trans-unit.target: Mi historia empezó cuando me detectaron colitis ulcerativa.A menudo buscaba información acerca de lo que no sabía.Me preocupaba y me avergonzaba hablar de mi condición con el doctor y gracias a HealthTap, me ha ayudado a obtener respuestas a mis preguntas.Quiero agradecer a los doctores de HealthTap quienes han sido inmensamente amables respondiendo mis preguntas.Sin ellos, aun estaria buscando.

trans-unit.source: Richie
trans-unit.target: Richie

trans-unit.source: I suffer from anxiety/panic attacks and frequently ask questions about every little thing wrong with me. This app and doctors have saved me from going insane and tons of unneeded bills. I am currently getting help and medication from a doctor’s recommendation and made some progress. I’m so happy for this application, the doctors, and support—knowing I can ask anything and learn if it’s life threatening or just nothing to worry about.
trans-unit.target: 对于被频繁地问及我的每一个小毛病，我总是会感到焦虑/恐惧。这款应用程序及其医生为大大地节省了不必要的开支。我现在可以通过医生的建议获取帮助和药物，并正逐渐好转。我对这款应用程序、他们的医生以及支持感到满意——我可以提出任何问题、了解某种症状是否会危机生命、或者无需过分担忧。

trans-unit.source: I woke up in the middle of the night with severe abdominal cramps and immediately did a HealthTap consult. I was really worried, but the doctor calmed me down and told me to take ibuprofen and schedule a pelvic exam, which led to an ultrasound that diagnosed an 8 cm dermoid cyst on my left ovary. I had to have surgery ASAP. I'm now fully recovered, and I'm incredibly grateful to have had access to a caring, intelligent doctor in the middle of the night.
trans-unit.target: 伴随着严重的腹部绞痛，我在半夜惊醒了，我立即进行了一次HealthTap咨询。我相当担忧，但医生让我冷静下来，让我服用了布洛芬，并为我制定了盆腔检查计划，即进行一次超声波检查，结果发现在我的左卵巢存在着一个8厘米的囊肿。我必须马上接受手术。我现在已经完全康复，非常感谢能够在大半夜的时候获得一名既聪明又有爱心的医生的帮助。

trans-unit.source: Nel
trans-unit.target: Nel

trans-unit.source: My story started when I found out I had Ulcerative Colitis. I was searching for information that I didn't know about. I was afraid and some what embarrassed to ask my doctor, and using HealthTap has helped me answer those questions. I want to thank the doctors from HealthTap who have been greatly kind by answering my questions. Without them, I would still be looking.
trans-unit.target: 我的故事开始于我发现我患有溃疡性结肠炎。我在搜索我不知道的信息。我害怕并且不好意思咨询我的医生，所以我使用HealthTap帮助我回答这些问题。我要感谢HealthTap的医生如此体贴地回答我的问题。没有他们，我将仍然在搜索。

trans-unit.source: Dr. Pearle Partial Knee Replacement
trans-unit.target: Pearle医生局部膝关节置换术

trans-unit.source: 3. Find out if you qualify
trans-unit.target: 3.检查您自己是否合格

trans-unit.source: Obtain An Evaluation Now
trans-unit.target: 现在可以得到一个评估

trans-unit.source: Living with Knee Pain and Considering Total Knee Replacement? Know your alternatives — less invasive knee resurfacing procedures exist and you may be a candidate! You can be evaluated by Dr Andrew Pearle, an international expert in knee surgery, to help determine which approach may be appropriate for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果一直感觉到膝盖痛，或许可以考虑一下全膝关节置换术？了解您的其他选择——存在微创膝盖重修的临床操作，所以您可以选择这个方法！Andrew Pearle医生是一个做膝关节手术国际专家，您可以从他那里获得最适合您的治疗方案。

trans-unit.source: Jul 2010
HealthTap gets a home: 575 High St.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap找到一个家：575大街

trans-unit.source: After several months at HealthTap's first headquarters (Ron Gutman's whiteboard-equipped home office), we opened our doors at 575 High Street in a Palo Alto office suite formerly occupied by the FBI. It was a suitable location for top secret development work. There we created the new concept of Interactive Health.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap的第一个总部（Ron Gutman的白板配备的家庭办公室）工作了几个月后，我们在之前被联邦调查局占用的位于Palo Alto办公室的575大街开始了办公室。这是一个合适的位置用于绝密开发工作。在那里，我们创造了互动健康的新概念。

trans-unit.source: Sep 2010
The first ever Hacking 4 Health
trans-unit.target: 第一次Hacking 4 Health

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hosts the first ever health data-specific Hackathon with support from the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS), the HHS CTO, and HealthTap fan Todd Park. Hundreds participated and 35 teams created 18 apps in less than 24 hours.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在卫生和人力服务部(HHS)，HHS CTO和HealthTap粉丝Todd Park的支持下，承载了第一个关于健康数据的Hackathon。数百名参加者和35个小组在2不到24小时创造了18个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Dec 2010
Giving back for the holidays
trans-unit.target: 回馈假期

trans-unit.source: Private Beta Launch
trans-unit.target: 私人检验版发布

trans-unit.source: We opened our doors to a limited audience of new moms and expecting women at the end of 2010. After previewing technology to investors in Nov, we started with hand-picked users in late 2010 and received immediate, positive, and validating feedback.
trans-unit.target: 我们在2010年年底向有限的新妈妈和期待女性的人们敞开大门。在11月向投资者预览技术后，我们在2010年年底开始与精选的用户进行即时，积极和有效的反馈。

trans-unit.source: Jan 2011
Planning the future
trans-unit.target: 计划未来

trans-unit.source: Following months of intense work to release HealthTap to our Beta community, we gathered for our first annual planning retreat to set our goals for 2011. The retreat helped spark many new ideas and established a roadmap and metrics for success.
trans-unit.target: 经过数月的紧张工作发布HealthTap到我们的检验社区，我们聚集了我们的第一次年度规划休假，以制定我们2011年的目标。休假引发了许多新的想法，并建立了成功的路线图和指标。

trans-unit.source: Hello, Dr. Tappy!
trans-unit.target: 您好，Tappy医生！

trans-unit.source: We care about care and positivity. Dr. Tappy, the smiling image of the helpful physician, was created and immediately became an integral part of the HealthTap experience. Always helpful and happy, Dr. Tappy symbolizes HealthTap's dedication to providing the best, most reliable, health information to everyone at all times.
trans-unit.target: 我们关心医护和积极性。Tappy医生，作为有帮助的医生的微笑形象代表，被创建并立即成为HealthTap体验的一个组成部分。Tappy医生象征着HealthTap致力于提供最好，最可靠的健康信息，随时为所有人提供帮助和快乐。

trans-unit.source: Feb 2011
:) we're on TED!
trans-unit.target: :) 我们在TED!

trans-unit.source: HealthTap CEO and Founder Ron Gutman's TED talk on the "Hidden Powers of Smiling" created buzz at the 2011 conference, but the ultimate success of the talk came when it was released online. Today, the talk has been viewed by millions, translated into more than 50 languages by enthusiastic viewers across the world and published as a TED book.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap 首席执行官兼创始人Ron Gutman在TED"微笑的隐藏力量"的演讲在2011年会议上创造了一个热点，但是在网上发布后获得最终成功。今天，这场演讲已被数百万人观看，被世界各地热心的观众翻译成50多种语言，并作为TED图书出版。

trans-unit.source: Walking healthy
trans-unit.target: 健康行走

trans-unit.source: Cool consumer health projects come with even cooler swag! Introducing the HealthTap shoe – if you see them on someone's feet, say hi!
trans-unit.target: 冷酷消费者健康项目带有更冷酷的行囊！介绍HealthTap鞋子 - 如果您看到他们在某人的脚上，说您好！

trans-unit.source: Mar 2011
Angel funding announced
trans-unit.target: 宣布天使投资

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's angels include some of the best and brightest company builders in Silicon Valley and beyond. Their backing of our shared vision enables us to create the HealthTap you see today. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的天使投资者包括一些在硅谷和其他地区最好和最聪明的公司建设者。他们支持我们的共同愿景，使我们能够创建您今天看到的HealthTap。阅读 文章 ›

trans-unit.source: The first Interactive Health Symposium
trans-unit.target: 第一届互动健康研讨会

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hosted the first Interactive Health Symposium right in our office, attracting physician participants from across the state. The symposium created the foundation for a robust, ongoing dialogue between HealthTap and the physician community about the innovations most needed in healthcare today.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在我们的办公室举办了第一次互动健康研讨会，吸引了来自全州的医生参与其中。该研讨会为HealthTap和医生社区之间关于当今健康医护最需要的创新的健康，持续对话奠定了基础。

trans-unit.source: Rocking Interactive Health at SXSW
trans-unit.target: 在SXSW摇摆互动健康

trans-unit.source: HealthTap led in health innovation at the South by Southwest Interactive conference. Paving the way for a strong health presence at this important gathering, we hosted an interactive health meet-up to connect innovators, as well as a major gathering for the entire SXSW health community.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap领导了南方的卫生创新西南交互会议。为在这个重要的聚会上强有力的卫生存在铺平了道路，我们主办了一个互动的卫生会议，以连接创新者，并为整个SXSW卫生界举办一个重要的聚会。

trans-unit.source: Our First Expert Answer
trans-unit.target: Our First Expert Answer

trans-unit.source: The first response to an inquiry on HealthTap came from a New Jersey pediatrician, Dr. Anatoloy Belilovsky, who answered the question: "Should I be concerned about my baby's previous vaccinations?"
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap调查的第一个回复来自新泽西州的儿科医生Anatoloy Belilovsky医生，他回答了这个问题："我应该关心我宝宝以前的疫苗接种吗？"

trans-unit.source: Apr 2011
Public beta launch
trans-unit.target: 公开检验版发布

trans-unit.source: Following our Beta launch, we opened our virtual doors to the public on Apr 19, 2011, revealing to the world our labor of love. Press included praise in TIME and Forbes, among other national publications.
trans-unit.target: 在检验版发布后，我们于2011年4月19日向公众开放了在线入口，向世界展示了我们的爱的劳动。新闻稿包括在时代和福布斯和其它国家出版物的赞扬。

trans-unit.source: Our first member
trans-unit.target: 我们的第一位会员

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's first member outside of our invited Beta group signs up. The immediate adoption of our service by consumers around the country soon leads to users from other countries as well.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的第一个会员在我们邀请的检验组之外注册。全国消费者立即采用我们的服务很快也会引来来自其他国家的用户。

trans-unit.source: May 2011
One thousand doctors!
trans-unit.target: 一千位医生！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap proudly sponsors TEDx Silicon Valley, the most widely viewed TEDx event in the world, with live streaming audiences in 50 countries and more than 330,000 global views. The event, themed "Living by Numbers," focused on how numbers can impact and improve our daily lives and featured speakers like Chris Anderson, Mitch Kapor, and Tim O'Reilly.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap自豪地赞助TEDx硅谷，这是世界上观看次数最多的TEDx活动，在50个国家有实时观众流，超过33万个全球观点。该活动，话题为"数字生活"关注数字如何影响和改善我们的日常生活和特色的演讲者，如Chris Anderson, Mitch Kapor, 和Tim O'Reilly。

trans-unit.source: June 2011
First internship class
trans-unit.target: 第一届实习班

trans-unit.source: Who better to share our first-hand experience in a growing start-up, building a world-class company, than top students from Stanford and beyond? HealthTap's Internship program is designed to provide a memorable educational experience to students interested in health technology and product development.
trans-unit.target: 谁最好分享我们在一个成长初创企业的第一手经验，建立一个世界级的公司，而不是斯坦福大学和其他顶级学生？HealthTap的实习计划旨在为对健康技术和产品开发感兴趣的学生提供难忘的教育体验。

trans-unit.source: Jul 2011
We've moved! 101 University
trans-unit.target: 我们搬家了！101大学

trans-unit.source: A heated battle for conference room space marked the end of our tenure at our first offices in 575 High Street. We moved on up to an even better location - the former Facebook offices at 101 University Ave, Suite 100, right across from the Cal Train station in the hear of Palo Alto.
trans-unit.target: 会议室空间的激烈争夺标志着我们在575大街的第一个办公室的使用结束。我们搬到了以前的Facebook办公室，在一个更好的位置 - 101大学大道，套房100，在Calo火车站，帕洛阿尔托的中心对面。

trans-unit.source: Gift horses
trans-unit.target: 礼物马

trans-unit.source: Working with and learning from horses was just one of the many benefits of a day celebrating our launch with a retreat in the wine country near Los Gatos. The event also included horseback riding and other equestrian activities.
trans-unit.target: 使用和学习马只是一个庆祝我们发布与骑马休假的一天的许多福利之一，在洛杉矶加托斯附近的葡萄酒乡休假。。活动还包括骑马和其他马术活动。

trans-unit.source: Sep 2011
Mobile launch
trans-unit.target: 移动端发布

trans-unit.source: "5,000 doctors, at your fingertips – at home or on the go" became the motto at launch for the new HealthTap Express App. Together with the physician-facing application (HealthTap Express MD), HealthTap's core Q&A functionality was captured in a novel and engaging mobile app.
trans-unit.target: "5000名医生，就在您的指尖 – 在家里或在旅行中"成为新的HealthTapExpress应用程序发布的座右铭。加上面向医生的应用程序(HealthTap Express MD)，HealthTap的核心问答功能被捕捉在一个新颖的和有吸引力的移动应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Oct 2011
50,000 answers!

We reach 50,000 useful, relevant, and current physician-created answers on HealthTap, all available for free. The Medical Experts on HealthTap stay busy improving the quality of online health information one answer, tip, and health guide at a time.
trans-unit.target: 我们在HealthTap上提供了50,000个有用的，相关的和当前医生创建的回答，所有这些都是免费的。HealthTap的医学专家一直忙于提高在线健康信息的质量一个回答、小贴士和健康指南。

trans-unit.source: Nov 2011
HealthTap Groups
trans-unit.target: HealthTap群组

trans-unit.source: It's not just for individual physicians anymore! Group practices, hospitals, and other health organizations join HealthTap. Now, these groups can maintain a presence on HealthTap and connect with individual physicians. Five hundred physicians now participate in groups. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: 这不再只是为个别医师！群组诊疗、医院和其他卫生组织加入HealthTap。现在，这些群组可以在HealthTap上保持存在并与个别医生联系。500名医师现在参加群组。阅读 文章 ›

trans-unit.source: Dec 2011
Series A
trans-unit.target: A系列

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is awarded $11.5M in Series A funding, from investors like the Mayfield Fund, Mohr Davidow Ventures, and Eric Schmidt's Innovation Endeavors. Their backing of our shared vision enables us to continue to build the HealthTap that you see today.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap获得A轮融资1150万美元，来自梅菲尔德基金，Mohr Davidow Ventures和Eric Schmidt的创新奋进等投资者。他们支持我们的共同愿景，使我们能够继续建立您今天看到的HealthTap。

trans-unit.source: Re-treat
trans-unit.target: 再治疗

trans-unit.source: The team hits Carmel for the weekend on the second annual company retreat. There, we brainstormed about where HealthTap should go from here and generally how to change the world to help people smile and feel good!
trans-unit.target: 该团队在第二次年度公司休假期间突然想到Carmel周末在那里，我们集体讨论了HealthTap应该从这里开始，以及一般如何改变世界，帮助人们微笑和feel good！

trans-unit.source: Jan 2012
100,000 agrees!

When doctors feel that an answer from another physician is right on target, they can "agree" with it - immediately boosting the credibility of the answer. The answer with the most agrees is bumped to the top for users to find!
trans-unit.target: 当医生觉得来自另一医生的回答是正确的目标时，他们可以"同意"通过它 - 立即提高回答的可信性。为用户找到最同意的回答将置顶！

trans-unit.source: Feb 2012
10,000 doctors!

Our Medical Expert Network reached 10,000 doctors in early 2012 – and it's still growing! This milestone coincided with Valentine's Day, when we launched our "I <3 My Doc" campaign - celebrating physicians everywhere for their hard work and dedication to the care of others.
trans-unit.target: 我们的医学专家网络在2012年初达到了10000名医生 – 它仍在增长！这一里程碑恰好在情人节，我们启动了我们的"I <3我的文件"运动 - 庆祝各地医师的辛勤工作，并致力于照顾他人。

trans-unit.source: Mar 2012
Our second SXSW 2012 Interactive Conference
trans-unit.target: 我们的第二届SXSW 2012互动会议

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hosts the hottest Interactive Health gathering at SXSW, with more than 2,000 people on the wait list. Participants enjoyed party perks like big wheel racing and a photo booth, while simultaneously driving the mobile health movement forward.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在SXSW举办最热门的互动健康聚会，有超过2,000人在等待名单上。参加者喜欢派对福利，如大轮赛车和照片摊，同时推动移动健康运动向前进。

trans-unit.source: Super happy Developer Block Party
trans-unit.target: 超级快乐开发者团体党

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's award-winning display at the first-ever Developer Block Party (sponsored by the city of Palo Alto) featured in-person doctors answering health questions of the thousands of people who stopped by our "Doctor is In" parklet.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在第一次的开发者团队（由帕洛阿尔托市赞助）的获奖显示特色医生亲自回答数千人的健康问题，我们的"医生是In&quot停止的停靠点。

trans-unit.source: Jun 2012
Fourth internship class
trans-unit.target: 第四届实习班

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's fourth internship class brought together a diverse array of students from Stanford, Berkeley, USC, and UCLA--students who added to the excitement and energy around what HealthTap is doing for the health world.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的第四个实习班汇集了来自斯坦福大学，伯克利大学，南加州大学和加州大学洛杉矶分校的学生，他们为HealthTap为健康世界而做的事情带来了兴奋和精力。

trans-unit.source: 12,000 doctors!

Our Medical Expert Network continued its remarkable growth, reaching 12,000 U.S.-licensed doctors in Jun 2012. These doctors are actively engaging with HealthTap members and contributing to the world’s leading knowledgebase of online health content.
trans-unit.target: 我们的医学专家网络继续显着增长，2012年6月达到12,000名拥有美国执业执照的医生。这些医生正在积极地与HealthTap会员合作，为世界领先的在线健康内容知识库做出贡献。

trans-unit.source: Jul 2012
Launch of the New HealthTap
trans-unit.target: 发布新的HealthTap

trans-unit.source: The New HealthTap launched as the first-ever mobile health platform, available for everyone (iPhone, iPad, Android and Web). We received positive praise from Washington Post , Bloomberg, Reuters, Forbes and Mashable, as well as TechCrunch and GigaOm among many other well known publications.
trans-unit.target: 新的HealthTap作为第一个移动健康平台推出，适用于所有人（iPhone，iPad，安卓和Web）。我们收到了包括来自华盛顿邮报，彭博，路透社，福布斯和Mashable，以及TechCrunch和GigaOm在许多其他知名出版物的积极赞扬。

trans-unit.source: Nov 2012
DocScore highlights top doctors
trans-unit.target: 医者评分突出顶级医生

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s innovative DocScore is an objective numeric rating (like a FICO score) for doctors, taking into account public information (such as years in practice, medical education, awards, and peer-reviewed publications) as well as interactions on HealthTap (including peer-endorsements and agrees).
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的医者评分的创新是医生的客观数字评级（如FICO评分），考虑到公共信息（如实践中的年份，医学教育，奖项和同行评审的出版物）以及HealthTap的互动（包括同行评议） 支持和同意。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s DOConnect is an interactive map showing the referral network of doctors and doctors who treat the same patients at the same time. More than 30 million connections are visible via HealthTap, and each doctor’s connections are visible directly from a doctor’s HealthTap profile page.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的DOConnect是一个交互式地图，显示医生和医生的转诊网络，同时对同一患者进行治疗。这会显示出医生的诊断网和在同一时间诊断同一个患者的医生。通过HealthTap可以看到超过3000万个连接，每个医生的连接都可以从医生的HealthTap个人资料页面直接看到。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap acquires Avvo Health and grows Directory to 1.2 million doctors
trans-unit.target: HealthTap 收购Avvo Health并将目录扩展到120万名医生

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s first acquisition, health Q&A and directory service Avvo Health, expanded HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network to more than 40,000 doctors in 128 specialties, and broadened local coverage across all 50 states. At the same time, HealthTap announced the expansion of its directory coverage to include 1.2 million U.S.-licensed doctors. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: HealthTap首次收购，健康问答和目录服务Avvo Health将HealthTap的医学专家网络扩展到了超过40,000名医生，共有128个专科，并扩展了所有50个州的本地覆盖面。与此同时， HealthTap 宣布扩大其目录覆盖范围，包括120万拥有美国执业执照的医生。阅读 文章 ›

trans-unit.source: Disrupting healthcare for the better
trans-unit.target: 打破为更好的健康医护

trans-unit.source: HealthTap CEO Ron Gutman was invited to present on CNBC’s “The Disrupters,” a national news series highlighting innovative companies and individuals changing the status quo.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap首席执行官Ron Gutman被邀请参加CNBC的“破坏者”，一个全国新闻系列，突出了创新公司和个人改变现状。

trans-unit.source: Dec 2012
Health resolutions health journey
trans-unit.target: 健康决议 健康之旅

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's new interface makes it easy and intuitive to browse health information, helping users support their health journeys. New features include health resolutions and a body browser, an easy way to explore symptoms and related conditions and treatments, all by clicking on an image of the human body.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的新界面使您可以轻松，直观地浏览健康信息，帮助用户支持他们的健康之旅。新功能包括健康解决方案和身体浏览器，一种简单的方法来探索症状和相关的条件和治疗，所有通过点击人体的图像。

trans-unit.source: Jan 2013
CNN : HealthTap helps you keep resolutions
trans-unit.target: 美国有线电视新闻网络：HealthTap帮助您保持决定

trans-unit.source: CNN highlighted HealthTap as one of the very best apps to help you keep your New Year's health resolutions. The video feature aired on CNN during prime time, and was simulcast on 150 stations across the country. Watch video ›
trans-unit.target: CNN强调HealthTap作为最好的应用程序之一，以帮助您保持您的新年的健康决议。在黄金时段，CNN播出的视频功能，并在全国150个电台同时播出。观看视频 ›

trans-unit.source: Winter retreat envisions HealthTap’s next generation
trans-unit.target: 冬季休假设想HealthTap的下一代

trans-unit.source: HealthTap team members gathered in Northern California for our semi-annual retreat, where we hosted a select group of doctors from diverse practices across the country. They participated in activities that helped us envision the next generation of HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap团队会员为我们半年度休假齐聚北加州，在那里我们主办了一个从全国各地多样化的诊疗选择医学的群组。他们参加了帮助我们设想下一代HealthTap的活动。

trans-unit.source: Feb 2013

HealthTap brings doctor-created tips straight to your mobile device or computer. To keep healthy living top of mind, users can subscribe to health topics of interest, and receive daily doctor-created tips, suggestions, or bits of advice delivered via email or by SMS push notifications to mobile devices. Users can also discover and browse TipTaps on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap将医生创建的小贴士直接推送到您的移动设备或计算机。为了保持放心健康的生活，用户可以订购感兴趣的健康话题，并且接收通过电子邮件或短信在移动设备上接收每天医生创建的小贴士、建议或一点忠告的推送通知。用户还可以在HealthTap上发现和浏览推心小贴士。

trans-unit.source: Global mobile featuring!
trans-unit.target: 全球移动特色！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap, featured globally on Google Play’s Android app market, quickly becomes one of the top 10 most popular health apps worldwide.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap，在Google Play安卓应用程序市场推出，迅速成为全球前十大最受欢迎的健康应用程序之一。

trans-unit.source: Mar 2013
HealthTap personalized!
trans-unit.target: HealthTap个性化！

trans-unit.source: Mar 2013 also marked the availability of increased personalization to millions on the HealthTap platform. Now when members ask questions, they are prompted with the option to add additional personal information related to the question they are asking. This provides doctors with relevant context and improves the specificity of the answers members receive.
trans-unit.target: 2013年3月，还在HealthTap平台上标记了数百万用户的个性化增长。现在，当会员提出问题时，系统会小贴士他们添加与他们要求的问题相关的其他个人信息的选项。这向医生提供相关来龙去脉并且改进会员接收的回答的专一性。

trans-unit.source: One of the Top Four Out of 40,000 Apps!
trans-unit.target: 40,000个应用程序中的前四！

trans-unit.source: In Mar 2013, HealthTap was featured on the TODAY Show as one of the four best health apps from among the 40,000 health applications available for consumers. Watch video ›
trans-unit.target: 2013年3月，HealthTap在今日秀上作为消费者提供的4万个健康应用程序中的4个最好的健康应用程序之一。观看视频 ›

trans-unit.source: Mar 2013
Experts Helping Experts
trans-unit.target: 专家帮助专家

trans-unit.source: This month HealthTap unveiled its new initiative called “Curbside Consults.” The program allows a HealthTap physician to use the platform’s network to broadcast a question to other physicians.
trans-unit.target: 本月，HealthTap公布了名为“路边内容”的新计划。该程序允许HealthTap医生使用平台的网络向其他医生广播问题。

trans-unit.source: Apr 2013
The Full Spectrum release!
trans-unit.target: 全局发布！

trans-unit.source: The full spectrum of doctor knowledge is made available via HealthTap. Doctor-to-doctor Q&A, concise doctor updates, and full-length doctor posts are released.
trans-unit.target: 医生知识的所有范围通过HealthTap提供。医生与医生的问答，简明的医生更新和全职医生的帖子。

trans-unit.source: Growth!
trans-unit.target: 发展！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap reaches 7.5 million monthly unique visitors, two million app downloads, and more than half a billion doctor answers served.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap每月独立访问者达750万，应用下载量为200万，医生回答超过5亿。

trans-unit.source: May 2013
AppRX
trans-unit.target: App医生评测

trans-unit.source: In May 2013, HealthTap launched AppRX so our users can get app recommendations from real doctors. With AppRX, we make it fast and easy to find health and wellness apps by creating intuitive, user-friendly categories, and posting doctor recommendations and written reviews. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: 在2013年5月，HealthTap推出了“App医生评测”，因此我们的用户可以从真正的医生获得应用程序的建议。使用App医生评测，我们通过创建直观，用户友好的类别，并为应用程序发布医生建议和书面评论，使其快速，轻松地找到健康与保健应用程序。阅读 文章 ›

trans-unit.source: Jul 2013
Health2020 Event
trans-unit.target: 健康2020活动

trans-unit.source: In the summer of 2013, HealthTap had the pleasure of hosting a group of leading engineers, designers, product managers, data experts, and innovators in diverse industries to envision and design the “future of health” in the year 2020. It was a successful day of thought-provoking debate and ideas of how to disrupt the health space.
trans-unit.target: 在2013年夏天，HealthTap很荣幸地主办了一个领先的工程师，设计师，产品经理，数据专家和不同行业的创新者，以构想和设计2020年的“健康未来”。这是成功的一天，发人深省的辩论和如何破坏健康空间的想法。

trans-unit.source: First doctor conference with Top Doctors
trans-unit.target: 与顶级医生的第一次医生会议

trans-unit.source: July 2013 marked the first ever HealthTap Doctors’ Conference. Doctors from around the country from multiple specialities, practice sizes, and various stages in their careers offered insights and feedback on the past, present, and future of HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 2013年7月是史上第一次HealthTap医生会议。来自多个专科，诊疗大小和职业生涯的各个阶段的全国各地的医生提供了对HealthTap的过去，现在和未来的见解和反馈。

trans-unit.source: Oct 2013
10,000 lives saved
trans-unit.target: 挽救了10,000条生命

trans-unit.source: In Oct 2013, HealthTap received the 10,000th user note telling us that information on HealthTap saved a life. By making digital health personal, we're working hard to help many more thousands all over the world live longer, healthier lives. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: 在2013年十月，HealthTap收到了第10,000条用户通知告诉我们在HealthTap上挽救一条生命。通过使电子健康私人化，我们致力于帮助全世界更多人活得更长久更健康。阅读 文章 ›

trans-unit.source: One billion answers served
trans-unit.target: 提供10亿份回答

trans-unit.source: Since launching our mobile health platform in Jul 2012, we've served more than one billion answers in response to users' health questions, and have created and organized the world's most extensive knowledge base of user questions matched to answers from trusted doctors.
trans-unit.target: 自从我们在2012年七月发布了移动健康平台，我们向用户的健康问题提供了超过十亿条回答，我们也创建了世界上最广泛的将用户问题和受信任的医生的回答相匹配的知识库。

trans-unit.source: 50,000 doctors

We were thrilled when the 50,000th doctor signed up to join our Medical Expert Network! The thank you notes keep pouring in from members who have been helped by our devoted and inspirational doctors. And the doctors are happy too! Word of mouth is spreading in the medical community about HealthTap and how it is helping millions of people around the world feel good!
trans-unit.target: 当5万名医生报名加入我们的医学专家网络时，我们感到非常高兴！我们奉献的和鼓舞人心的医生帮助过的会员的感谢信持续的涌入。医生也很高兴！口碑传播在医疗社区关于HealthTap和它如何帮助世界各地的数百万人feel good！

trans-unit.source: Nov 2013

HealthTap Labs launches its first app - Talk To Docs. Just speak a question, and the app reads back answers from top doctors. Uses advanced natural language processing, artificial intelligence, and advanced voice recognition technology, Talk To Docs recognizes the health topics you’re interested in, and delivers the most appropriate answers. Read article ›
trans-unit.target: HealthTap实验室发布他的第一款应用程序 - Talk To Docs.仅仅说出一个问题，这款应用程序就会从顶级医生那里获取回答。Talk To Docs使用先进的自然语言处理、人工智能和先进的声音识别技术来识别您感兴趣的话题并向您推送最适合的回答。阅读 文章 ›

trans-unit.source: “Disrupting Healthcare”
trans-unit.target: “打破健康医护”

trans-unit.source: HealthTap continued to be featured in national press, with articles in Inc. Magazine (November 2013) and Forbes (November 2013), among many others celebrating the changes that HealthTap is making in the health field.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap继续在国家新闻界发表，其中包括华纳出版社 (November 2013)和福布斯(November 2013), 在许多其他人中庆祝HealthTap在健康领域正在发生的变化。

trans-unit.source: Feb 2014
HealthTap Documentary
trans-unit.target: HealthTap纪录片

trans-unit.source: A mini-documentary on HealthTap was released underscoring the importance of the company’s mission to revolutionize the doctor-patient relationship. The film featured patients and doctors who spoke about the deep impact HealthTap is having on their lives. Watch video ›
trans-unit.target: 发布了一部关于HealthTap的小纪录片，强调了公司使命改变医生与患者关系的重要性。这部电影精选了患者和医生，他们谈到了HealthTap对他们生活的深远影响。观看视频 ›

trans-unit.source: June 2014
HealthTap launches a smartwatch app
trans-unit.target: HealthTap发布智能手表应用程序

trans-unit.source: HealthTap redefines healthcare once again and becomes first health app on Google’s Android wear. Now millions around the world get the power of personalized doctor reminders and tips on the go!
trans-unit.target: HealthTap再次重新定义健康医护，成为Google Android Wear上的第一个健康应用程序。现在世界各地的数百万人忙于获得个性化的医生提醒和小贴士！

trans-unit.source: Jul 2014
HealthTap moves into 270 University Ave
trans-unit.target: HealthTap搬迁到270大学大道

trans-unit.source: We move to a new, bigger, better, sunnier office in the heart of downtown Palo Alto!
trans-unit.target: 我们搬到在帕洛阿尔托市中心的一个新的，更大，更好，更阳光的办公室！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launches HealthTap Prime
trans-unit.target: HealthTap发布HealthTap Prime

trans-unit.source: Using HealthTap Prime, doctors can make Virtual House Calls via video chats, regular phone calls, or message exchanges. Members of HealthTap+ Prime can request a Virtual House Call at anytime, from anyplace, using any PC or mobile device.
trans-unit.target: 使用HealthTap Prime，医生可以通过视频聊天，普通电话或消息交换进行在线出诊。HealthTap+ Prime的会员可以随时使用任何个人电脑或移动设备从任何地点请求在线出诊。

trans-unit.source: Aug 2014
Doctor house calls are making a come-back with a high-tech twist
trans-unit.target: 高科技手段使医生出诊重新出现

trans-unit.source: The launch of HealthTap Prime received worldwide media coverage, including a feature on Good Morning America!
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime的推出获得了全球媒体报道，其中包括在早安美国的播出！

trans-unit.source: Two billion!
HealthTap hits two billion answers served in response to users' health questions.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap回复用户的健康问题已达到了20亿份回答。

trans-unit.source: Sep 2014
HealthTap launches on Apple’s Health App
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在苹果的健康应用程序上推出

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launched on Apple’s Health App, providing a seamless way to get your data from device to doctor. Doctors can use the Apple Health App data to provide better recommendations, as well as actionable doctor-created checklists and personalized tips.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在苹果的健康应用程序上推出，提供了一种将您的数据从设备到医生的无缝方式。医生可以使用苹果健康应用程序的数据提供更好的建议，以及可行的医生创建的清单和个性化小贴士。

trans-unit.source: Oct 2014
HealthTap launches HealthTap Concierge
trans-unit.target: HealthTap发布HealthTap贵宾台

trans-unit.source: With HealthTap Concierge, you can connect with your own doctor from anywhere via video or text consults for a low per-consult fee. No monthly subscription required. Create your own 24/7 Care-Team and get a 2nd, 3rd, or 10th opinion from doctors in more than 100 specialties!
trans-unit.target: 有了HealthTap贵宾台，为了每次低的咨询费用，您可以通过视频或文本咨询从任何地方与自己的医生联系。不需要每月订购。创建自己的24/7全天候医护团队，并从超过100个专科的医生获得第2，第3或第10意见！

trans-unit.source: Jan 2015
First AppRx Annual Report
trans-unit.target: 第一个App医生评测年度报告

trans-unit.source: HealthTap releases its first annual report on the top health and medical apps available today. Thousands of doctors on HealthTap independently reviewed tens of thousands of health apps and provided recommendations for some of the ones they deemed the best among the 100,000 health and wellness apps available in the iOS and Android app stores.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap很荣幸地发布关于可用的顶级健康和医疗应用程序的第一份年度报告。HealthTap的医生已经独立审核了数以万计的健康应用程序，并为iOS和Android应用商店中的10万个健康与保健应用程序中的一些提供了建议。

trans-unit.source: Mar 2015
RateRx Launched
trans-unit.target: Rate医生评测发布

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launches RateRx, the first large-scale resource created by doctors to help consumers understand the effectiveness of drugs and treatments based on doctor’s real-world experience with medications. RateRx empowers more informed discussions between patients and doctors about treatment options.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap发布了Rate医生评测，这是医生创建的第一个大规模资源，帮助消费者基于医生现实世界的药物经验来了解药物和治疗的有效性。Rate医生评测使患者和医生之间就治疗选择进行更多的知情讨论。

trans-unit.source: Apr 2015
20,000th “life saved” thank-you note!
trans-unit.target: 第20,000封“挽救了生命”的感谢信！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap received the 20,000th note from a customer telling us that information on HealthTap saved a life.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap收到了第20,000封消费者的信告诉我们在HealthTap上挽救一条生命。

trans-unit.source: Three new apps for Apple Watch
trans-unit.target: 为苹果手表的3款新的应用程序

trans-unit.source: HealthTap remains on the forefront of digital health by being offering the first consumer healthcare apps for Apple Watch. DocNow, the first “Affordable Care App,” delivers instant access to doctors on call 24/7 for only $2.99. HealthTap for Apple Watch helps you stay on top of your health with a tap on your wrist. HealthTap for Doctors lets doctors to manage their Virtual Practices right from their Apple Watches.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap通过为苹果手表提供第一款消费者健康医护应用程序，依然走在数字健康的前列。DocNow，第一个“价格实惠的医护应用程序”，只需2.99美元，即可提供24/7全天候即时的访问医生电话。Apple Watch的HealthTap可以帮助您在手腕上轻轻滑动，保持身体健康。HealthTap for Doctors让医生从他们的苹果手表管理他们的在线诊疗。

trans-unit.source: Three billion answers served
trans-unit.target: 提供30亿份回答

trans-unit.source: HealthTap crosses three billion answers served in response to users' health questions.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap回复用户的健康问题已达到了30亿份回答。

trans-unit.source: May 2015
HealthTap wins Webby Award
trans-unit.target: HealthTap赢得威比奖

trans-unit.source: HealthTap wins the 2015 Webby Award—called “The Internet’s highest honor” by the New York Times—in the Mobile Sites & Apps: Health & Fitness Category.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap赢得了2015年Webby奖 - 被纽约时报称为“互联网的最高荣誉” - 在移动网站和应用程序：健康与健身类别。

trans-unit.source: Jun 2015
E-prescriptions now available!
trans-unit.target: E-prescriptions现在可用！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap announces its collaboration with Quest Diagnostics to enable doctors to order diagnostic testing services for patients.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap宣布与Quest Diagonstics公司合作，使医生能够为患者订购诊断检验服务。

trans-unit.source: Aug 2015
World Economic Forum Technology Pioneer
trans-unit.target: 世界经济论坛技术先锋

trans-unit.source: The World Economic Forum selects HealthTap as 2015 Technology Pioneer for its significant global potential to make virtual healthcare accessible to everyone.
trans-unit.target: 世界经济论坛选择 HealthTap 作为2015技术先锋，因为其巨大的全球潜力，使每个人都可以使用在线健康医护。

trans-unit.source: Sep 2015
HealthTap Compass gives employees of Flex access to efficient, world-class healthcare
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Compass为Flex的员工提供高效，世界一流的健康医护

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launches Compass, a revolutionary new personal healthcare application that will give employees of Flex the ability to “tap in” to intelligent and cost-effective healthcare 24/7. HealthTap Compass serves as a hub for managing all employees’ healthcare needs, from information to prescriptions and even lab test referrals and interpretations, and will replace the traditional “benefits card.”
trans-unit.target: HealthTap发布了Compass，这是一个革命性的新型个人健康医护应用程序，将让Flex的员工能够24/7全天候“轻轻滑动”智能化和具有成本效益的健康医护。HealthTap Compass作为一个中心，用于管理所有员工的健康医护需求，从信息到处方甚至转诊和解释实验室检验，并将取代传统的“福利卡”。

trans-unit.source: Oct 2015
HealthTap goes global
trans-unit.target: HealthTap走向全球化

trans-unit.source: HealthTap expands globally, unveiling its new “Health Operating System™ (HOPES)™" for hospitals, clinics, and community-based programs worldwide, starting with the Waikato District Health Board in New Zealand.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在全球扩张，揭示其新的“健康操作系统和贸易; (HOPES)和贸易;“用于世界各地的医院，诊所和社区计划，从新西兰的怀卡托区卫生局开始。

trans-unit.source: 250 million people helped!
trans-unit.target: 帮助过2.5亿人！

trans-unit.source: More than 250 million users have accessed HealthTap doctors’ expertise in the form of answers and curated articles from the world’s largest doctor-created knowledgebase.
trans-unit.target: 超过2.5亿用户以世界上最大的医生创建的知识库的回答和策划的文章的形式访问了HealthTap医生的专业知识。

trans-unit.source: Nov 2015
Global Rounds: groundbreaking social learning for doctors
trans-unit.target: 全球巡回：为医生提供开创性的社会学习

trans-unit.source: Clinicians around the world can receive continuing medical education (CME) credits for answering patient questions, providing peer review on other doctor answers, and participating in discussions about challenging medical cases in HealthTap Global Rounds, the only digital learning where doctors can collaboratively solve real patient cases with other top doctors.
trans-unit.target: 世界各地的医生可以通过回答患者的问题，对其他医生的回答发表自己的见解和积极参加并在HealthTap全球巡回讨论一些具有挑战性的医学问题来获得持续性医学教育(CME)学分。HealthTap全球巡回是唯一一个医生可以和其他顶级医生合作解决患者问题的数字化学习之地。

trans-unit.source: Jan 2016
HealthTap SOS offers solution for disaster relief
trans-unit.target: HealthTap SOS为赈灾提供解决方案

trans-unit.source: HealthTap now helps victims of natural disasters and terrorist attacks with HealthTap SOS, which it plans to license to municipalities and insurance firms around the world. In case of an emergency such as a hurricane or tsunami, residents of an affected area will be able to text, call, or video chat in real time with one of HealthTap's network of more than 100,000 doctors. The company will aggregate data based on these interactions pushing it back to relief forces, as well as to the government and to global media outlets.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap通过HealthTap SOS来帮助那些遭受自然灾害和恐怖袭击的受害者，它希望通过这样给直辖市和全国各地的保险公司颁发执业执照。在像飓风和海啸这样的紧急情况下，受影响地区的居民将能够立即和HealthTap的100000多名医生进行实时文本，电话，或者视频聊天。公司将搜集这些建立在相互交流的数据给救援部队，政府以及全球媒体。

trans-unit.source: Mar 2016
100,000 Doctors!

More than 100,000 U.S. licensed doctors have joined HealthTap in its virtual care revolution, enabling people everywhere to access quality care from any mobile device or personal computer, and for doctors to deliver care at anytime from anywhere.
trans-unit.target: 超过100,000位拥有美国执业执照的医生加入了HealthTap的在线医护革命，使各地的人能够通过任何移动设备或电脑来获得优质医护，使医生能够随时随地为他人提供帮助

trans-unit.source: 4.5 billion answers served!
trans-unit.target: 已经提供了45亿份回答

trans-unit.source: HealthTap hits four and a half billion answers served in response to users' health questions.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap回复用户的健康问题已达到了45亿份回答。

trans-unit.source: Apr 2016
First-of-its-kind doctor training and certification in virtual care
trans-unit.target: 首屈一指的医生培训和在线医护认证

trans-unit.source: Doctors can now get official continuing medical education (CME) credits for updating their expertise to include delivering virtual care.
trans-unit.target: 医生现在可以获得官方继续医学教育（CME）学分，更新他们的专业知识，包括提供在线医护。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap chat bot for Facebook's Messenger app
trans-unit.target: 为Facebook的Messenger应用程序的HealthTap 聊天机器人

trans-unit.source: HealthTap was the only health-focused company to be invited by Facebook to create a chat bot for the new Facebook Messenger app. HealthTap’s bot allows users to type a question into Messenger any time and receive free responses from doctors.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是唯一一家以健康为重点的公司，由Facebook邀请为新的Facebook Messenger应用程序创建聊天机器人。HealthTap的机器人允许用户随时输入一个问题到Messenger，并收到医生的免费回复。

trans-unit.source: May 2016
Partnership with New Zealand’s Waikato District Health Board offers virtual care to rural residents
trans-unit.target: 与新西兰的怀卡托区卫生局合作为农村居民提供在线医护

trans-unit.source: Based on HealthTap HOPES™, New Zealand’s first “virtual hospital” gives more than one million patients the ability to talk to their doctors via video, audio, or text chat rather than travel to an distant outpatient clinic, improving both access and health outcomes for the Waikato population.
trans-unit.target: 基于HealthTap HOPES和贸易;, 新西兰第一家“在线医院”为100多万患者提供了通过视频，音频或文本聊天与医生交谈的能力，而不是前往一个遥远的门诊诊所，从而改善了怀卡托人群的获取和健康状况。

trans-unit.source: Jul 2016
HealthTap acquires Docphin, brings comprehensive medical education to doctors for free
trans-unit.target: HealthTap收购Docphin，为医生免费提供全面的医学教育

trans-unit.source: By acquiring Docphin, a prime educational service for doctors and an emerging go-to resource for new publications in the medical literature, HealthTap can guide doctors to the latest developments and provide them with personalized alerts and updates on topics relevant to their specialties and expertise.
trans-unit.target: 通过收购Docphin，医生的主要教育服务和为在医学文献中新出版物的新兴定向资源，HealthTap可以指导医生最新的发展，并为他们提供与他们的专科和专业相关的话题的个性化消息和更新。

trans-unit.source: Aug 2016
Group virtual consults with live translators
trans-unit.target: 有实时翻译的群组在线咨询

trans-unit.source: HealthTap begins offering virtual consults that include multiple participants such as family members, caregivers, specialists, and live translators. This breakthrough service removes language barriers and dramatically expands access to high-quality, immediate care to HealthTap users in 174 countries around the world.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap开始提供在线咨询，包括多个参与者例如家庭会员，照顾者，专家和实时翻译员。这一突破性服务消除了语言障碍，并大大提高了全球174个国家的HealthTap用户的高质量，即时的医护的获取。

trans-unit.source: Find answers from %{specialty} physicians
trans-unit.target: 从%{specialty}名医师找到回答

trans-unit.source: Find answers from %{specialty} physicians from %{school}
trans-unit.target: 从来自%{school}的%{specialty}名医师找到回答

trans-unit.source: Your Allergies Can Be Treated Today!
trans-unit.target: 在当今可以治疗您的过敏！

trans-unit.source: You are not alone. 50 million people in the United States suffer from allergy symptoms and its prevalence is increasing, affecting as many as 30 percent of adults and up to 40 percent of children. Allergies can be frustrating and can be an annoyance if not properly treated. At HealthTap, we have licensed qualified doctors who can help make you feel good! We're here 24/7, to help with prescriptions, treatment and advice. What are you waiting for?
trans-unit.target: 您不是一个人。在美国有5000万人患有过敏症状并且患病率正在不断变高，影响了30%的成年人和40%的儿童。如果没有适当的治疗过敏会令人沮丧和烦恼。在HealthTap，我们有拥有执业执照医生使您feel good！我们在这里24/7全天候帮助提供处方，治疗和建议。那么您还在等什么？

trans-unit.source: Connect with a doctor in under two minutes today and alleviate those allergy frustrations!
trans-unit.target: 立刻在2分钟内与医生联系您就可以缓解那些过敏痛苦！

trans-unit.source: Get Help with Your Flu/Cold Symptoms Now!
trans-unit.target: 现在您就可以为您的流感或感冒症状来寻求帮助！

trans-unit.source: Achoo! Being sick can make you feel helpless and alone. Sometimes, all you need is a quick doctor chat to get a basic prescription, but you don't want to deal with the hassles of the waiting room. With HealthTap, you can talk to a doctor in under 2 minutes from the comfort of your own bed!
trans-unit.target: 啊嚏生病会使您感到无助和孤单有时候，您只是想和医生进行一个快速的交流并且得到相应解决问题的处方，可是您又不想排队去看病。有了HealthTap，您就可以在您的床上2分钟内轻松快速地联系到一位医生！

trans-unit.source: What are you waiting for? Talk to a doctor in less time than it takes to drive there!
trans-unit.target: 那么您还在等什么？和医生交谈的时间比您开车去医院的时间还短！

trans-unit.source: Talk to a Doctor Privately Now!
trans-unit.target: 立即与医生进行私人交谈！

trans-unit.source: Questions about STDs? HealthTap doctors can offer private confidential advice for your condition. Doctors are standing by 24/7 to offer help, treatment and prescriptions.
trans-unit.target: 关于性传播的问题HealthTap的医生能为您的病症提供保密的建议。医生24/7全天候随时恭候提供帮助，治疗和处方。

trans-unit.source: Connect with a doctor in minutes in the privacy of your home! Get Confidential Help Now
trans-unit.target: 您在家几分钟内就可以与医生开始私人交谈！立即获得保密的帮助

trans-unit.source: A Doctor is Standing by to Answer All Your Pregnancy Questions Now!
trans-unit.target: 医生现在随时恭候为您回答有关怀孕的问题

trans-unit.source: Pregnancy is a beautiful but complicated process. There are thousands of questions every parent wants to ask but frequently forgets during regular doctor visits. With HealthTap, you can have a doctor on demand anytime, anywhere!
trans-unit.target: 怀孕是一个美妙却又十分复杂的过程家长们总是有很多想要问的问题，但是每次都会在定期检查的时候忘记询问。有了HealthTap，您就可以随时随地获得医生的建议！

trans-unit.source: Connect with a doctor in minutes via phone, tablet or computer, 24/7. We're here to help and make sure you and your newborn feel good! Try us today!
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过手机、平板、电脑24/7全天候数分钟内与医生获得联系。我们会帮助您和您的宝宝feel good！立刻尝试！

trans-unit.source: Get Treatment for Your Skin Condition Now!
trans-unit.target: 立刻为您的皮肤问题找到合适的治疗方案吧！

trans-unit.source: Skin conditions result from a number of factors and can reduce your quality of life. It's important to have a doctor evaluate your condition to ensure it is not something more serious than a minor irritation. At HealthTap, you can connect to a doctor in minutes via chat or video to get peace of mind!
trans-unit.target: 有很多情况会引起皮肤问题，这会下降您的生活质量。医生在为您检查之后告诉您并没有什么大碍只是过敏是一件很重要的事情。在HealthTap，您可以通过聊天或视频在数分钟内联系医生使自己放心！

trans-unit.source: Doctors are standing by 24/7 for advice, treatment or prescriptions. Get help today!
trans-unit.target: 医生24/7全天候随时恭候提供咨询，治疗或处方。立刻获得帮助！

trans-unit.source: This is how I explain the simple and effective virtual appointment process to my patients on my website!
trans-unit.target: 这是我如何在我的网站解释简单有效的在线预约过程给我的患者！

trans-unit.source: Yes, and I love the fact that my HealthTap Virtual Practice works seamlessly with my existing website and blog, and I even posted a video to welcome my patients.
trans-unit.target: 是的，并且我喜欢这个事实，我的HealthTap在线诊疗无缝地与我现有的网站和博客，我甚至发布了一个欢迎我的患者的视频相结合。

trans-unit.source: Take a look ›
trans-unit.target: 看一看 ›

trans-unit.source: It’s wonderful! My patients can check in with me virtually and explore integrative approaches to treating heart disease and cardiac risk factors.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了！我的患者可以在线地查看我，并探索整合方法来治疗心脏病和心脏危险因素。

trans-unit.source: Check it out ›
trans-unit.target: 一探究竟 ›

trans-unit.source: I can easily show patients how they can now see me from anywhere. But really, anywhere!
trans-unit.target: 我可以很容易地向患者展示他们如何在任何地方看到我。是真的，任何地方！

trans-unit.source: The "Ask Dr. Buck" section of my website breaks it down step-by-step and makes it super easy for my patients to connect when I'm available
trans-unit.target: "询问Buck医生" 我的网站的一部分一步步地打破了它，并使我的患者在我可用时连接超级容易

trans-unit.source: It's really useful for surgery too—the relief post-op patients get from even a brief video conversation with me is astounding, especially those who can’t visit my physical office.
trans-unit.target: 这对手术也是非常有用的—从我甚至一个简短的视频对话安慰手术后患者是令人震惊的，特别是对那些不能访问我的实际办公室的患者。

trans-unit.source: View my website integration ›
trans-unit.target: 查看我的网站整合 ›

trans-unit.source: I make myself available to patients in times that are most convenient for me so they can stay healthy and reach me from anywhere.
trans-unit.target: 我在自己最方便的时候为患者服务，所以他们可以保持健康并从任何地方联系我。

trans-unit.source: My patients also love that they can connect with me from anywhere! This really is the next big thing in healthcare, and I’m thrilled to be part of it.
trans-unit.target: 我的患者也喜欢在任何地方都可以和我联系。这真的是在健康医护领域下一件大事，我很高兴参与其中。

trans-unit.source: See my webpage ›
trans-unit.target: 查看我的网页 ›

trans-unit.source: Totally, and I love that I’m able to leverage my time efficiently to guide even more patients in a shorter period of time toward better health. And they pay for it! It's easy to get started with a free Virtual Practice today.
trans-unit.target: 完全地，我喜欢我能够有效地利用我的时间在更短的时间为更好的健康来指导更多的患者。他们为此付出！立刻很容易的开始免费的在线诊疗。

trans-unit.source: Here's how I tell patients about the future of medicine — virtual appointments through my always-on Virtual Practice (even when I'm sleeping!)
trans-unit.target: 以下是我告诉患者医学的未来—通过我永远在线的在线诊疗的在线预约（即使我在睡觉！）

trans-unit.source: Right on—the technology is amazing.
trans-unit.target: 正确的—技术是惊人的。

trans-unit.source: Checkout how I promote my Virtual Practice on Facebook ›
trans-unit.target: 看看我如何在Facebook上宣传我的在线诊疗 ›

trans-unit.source: Yes, and what’s really great is that I get to set my own schedule, and am able to work even from my living room.
trans-unit.target: 是的，真正伟大的是，我可以设定自己的时间表，甚至能够在我的客厅工作。

trans-unit.source: I show patients how easy it is to find me—both in my real-world practice and online!
trans-unit.target: 我向患者展示了找到我是多么容易—无论是在我现实世界中的诊疗还是在线！

trans-unit.source: I love having my own private doctor on call, whenever I need him. All it takes is just a few taps on my smartphone. Best of all, I can consult with him via HD video or chat!
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢当我需要他时，我自己的私人医生可以随传随到。它所需要的只是我的智能手机上的几个步骤。最棒的是，我可以通过高清视频或聊天与他咨询！

trans-unit.source: When my dad got sick, we were in California and he was in Illinois. Thanks to HealthTap, we were able to get him the help he needed, stay in the loop, and get peace of mind.
trans-unit.target: 我爸爸生病时，我们在加州，他在伊利诺伊州。感谢HealthTap，我们能够放心地不断地提供他所需要的帮助。

trans-unit.source: This app has improved my life vastly. I've had more questions than answers for a while now. It's unreasonable to call my doctor every 5 minutes. The caring and expert doctors have been a lifesaver and brought me so much peace of mind!
trans-unit.target: 这个应用程序已经极大地改善了我的生活。有那么一小会儿我的问题多过回答。每隔5分钟打电话给我的医生是不合理的。充满关怀和专业的医生一直是救星，让我如此的放心！

trans-unit.source: Answers from experts on %{topic_string}. First: Unfortunately, this is difficult to answer. Costs vary based on city, site/location, practice. Best way to figure that out is either call your insurance agent, or if no insurance- call around and find out who might be the best choice for you. Talk to your physician; at times, they may have information to help you here.
trans-unit.target: %{topic_string}专家的回答。首先：不幸的是，这很难回答。费用根据城市，地点/位置，诊疗而有所不同。解决最好的方法是打电话给您的保险代理，或者如果没有保险 - 打电话四处询问并找出您可能的最佳选择。告诉您的医师; 有时，他们在这里可能有信息来帮助您。

trans-unit.source: My patients find it easy, quick, and very valuable to schedule virtual appointments via my Virtual Practice. I'm able to help patients and do good faster in ways I never before imagined possible, and it didn't cost me a dime. You can easily set up your Virtual Practice today too.
trans-unit.target: 我的患者发现通过我的在线诊疗安排在线预约会很容易，快速和非常有价值。我能够帮助患者和我从来没有想象过的可能做得更好的方式，并且它不会花我一毛钱。您今天也可以轻松地建立您的在线诊疗。

trans-unit.source: The self-scheduling on my website makes it really easy for me and for my patients
trans-unit.target: 我的网站上的自我安排使我和我的患者安排变得很简单

trans-unit.source: I love that new patients find me on HealthTap and request virtual appointments with me. This is changing the face of medicine.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢新的患者在HealthTap上找到我并请求与我在线预约。这正在改变医学的面貌。

trans-unit.source: Patients can send me secure messages and book a virtual appointment with one tap!
trans-unit.target: 患者可以向我发送安全消息，并且只需轻轻滑动即可预订一次在线预约！

trans-unit.source: It also makes a huge impact on my quality of life, since we can set our own hours and get paid for seeing patients whenever and wherever it’s convenient.
trans-unit.target: 这也对我的生活质量产生了巨大的影响，因为我们可以设置自己的时间和得到报酬，并且在我无论何时何地最方便的时间查看患者。

trans-unit.source: SmartHealth Privacy Statement
trans-unit.target: SmartHealth隐私声明

trans-unit.source: Secure Sharing: HealthTap
trans-unit.target: 安全分享：HealthTap

trans-unit.source: On HealthTap you can ask health questions, connect with doctors, get trusted answers and tips, and explore health information without also sharing your personal identity. We call this "secure sharing."
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上，您可以询问健康问题、与医生联系，获得可信的回答和小贴士，并探索健康信息，而不必分享您的个人身份。我们称之为“安全分享”。

trans-unit.source: How does it work? On HealthTap, only you know who you are. Your identity is protected. Our community receives the value of learning from your questions and the information you choose to share, and you benefit from the secure sharing of others in our community. You can even personalize your questions without revealing your identity.
trans-unit.target: 它怎么工作？在HealthTap里，只有您知道您是谁。您的身份是被保护的。我们的社区从您的问题和您选择分享的信息中获得学习的价值，并且您可以从我们社区中其他人的安全分享中受益。您甚至可以个性化您的问题，而不暴露您的身份。

trans-unit.source: is written in easy to read language. We even provided additional suggestions for sharing securely and safeguarding your privacy when participating on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 用易于阅读的语言书写的。我们甚至提供了额外的建议，以安全地分享和保护您参加HealthTap时的隐私。

trans-unit.source: Our company culture respects the values of secure sharing. Our employees receive privacy training, and our
trans-unit.target: 我们的公司文化尊重安全分享的价值观。我们的员工接受隐私权培训，和我们的

trans-unit.source: directly from your computer, tablet, or smartphone. You can ask personal
trans-unit.target: 您的电脑，平板电脑，智能手机那通过视频与医生联系。您可以直接向医生问个人的

trans-unit.source: as appropriate for virtual consults. While interactions on HealthTap Prime
trans-unit.target: 作为适合在线咨询并得到医护和处方。但是在HealthTap Prime和贵宾台

trans-unit.source: Our Privacy Principles, Privacy Constitution & Member Bill of Rights
trans-unit.target: 我们的隐私原则，隐私权宪章和会员权利法案

trans-unit.source: is straightforward and easy to understand. It contains answers to common questions about how our service works and how information provided to us is used and protected.
trans-unit.target: 很简单，且易于理解。它包含了关于我们的设备如何工作以及如何使用和保护提供给我们的信息的等常见问题的回答。

trans-unit.source: We take your privacy and security very seriously. Our
trans-unit.target: 我们非常重视您的隐私和安全。我们

trans-unit.source: We also have a Privacy Constitution, consisting of our pledge to you and your rights. This Constitution helps guide our decisions about privacy and security, and secures your rights as a member of our service.
trans-unit.target: 我们还有一份隐私法案，包括我们对您和您的权利的承诺。本“法案”有助于指导我们关于隐私和安全的决策，并保障您作为我们服务会员的权利。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's Privacy Constitution & Member Bill of Rights
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的隐私原则，隐私权宪章和会员权利法案

trans-unit.source: We are here to help you connect with doctors and find helpful health information including useful answers from trusted doctors. We ask only for data that can help us provide this service to you, and to use the data provided to improve your experience on our service.
trans-unit.target: 我们在这里帮助您与医生联系，并找到有用的健康信息，包括来自可靠的医生的有用的回答。我们仅要求您提供可帮助我们为您提供此服务的数据，并使用提供的数据来改善您的服务体验。

trans-unit.source: We will keep the personal information that you provide to us safe and secure. Our data security practices always meet or exceed industry standards. We use technology, policies, and conduct, together with a privacy-centered company culture, to ensure that your data is safe.
trans-unit.target: 我们将安全可靠的保留您提供给我们的个人信息。我们的数据安全实践始终达到或超过行业标准。我们使用技术，政策和行动，以及以隐私为核心的公司文化，以确保您的数据安全。

trans-unit.source: Our experience is designed to keep your information anonymous and secure. You can add, remove, update, or request a connection to the personal and health information in your Profile at any time (see
trans-unit.target: 我们的经验旨在保持您的信息匿名和安全。您可以随时添加，删除，更新或请求与个人资料中的个人和健康信息的连接（请参阅

trans-unit.source: Sharing is a matter of personal choice. Other than registration information, you are not required to share any information with us to use HealthTap. You share what you want, when you want, and sharing is not required to use HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 分享是个人选择的问题。除了注册信息，您不需要与我们分享任何信息以使用HealthTap。您可以随时分享您想要的内容，并且使用HealthTap进行分享不是硬性要求的。

trans-unit.source: You have the right to know what Personally Identifiable Information we collect and how it is used. Our sharing preferences are transparent and our Privacy Statement discloses this information.
trans-unit.target: 您有权知道我们收集的个人身份信息及其如何使用的。我们的分享偏好是透明的，我们的隐私声明中披露了此信息。

trans-unit.source: I loved my internship at HealthTap. I wanted to experience what a startup was like and do something really transformative in Health. I felt like I wasn't just another intern, and what I did really mattered. Now, I'm so happy to be a part of the full-time team and continue my experience at HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢我在HealthTap的实习。我想体验到一个全新的开始；我希望在健康医疗领域做出一些改变。我觉得我不只是另一个实习生，我所做的真的很重要。现在，我很开心能够成为全职团队的一员，我也将在HealthTap继续工作下去。

trans-unit.source: The best thing about being at HealthTap is that everyone is so passionate and always willing to take time to explain their specific projects. I've learned a lot about the intersection of social media and healthcare and believe that HealthTap is redefining the way people think about doctor- patient interactions.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap最好的地方在于：每个人都那么富有激情，而且非常愿意花时间向别人介绍自己独特的项目。我在社交与健康医护的交叉领域学习到了不少知识，我相信HealthTap能够重构人们旧式的医患关系理念。

trans-unit.source: As an intern at HealthTap, I have realized that HealthTap's number one goal really is to make the world a better place by making relevant health information accessible to everybody. The people that work at HealthTap are some of the most optimistic and caring people that I have met.
trans-unit.target: 作为HealthTap的实习生，我认为HealthTap的第一宗旨，是通过普及相关健康资讯，把世界变得更加美好。在HealthTap工作的人是我见过的最乐观、最充满关怀的人。

trans-unit.source: See our job openings
trans-unit.target: 查看我们的热招职位

trans-unit.source: If you're capable, positive, creative, driven, efficient and a team player, let's connect today. All experienced candidates who are eager to work for a fast-growing company, are ready to hit the ground running and are driven by our common goal of helping improve people's lives are encouraged to apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有能力，积极，有创造力，努力工作，高效率和优秀的团队合作，立即加入我们吧。只要您经验丰富，希望能为一个快速成长的公司效力，准备好了不断向前，为了帮助改善人们的生活而不断进取。我们都欢迎您的加入。
