trans-unit.source: HealthTap is here to help you. Our Interactive Health Network and mobile apps connect doctors with patients in smarter ways, provide education to those who seek it and disseminate trusted, vetted, peer-reviewed health information far and wide!
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在这里帮助您。我们的健康互动网络和移动应用程序以更智能的方式将医生与患者联系起来，为那些寻求它的人提供教育，并广泛传播可信赖的，仔细审查的，同行评议的健康信息！

trans-unit.source: , we connect you directly with the best health information and the best doctors, from your mobile device or on the web. Here at HealthTap, there’s no waiting room.
trans-unit.target: 我们从您的移动设备或在网络上直接与您的最佳健康信息和最好的医生联系。在HealthTap，不设候诊室。

trans-unit.source: See what members and doctors are saying
trans-unit.target: 看看会员和医生在说什么！

trans-unit.source: , we give you the opportunity and tools to build your online and real-world reputation while making a difference. Attract new patients while also improving the quality of health information online.
trans-unit.target: 我们为您提供机会和工具，以树立您自己的在线和现实声誉，使您有所作为。吸引新患者，同时提高在线健康信息的质量。

trans-unit.source: at no cost.
trans-unit.target: 免费。

trans-unit.source: , we want to provide you the tools to give the people you serve access to the most trustworthy health information available online
trans-unit.target: ，我们想为您提供的工具，让您服务的人们可以在线获得最值得信任的健康信息

trans-unit.source: Connect with me
trans-unit.target: 与我联系

trans-unit.source: Doctors have already answered similar questions. See if they've already answered yours.
trans-unit.target: 医生已经回答过相似问题。如果他们已经回答过您，请查看

trans-unit.source: These values reflect who we are, both as individuals and as a company. We discuss these values at every team meeting and measure ourselves against them at every opportunity to do so. They guide who we hire and how we work together. They shape the decisions we make and how we grow.
trans-unit.target: 这些价值观反映了作为个人和公司，我们是谁。在每一次的团队会议中我们都会讨论他们的价值并且一有这样的机会我们就会对照他们以此来审视自己。他们指导我们招募谁，以及我们如何一起工作。它们塑造了我们做出的决定和我们的成长。

trans-unit.source: We're committed to creating a healthier, happier world — one person at a time. To accomplish this, we provide people with reliable, personal health information and trusted answers to real health questions. Our goal is to support doctors and other health experts in helping people make the best possible health decisions.
trans-unit.target: 我们致力于创造一个更健康，更快乐的世界 — 一次一个人为做到这一点，我们向人们提供真实可靠的个人健康信息以及对真正健康问题的可信回答。我们的目标是协助医生和其他健康专家帮助人们做出最好的健康决策。

trans-unit.source: We envision a world where people everywhere can quickly find reliable answers to their health questions, and easily get access to the best experts that will guide them towards a healthier happier life. We envision a future where people can tap into their personal health information, using HealthTap, to manage their health and well-being, feel good and thrive. We are realizing this vision by helping connect people with trustworthy doctors, online and offline, and by improving the quality of care, while saving time and lowering the costs of care.
trans-unit.target: 我们想象中的世界是人们不管在哪里都可以迅速得到有关他们健康问题的可靠回答并且可以轻易地和那些能够指引他们拥有更健康快乐生活的专家取得联系。我们想在不久的将来人们能够通过HealthTap获得他们各自的健康信息来使他们获得健康快乐和茁壮成长。不管是线上或是线下，我们帮助人们与值得信赖的医生取得联系并且在节约时间和金钱的同时提高医护质量，以此来实现这一愿景。

trans-unit.source: Our first responsibility is to do good for the individuals who use HealthTap, especially when making decisions that affect their health and the health of their loved ones. We care deeply about people and are committed to providing information that meets the highest standards of safety and validity.
trans-unit.target: 我们的首要职责是为那些使用HealthTap的人做一些有益的事，特别是当我们需要做一些有关他们自身或他们深爱的人的健康决策时。我们深切地关心人们并且致力于提供一些最有效的符合最高标准的信息。

trans-unit.source: We value and honor the trust of those who use HealthTap. We treat the personal information of individuals with the utmost care and maintain the highest standards of privacy and security.
trans-unit.target: 我们重视和尊重那些信任HealthTap的人。我们将极其谨慎地对待每个人的私人信息并最高要求地保证其安全隐私性。

trans-unit.source: We believe in collaboration and recognize that partnership is integral to realizing our vision. We are committed to being a great partner, and to attracting and retaining the world's best organizations and institutions as collaborators.
trans-unit.target: 我们坚信合作是实现我们美好愿景的重要组成部分。在努力成为一个良好的合作伙伴的同时我们还致力于吸引和留住这些世界上最顶级的组织机构。

trans-unit.source: We care about our partners' needs and interests and we are committed to their success. We believe that active listening, transparency and trust are central to creating effective, long-term partnerships.
trans-unit.target: 我们关心我们合作伙伴的需求和爱好，并且会尽自己最大努力帮助他们取得成功。我们坚信积极的倾听、透明的管理制度和彼此的信任是创造长期有效合作最重要的部分。

trans-unit.source: We are committed to creating and maintaining a place where our employees love to work. We are responsible for ensuring that our employees are treated with care and respect, and that they are challenged to achieve their potential.
trans-unit.target: 我们致力于创造一个能使我们员工热爱工作的环境和场所。我们的职责是保证我们的员工能够得到关心和尊重并且使他们的潜力得到最大发挥。

trans-unit.source: We believe that work can be play, and that working hard toward a worthy goal is one of the most fulfilling ways to spend our time. We believe that happy, fulfilled employees who share a commitment to changing the world will bring forth the creativity and passion needed to fulfill our vision.
trans-unit.target: 我们相信工作可以作为一种兴趣的玩乐，朝着一个有价值的目标并且不断地努力工作是十分有意义的。我们相信一个献身于改变世界的乐观员工会为实现我们的愿景注入新鲜的血液及激情。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that being kind is central to living a healthy life, and having a healthy company. However we may differ in our ideas, approaches and perspectives, caring for one another unites us.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信宽容善良是让我们过上健康生活和拥有健康伴侣的重要品质。无论我们的想法，方式和观点有多少不同，但关爱他人是我们共同的初衷。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that being open and transparent facilitates collaboration and teamwork and creates a constructive environment in which the best ideas flourish, regardless of their origins. We believe that openness and transparency, together with integrity and honesty, form the foundation of trust required for our success.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信公开透明将有助于提高团队合作并且营造一个良好的氛围：大家共同碰撞智慧的火花，不论我们来自哪里，有怎样的背景。我们相信开放透明和正直廉洁构成了我们成功所需要的信任。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that as a team we can achieve far more than as a group of individuals, and that the best ideas are developed through a collaborative process. We enjoy interacting with one another and believe that our connection is central to our strength.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信一个团队所能达到的高度远远超过个人并且我们相信最好的创意一定是团队共同努力的结果。我们享受彼此互动的过程并且坚信着彼此的联系是使我们优势更明显的关键。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that something worth doing is worth doing right. We hold ourselves to the highest standards and consistently aim to excel. We like to win, and we love to learn. We enjoy challenging ourselves and strive for personal mastery.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信值得做的事情就是值得去做。。我们坚持最高标准并始终追求卓越。我们喜欢胜利，我们热爱学习。我们喜欢挑战自己并努力为个人掌握。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that the world is changed by passionate people who channel positive energy toward a vision they believe in. Positive energy fuels our progress and brings joy to our journey by helping us endure, see beyond, and overcome challenges and difficulties.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信是那些将正能量转化为动力去实现愿景的充满激情的人们在改变这个世界。正能量加快我们前进的步伐，使我们变得包容，在我们前进的路上为我们带来快乐，帮助我们克服困难险阻。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that 'work' can feel like play, and strive to find and bring into each day playfulness, fun and joy.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信工作可以被看做是一种娱乐，努力寻找并带入每一天的快乐之中。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that childlike wonder fuels creativity, and we are driven by a desire to create the new. We look for new ways of acting, and are not anchored to how things have been done in the past. We question assumptions and the status quo, and ask tough questions that are not easily answered.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信孩子般的好奇能够促使创造力的出现并且我们由需求驱动去寻找创新新的事物。我们不局限于旧的完成方式，我们寻找新的方式去创造。我们不断质疑假设和现状并且不断提出一些很难被回答的问题。

trans-unit.source: . We are driven by changing the world and making a meaningful difference in the lives of millions of people everywhere. In order to achieve our goals, we are focused on driving short term measurable milestones that add up to long term real impact.
trans-unit.target: .改变这个世界和让这个世界上数以百万计的人生活方式发生质的改变是我们最大的动力。为了完成我们的目标，我们首先从一个个小的目标开始累计完成。

trans-unit.source: . We are on a mission to create a healthier world, and we recognize that this starts at home. We pledge to take care of our own health and well-being, and to help others do the same. In large and small ways, we strive to help everyone with whom we interact improve their health and well-being.
trans-unit.target: .我们的使命是创造一个更健康的世界，并且我们认识到这个改变从家里开始。我们承诺照顾好自己的健康和幸福，同样帮助别人实现这样的目标。在大大小小的方面，我们都努力帮助那些与我们保持联系的人们保持提高他们的健康和幸福。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that simple is better, and strive to reduce complexity to its essence. We believe that with good work, any idea can be described on a napkin, and that the effort required to simplify something to its essence is worthwhile.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信简单即更好，并努力简化复杂的本质。我们相信通过努力任何想法都可以被描述为是一张纸巾而那些简化东西的努力对它的本质来说都是很重要的。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that facts and data in context lead to better, truly personalized decisions and improved outcomes. Whenever possible, we will use facts, data, and information as the language of our internal discussions and as the basis for our decisions. When a strong opinion and fact are in opposition, burden of proof will rest on the opinion.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信联系实际情况的事实和数据有助于形成更完善真实的个性化决策和产生更好的效果。一旦可以，我们就会用事实、数据和一些信息作为我们内部讨论的语音和决定基础。当事实与意见不符时，我们将进一步检验核实，改善决策。

trans-unit.source: . We believe that the feeling of being on a mission will help us achieve a greater purpose with our work. As with any adventure, we will take risks and embrace failures, but always learn from our mistakes to make us better. The path to success has its ups and downs and requires a fearless spirit. But most importantly, we recognize that the journey is as rewarding as the destination.
trans-unit.target: .我们相信使命感将有助于我们的工作达到更高的目标。当有任何机遇挑战时，我们都会迎接挑战并且接受失败，但我们总会从失误中不断学习使自己变得更加优秀。成功的道路有它的起伏，但我们有无所畏惧的精神。但最重要的是，我们认识到过程和结果一样让人受益。

trans-unit.source: Very soon, up to 40 million Americans will gain access to healthcare under the Affordable Care Act, but the number of doctors remains the same. We can help!
trans-unit.target: 很快，通过平价医疗法案高达四千万的美国人得到了健康医护，但是医生的数量维持不变。我们可以帮助！

trans-unit.source: "It’s good to know that our little efforts on HealthTap could be a lifesaver for someone else. Makes me want to do even more!”
trans-unit.target: 知道我们在HealthTap上一些微薄之力能够救助他人是一件很幸福的事情。让我想做更多！"

trans-unit.source: "I love answering questions and agreeing with other doctors' answers. I feel like I can learn from their answers as well.”
trans-unit.target: “我喜欢回答问题和同意其他医生的回答。我觉得我也可以从他们的回答中学习。

trans-unit.source: "I have found HealthTap a surprisingly intimate and collegial community. I'm delighted to have formed friendships with some colleagues both across the country and locally.”
trans-unit.target: “我发现HealthTap是一个令人惊讶的亲密和合作的社区。我很开心能与遍布各地的同事建立起不错的友谊。

trans-unit.source: Not a doctor? Help here ›
trans-unit.target: 不是一位医生吗?这里需要帮助 ›

trans-unit.source: Great! Now tell your colleagues who invited them
trans-unit.target: 太棒了！现在告诉您的同事是谁邀请的他们

trans-unit.source: Fast, free access anytime anywhere
trans-unit.target: 快速，随时随地免费访问

trans-unit.source: Better quality of care
trans-unit.target: 更好的医护质量

trans-unit.source: money
trans-unit.target: 钱

trans-unit.source: Significant savings of time
trans-unit.target: 大大节省时间

trans-unit.source: "Every time I have a question, I send it and get a response in no time. It doesn’t matter what my question is about or when I ask, someone always answers.”
trans-unit.target: “每次我有一个问题，我发送它并很快得到一个答复。我是什么时候提出的问题或者我的问题是有关什么的并不重要，总有人会回答：

trans-unit.source: "Thanks HealthTap and all your wonderful doctors! If it weren’t for your kindness, I probably would not be here today thanking you!”
trans-unit.target: “感谢HealthTap和像您这样所有伟大的医生！如果不是您的仁慈，我可能今天不会在这里感谢您！

trans-unit.source: "I couldn’t believe the attention these physicians were giving my issues; such real-time interactive insight at my fingertips…. Thanks to you and may God bless the hands that heal.”
trans-unit.target: “我不敢相信这些内科医生对我问题的重视；像这样十分真实的互动随手可得……感谢您，愿上帝保佑那治病救人的手。

trans-unit.source: Are you a doctor? Help here ›
trans-unit.target: 您是一位医生吗？这里需要帮助 ›

trans-unit.source: sound familiar? How about paying a costly service for ratings?
trans-unit.target: 听起来很熟悉？如何为评分支付昂贵的服务？

trans-unit.source: Interviewing doctors, creating surveys, running data
trans-unit.target: 采访医生，创建调查，运行数据

trans-unit.source: Now you can get top doctor lists for free from HealthTap. Rankings are comprehensive, reliable and customizable. You get the lists you want, when you want them.
trans-unit.target: 现在您可以从HealthTap免费获得知名医生名单排名是全面，可靠和可定制。当您需要他们时，您可以得到您想要的名单。

trans-unit.source: Lists can be used in connection with everything from special issues dedicated to best doctors to one-off articles. Sign up for access today!
trans-unit.target: 名单可以用于与从最好的医生的专门问题到一次性文章的一切。立即注册访问！

trans-unit.source: Modern medicine and healthcare too often emphasize “health” over “care,” focusing more on treatments and medications than on the human aspect of care. As patients, we also have very few opportunities to show our deep appreciation and gratitude for the doctors who give us hope and help us at some of our most challenging of times.
trans-unit.target: 现代医疗和健康医护注重于强调”健康”超过”关怀”，更注重于治疗和药物而不是人自身方面的关怀。作为一个患者来说，我们很少有机会向在我们面临挑战时帮助我们的医生来表达我们内心的感激。

trans-unit.source: “Thanks doc!” is multimedia art installation taking viewers on a symbolic journey of care and gratitude, and highlighting the impact of caring for others by sharing knowledge and showing compassion. The piece uses actual words of thanks that patients have shared with doctors, demonstrating the often unspoken appreciation we feel for the doctors who help us overcome adversity, and who tend to us when we need it most.
trans-unit.target: “谢谢您，医生！”的多媒体艺术让观看者通过这些文本符号来表达关怀和感激，并且强调通过分享知识和表现同情对关爱他人的重要影响。患者通过使用特定的语言文本与医生分享他们内心的感激，证明我们虽然不常用语言来表达但我们还是十分感谢他们帮助我们度过苦难以及在最需要他们的时候无条件靠近陪伴。

trans-unit.source: These expressions of deep, true thanks were posted by real patients on HealthTap’s iPhone, Android, and iPad apps, and online on healthtap.com. The doctors in the exhibit are part of HealthTap’s rapidly growing Medical Expert Network.
trans-unit.target: 患者通过iPhone, 安卓和iPad中下载的HealthTap的软件或者直接登入HealthTap的网站来留言表示他们内心深处最真实的感激。这些被展出的医生是HealthTap医学专家网络中快速发展的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The series of 18 panels (above) combines images of helpful doctors with real patient thank you notes. The installation was first displayed at the Stanford MedicineX Conference at the Stanford School of Medicine on September 29–30, 2012.
trans-unit.target: 这一系列是获得患者感谢卡的有帮助的医生照片的18个展板。2012年9月29日至30日这个装置第一次在斯坦福大学的医学会议中展出。

trans-unit.source: Patients, share your thanks for a doctor who's made a difference in your life. Doctors, share notes of appreciation from your patients.
trans-unit.target: 患者，分享您的感谢与使您的生活有所不同的医生。医生，分享您的患者的感谢信。

trans-unit.source: Submit your thanks today
trans-unit.target: 立刻提交您的感谢

trans-unit.source: This simple act goes a long way toward improving your mood and the mood of those around you, reducing stress and spreading happiness in a fantastic and contagious way. This is why we’ve made sure to incorporate this positive energy into what we build for you.
trans-unit.target: 这一个微小的动作将会愉悦您以及您周围人的心情，减轻压力并且以一个极棒的方式散播这份愉悦。这就是为什么我们十分确定地要将这份正能量融合进我们现在正在为您做的。

trans-unit.source: In 2011, our Founder & CEO, Ron Gutman gave a TED Talk on the hidden power of smiling. Within weeks of becoming available online, it became one of the most "liked” TED talks of all time.
trans-unit.target: 2011年，我们的创始人兼首席执行官Ron Gutman就微笑的隐藏力量在TED发表演讲。在上线几周内，它成为了所有时间内最喜欢的TED演讲之一。

trans-unit.source: by Ron Gutman brings together even more unique findings from his deep research of the science and history of smiling, with anecdotes from his outreach to social media and his travels around the world. The book reveals the astonishing benefits that smiling can produce for you and for others, and includes tips for how to bring more smiles into your life and to the lives of others.
trans-unit.target: Ron Gutman将他对微笑地科学历史的深入研究的结果和延伸的社会媒体和他环游世界的旅行中的奇闻异事联接在一起。这本书讲述了微笑可以为您和别人产生的令人震惊的优势并且也包含了怎么为自己和他人的生活带来更多的微笑的秘诀。

trans-unit.source: Smile: The Astonishing Powers of a Simple Act
trans-unit.target: 微笑：一个简单行为的惊人力量

trans-unit.source: Ron is HealthTap's Founder and CEO. He is responsible for the company's innovation, vision and product.
trans-unit.target: Ron是HealthTap的创始人和CEO。他负责公司的创新，愿景和产品。

trans-unit.source: Ron is also an avid public speaker and writer, frequently presenting at health and technology conferences (such as TED, SXSW and Health 2.0) and contributing pieces about technology, health and smiling in leading publications (such as Forbes, the Huffington Post, and TEDBooks). Additionally, he serves as the Curator of TEDx Silicon Valley.
trans-unit.target: Ron同时也是一个热心的公众演说家和作家，常常出现在有关健康和技术的会议中（比如TED, SXSW和Health 2.0）并且为有关技术、健康和领先的核心刊物（比如Forbes, the Huffington Post, 和TEDBooks）上的发表做贡献。此外，他还是TEDx硅谷的管理者。

trans-unit.source: As a graduate student at Stanford University, Ron organized and led a multidisciplinary group of faculty and graduate students conducting research in personalized health and in the design of ways to help people live healthier, happier lives. The group's work resulted in the implementation of one of the most acclaimed and engaging employee health and well-being programs in the nation, BeWell@Stanford.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个从斯坦福大学毕业的学生而言，Ron组织领导了一个由多个学院和毕业学生组成的多学科交融的团队来研究调查个人的健康和涉及不同的方式使人们生活更加健康快乐。这个团队的工作使得这个最让人欢呼雀跃、最具有魅力的关于员工健康福祉的项目之一在这个国家展开。

trans-unit.source: In addition to his passion for health and well-being, Ron is passionate about smiling. After discovering the transformative potential of smiling in his own life, he began to research the benefits of smiling for the self, others, and changing social situations for the better. His research and learnings on the Hidden Powers of Smiling are chronicled in a TED Talk, an article on Forbes.com and a TED book .
trans-unit.target: 除了对健康和幸福的热情，Ron还热衷于微笑。在他在自己的生活中发现微笑具有改革变化的能力后，他开始研究调查微笑对自身和他人的优势并且想要使社会条件变得更好。他对于微笑隐藏能力的研究和学习被TED大会、Forbes的文章和TED的书所记载。

trans-unit.source: Ron is HealthTap's Founder and CEO. He's responsible for the company's innovation, vision, and product. Prior to founding HealthTap, Ron was the founder and CEO of a leading online consumer health 2.0 company that developed the world's largest community of independent health writers and became one of the largest health sites on the Internet, serving more than 100 million users (acquired in early 2009).
trans-unit.target: Ron是HealthTap的创始人和CEO。他负责公司的创新，愿景和产品。在创立HealthTap之前，Ron是一个领先的网络公司的创始人和总裁。这个网络公司不仅培养了世界上最大的有关健康方面的独立作家并且从2009年开始到现在服务了至少十亿人成为了网络最大的健康网站之一。

trans-unit.source: Co-Founder & Chief Medical Information Officer
trans-unit.target: 联合创始人和首席医务信息官

trans-unit.source: Geoff is HealthTap's co-founder and Chief Medical Information Officer. He is responsible for the architecture of HealthTap's Medical Knowledge Base. Prior to joining HealthTap, Geoff served as the Chief Medical Officer and the Executive Vice President of Product Development at ePocrates, as the Chief Medical Officer of Wellsphere, and created the first consumer health site at Healtheon (WebMD). Additionally, Geoff has served as the Chief of Medical Informatics in Emergency Medicine for Harvard University teaching hospital Beth Israel, and on the clinical faculty in Emergency Medicine at Stanford University and UCSD.
trans-unit.target: Geoff是HealthTap的联合创始人和首席医务信息官。他负责建立HealthTap的医学知识库。再加入HealthTap之前，Geoff是ePocrates的首席医务官和副总裁、Wellsphere的总裁。并且他在Healtheon创造了第一个有关客户健康的网站。此外，Geoff在哈佛附属医院以色列医院的急症医学科担任首席药物信息官，在斯坦福大学和加利福尼亚大学圣迭戈分校的急症医学科担任临床教员。

trans-unit.source: Sean is HealthTap’s Head of Product. He is responsible for taking product ideas and feedback from concept to market, and into the hands of millions of patients and doctors around the world. Sean is an engineer, designer, and serial technology entrepreneur. Prior to HealthTap, Sean was the co-founder of PayoutHub, a social game-monetization platform (acquired in 2009), and the co-founder and COO of GXStudios (GoCrossCampus and PickTeams), a venture-backed pioneer of online team-based casual games. Sean has also worked with leading health and technology firms. Sean also co-founded and led the Yale Entrepreneurial Institute, the University’s official incubator and fellowship program for entrepreneurs. Sean has a technical background in UIUX development and design, and holds inventions in the fields of oral drug delivery, urinary incontinence, genetic testing, and polymer nanocomposites.
trans-unit.target: Sean是HealthTap的产品总监。他负责将产品理念和反馈从概念推向市场，并被全球数百万患者和医生掌握。Sean是一位工程师，设计师和一系列技术的企业家。在加入HealthTap之前，Sean是一个叫PayoutHub有关游戏钱币化平台的组织（收购于2009年）的共同创立人，也是一个叫GXStudios(GoCrossCampus and PickTeams)有关资金支持在线团队休闲游戏的组织的共同创立人、首席运营官。Sean还与领先的卫生和技术公司合作。Sean也是耶鲁大学创业协会的共同创立人和引领者，该协会在这个学校为企业家们提供机会和奖学金计划。Sean拥有UIUX的研发技术背景，并且在口服药、尿失禁、基因检测和聚合物纳米复合材料领域中拥有一些发明。

trans-unit.source: Sean holds an M.B.A. from Stanford Graduate School of Business and a B.S. (with Distinction) in Biomedical Engineering from Yale University.
trans-unit.target: Sean荣获斯坦福大学商学院的M.B.A.和B.S.（荣誉毕业生）在耶鲁大学的生物医学工程。

trans-unit.source: Co-Founder & CTO
trans-unit.target: 联合创始人和CTO

trans-unit.source: Sastry is HealthTap's co-founder and CTO. He is responsible for HealthTap's innovative technology platform. Prior to joining HealthTap, Sastry served as Chief Technology Officer and Executive Vice President at Wellsphere, the CTO of HealthCentral, and the former Director of Software Development at Microvision. Sastry has lead technology teams to build market-leading products and tools, including ERwin, the world's most popular data modeling software.
trans-unit.target: Ron是HealthTap的联合创始人和CTO。他负责HealthTap技术平台的创新。在加入HealthTap之前，Sastry是Wellsphere的首席技术官和副总裁，HealthCentral的首席技术官，也是Microvision的前软件开发主管。Sastry带领她的团队开发了在市场中处于领先地位的产品和工具，包括世界上最有名的数据建模软件——Erwin。

trans-unit.source: Chief Privacy Officer, General Counsel, & Business Development Director
trans-unit.target: 首席隐私保密官、总顾问、业务发展总监。

trans-unit.source: Michael is HealthTap's Chief Privacy Officer, General Counsel, and Business Development Director. He is responsible for HealthTap's privacy and legal policies, the company’s legal affairs, and for HealthTap’s business development. For over a dozen years, Michael has provided legal counsel and services to innovative technology companies, from early-stage startups to Fortune 100 companies. Prior to joining HealthTap, Michael served as an attorney with national law firms in Silicon Valley, as general counsel to high technology companies, and as pro-bono counsel to Singularity University. Additionally, Michael has served as a Judge Pro Tem in Santa Clara County, and as a judicial clerk in the Washington D.C. Court of Appeals. At Yale Law School, Michael was an editor of the
trans-unit.target: Michael是HealthTap的首席隐私保密官、总顾问、业务发展总监。他负责HealthTap的隐私和法律政策、公司的法律事务以及公司的商业发展。十多年了，Michael提供法律顾问和服务来创新驱动科技公司，这些公司包括刚刚创业的公司到一百强公司。在加入HealthTap之前，Michael是硅谷国家事务律师所的律师，是高科技公司的总顾问，也是奇点大学公益法律顾问。除此之外，Michael曾在在圣克拉拉县担任当地的法官一职，也曾在华盛顿上诉法院担任司法书记。在耶鲁法学院，Michael是的编辑

trans-unit.source: Michael holds A.B. (honors) and M.A. degrees from Stanford University, and a J.D. from the Yale Law School.
trans-unit.target: Michael荣获A.B.（荣誉）斯坦福大学的硕士学位、耶鲁大学法学院的法学博士。

trans-unit.source: Dr. Jeff Livingston is HealthTap's Medical Director. He is a national thought leader and speaker on doctor adoption of social media. He has been a doctor at MacArthur OB/GYN since 2003 in Irving, Texas. He previously served as Chairman of the Obstetrics and Gynecology Department at Baylor Medical Center of Irving. Several national publications, including USA Today, Wired magazine, Computerworld.com and Physicians Practice have featured his combined use of Facebook, Twitter and a secure patient portal to effectively communicate with patients and to better meet their everyday healthcare needs.
trans-unit.target: Dr. Jeff Livingston是HealthTap的医疗主管。他是一个国家思想领袖和关于医生采用社交媒体倡议者。他2003年曾在德克萨斯州欧文市担任MacArthur OB / GYN的医生。他先前是欧文贝勒医学中心妇产科的主席。一些国家刊物，包括《今日美国》、《连线》杂志、《计算机世界》和《医生诊疗》精选整合了Facebook, Twitter和患者安全的门户来有效的与患者沟通交流和应和他们每天的健康医护需求。

trans-unit.source: Dr. Livingston serves on the Medical Advisory Board for HealthTap and he is the Chief Medical officer for Healthcare Transformation Solutions. He is on Twitter as @macobgyn and is an active doctor blogger.
trans-unit.target: Livingston医生在HealthTap的顾问委员会就职并且是健康医护转换解决方案的首席医务官。他Twitter为@macobgyn，是一位活跃的医生博主。

trans-unit.source: We're hiring! Visit our
trans-unit.target: 我们正在招募。访问我们

trans-unit.source: Enhance your practice, hospital or health website with a free, customized HealthTap widget. In less than five minutes, you can be up-and-running with HealthTap functionality that allows your visitors to ask health questions, learn about top doctors, or view health tips on the topic of your choice right from your site!
trans-unit.target: 添加您通过医院或者网上的免费诊疗来自定义HealthTap小工具。在五分钟之内，您可以通过HealthTap的功能来让您问一些有关健康问题，了解最顶级的医生和直接在您的网站上浏览一些有关健康的秘诀使自己变得生龙活虎。

trans-unit.source: before they call you after hours
trans-unit.target: 之前在几个小时后他们打电话给您

trans-unit.source: from your website
trans-unit.target: 从您的网站

trans-unit.source: by giving patients the opportunity to use HealthTap
trans-unit.target: 通过给患者使用HealthTap的机会

trans-unit.source: Have a website or app that could benefit from the power of HealthTap? Tap into HealthTap's powerful content creation engine that provides interactive, real-time access to the most trusted medical expertise in the world.
trans-unit.target: 有一个网站或应用程序，可以从HealthTap的力量获得福利？利用HealthTap强大的引擎内容来提供互动并实时访问到世界上最值得心灵的医学专家。

trans-unit.source: We are joining forces with the world's best partners and third-party developers. If you have an idea on how HealthTap's service can complement your existing website or application,
trans-unit.target: 我们正与世界上最好的合作伙伴和第三方开发商合作。如果您对怎样能使HealthTap的服务让您想更久地待在这个网站或程序有任何的补充或想法

trans-unit.source: with your colleagues from medical school and residency. Learn how top colleagues in your area of practice are answering medical questions.
trans-unit.target: 从医学院与您的同事。了解您诊疗领域的知名同事如何回答医疗问题。

trans-unit.source: for your compassion, medical expertise and answers. Compete locally, statewide, nationally and within specialized “Known for” categories.
trans-unit.target: 为您的仁慈，医疗专长和回答。在本地、本州、国家以及在专门的“专攻”类别。

trans-unit.source: Show patients and referring doctors, in your community and around the world, what you are known for. Create visibility. Manage your online reputation.
trans-unit.target: 显示患者和转诊医生，在您的社区和世界各地展示您的专攻领域。创建可见性。管理您的线上声誉。

trans-unit.source: Download your mobile app. Or we'll make you your own.
trans-unit.target: 下载您的移动应用程序。或者我们会让您成为您自己的。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a platform for me to participate in patient education. Indeed, it's also a place where doctors can learn pearls from each other, and that's very valuable.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是我参与患者教育的平台。确实，在这里医生们也可以从互相身上学习到一些很珍贵的东西。

trans-unit.source: Useful health tips + beautiful images, delivered daily. Choose from 100 helpful topics.
trans-unit.target: 有帮助的健康小贴士+美丽的图像，每日推送。从100个有帮助的话题中选择

trans-unit.source: Extend Your Reach
trans-unit.target: 延伸您的研究

trans-unit.source: Virtualize Your Practice
trans-unit.target: 在线化您的诊疗

trans-unit.source: Connect With Patients
trans-unit.target: 连接患者

trans-unit.source: Build Your Reputation
trans-unit.target: 建立您的声誉

trans-unit.source: Customize your patient app
trans-unit.target: 自定义您的患者应用程序

trans-unit.source: Follow a doctor to receive their HealthTap answers, interactions and updates on your feed. You can also start a private conversation by sending the doctor a message or requesting an in-person appointment.
trans-unit.target: 关注一位医生来获得他们的HealthTap回答，相互交流并且更新您的主页。您也可以通过给您的医生发一个信息来开始一个私人的对话或者请求一个面对面的交流机会。

trans-unit.source: Did you find a particular doctor's answer helpful? Show them your appreciation with just one click by thanking them. You'll also have the opportunity to provide a personalized thank you note.
trans-unit.target: 您找到一个特别的医生有帮助的回答吗？向他们表示感谢，只需点击一下感谢他们。您还将有机会提供个性化的感谢信。

trans-unit.source: Topic pages provide a general overview of a health topic, and reflect the collective wisdom of HealthTap Medical Experts. In addition to a description, you'll find links to relevant content (including Answers, Tips, and Health Guides) and to related Topics. Current Top Doctors for each Topic are featured on this page. You can add content to Health Guides, and even share content, directly from a Topic page.
trans-unit.target: 话题页面提供关于健康话题的总体概述，并反映HealthTap医学专家的集体智慧。除了描述之外，您还可以找到相关内容（包括答复，小贴士和健康指南）以及相关话题的链接。本页面显示每个话题的当前热门医生。您可以直接从话题页面添加内容到健康指南，甚至分享内容。

trans-unit.source: If you can improve a description on HealthTap simply select "Edit description" and make your changes. These will take effect immediately, and you'll be identified as the most recent editor to the Topic description.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想改进HealthTap上的描述，只需选择“编辑描述”并进行更改。这些将立即生效，您将被标识为话题描述的最新编辑人。

trans-unit.source: Let the doctor know what your requested visit concerns. You can even attach an image if you’d like.
trans-unit.target: 告诉医生您要求访问的关注。如果您愿意您也可以附上一幅照片

trans-unit.source: All the responses to questions that have been answered appear on this page, where you can Thank experts, send Thank You Notes, and even Share the Answers that you appreciate. You can also add to your Health Activity and see Top Doctors on Related Topics.
trans-unit.target: 所有的对于这个问题的回答将会出现在这一页中，在这里您可以感谢专家，发送感谢信甚至可以分享您觉得有用的回答。您也可以添加到您的健康活动，并看到相关话题的知名医生。

trans-unit.source: Questions & Answers
trans-unit.target: 问题和回答

trans-unit.source: All of the answers by Medical Experts appear below the question. Quickly browse the summary responses then read the detailed answers. The most relevant, highly ranked responses appear first.
trans-unit.target: 医学专家的所有回答都出现在这个问题下面。快速浏览回复摘要，然后阅读详细的回答。首先出现最相关的和排名最高的。

trans-unit.source: Thank Medical Experts for the Answers that you appreciate. Thanking earns you points, and shows gratitude for the great health information provided.
trans-unit.target: 感谢医学专家您欣赏的回答。感谢获得了您的观点并且对得到的健康信息表示感谢。

trans-unit.source: After you Thank an Expert, you'll have an opportunity to add a Thank You Note. Thank You Notes show added appreciation, and experts can post these notes to their Virtual Practices. (Please do not include any questions or information in these notes, and only send what you agree can be publicly shared).
trans-unit.target: 在您感谢专家后，您将获得添加一封感谢信的机会。感谢信表达了感激并且专家们可以通过在线诊疗将这些注意事项展示出来。（请不要再这封信中出现任何个人问题或信息，请只写您同意能够被公开发表分享的）

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s now gives you instant access to the latest peer-reviewed medical research, together with insights about it and comments on it from the medical experts on HealthTap. Have a question about a published study? We’ve got you covered – you can send a public question to our network, or even ask the doctor of your choice a question about the research via a Private Conversation on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap现在使您能够及时访问到最新医学研究的同行评议和关于它的简介以及HealthTap医学专家对此的评论。对已发表的研究有一个问题？我们将全方面的为您提供帮助——您可以向我们的网络发送公开的问题，您甚至可以在HealthTap通过私人对话直接问您选择的医生有关调查研究的问题。

trans-unit.source: Want clarification? Ask a question about the article to our community of experts, or even enter into a Private Conversation about it with the doctor you choose.
trans-unit.target: 想要解释？您可以向我们的专家团队咨询一些有关这篇文章的问题，您也可以选择一个医生进行单独的会话。

trans-unit.source: Want to know what other doctors think of the research? Read the comments posted by medical experts, and learn what they have to say.
trans-unit.target: 想知道什么其他医生认为可以研究？读医学专家发表的评论，并理解他们说了什么。

trans-unit.source: Want to learn more? Quickly find other related publications on HealthTap, including similar research or articles by the same authors.
trans-unit.target: 想了解更多吗？迅速在HealthTap上找到其他相关出版物，包括同一作者类似的研究或文章。

trans-unit.source: Search & Ask
trans-unit.target: 搜索和询问

trans-unit.source: Points are a sign of your engagement on HealthTap and your engagement with your personal health. View your points directly from your home page. The higher your points, the more stars you'll have.
trans-unit.target: 积分是您参与HealthTap以及个人健康的标志直接从您的首页查看您的积分。您的分数越高，您会拥有更多的星星。

trans-unit.source: Add items to your Health History to personalize the information, doctors, and people HealthTap presents to you. Save items to your Health History to create a personal health record and to better inform you and your doctor, and to improve your Dr. Visit Prep Sheets.
trans-unit.target: 向您的健康历史记录中添加内容，使HealthTap向您提供个性化的信息，医生和人员。在您的健康历史记录中保存内容以创建个人健康记录，更好地通知您和您的医生，并完善您的医生预备访问表。

trans-unit.source: Thank doctors for useful answers they post. Showing your appreciation encourages more answers, which helps everyone.
trans-unit.target: 感谢医生他们发布的有帮助的回答。您的感谢将鼓励更多回答的提供，这对大家都有帮助。

trans-unit.source: Select the doctor you’d like to ask a personal question to and start your private conversation. In this interaction, your real name, Health Profile and Health Activity will be shown to the doctor.
trans-unit.target: 选择您想要提出个人问题的医生，并开始私人谈话。在交谈中，医生将会看到您的真实姓名，健康档案和健康活动。

trans-unit.source: Once you submit your question, the doctor will be notified. When the doctor responds, you’ll be notified. This response will be visible only to you inside your Timeline. You or the doctor can attach images to the question. Private questions and answers are available for a small fee.
trans-unit.target: 当您提交了您的问题后，医生会得到通知。当医生有回复后，您会得到通知。此回复在您的时间轴中只对您显示。您或医生可以为问题附上图像。私人问题和回答会收取少量费用。

trans-unit.source: If you’d like to follow up with an additional question for this doctor, you can do so. Follow up messages to a private conversation are available at half price.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想跟进这个医生的其他问题，您可以这样做。后续私人咨询的消息可以半价获得。

trans-unit.source: After you enter a search, similar questions and related information (including Answers, Tips, Health Guides, Topics, Medical Experts and members) are shown. If your question is new and hasn't been answered, you can submit it to our thousands of Medical Experts.
trans-unit.target: 在您输入搜索后，将会看到类似的问题和相关信息（包括答复，小贴士，健康指南，话题，医学专家和会员）如果您的问题是新的还没有得到回答，您可以把问题提交给我们的数以千计的医学专家。

trans-unit.source: Enter your health question here (up to 150 characters in length). You can also search for health information and existing answers on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 在此输入您的健康问题（最多150个字符）。您还可以在HealthTap上搜索健康信息和现有回答。

trans-unit.source: Asking a question for someone else? Want to share the answer? Enter their email addresses here and we’ll notify them when the question is answered.
trans-unit.target: 为其他人咨询一个问题想分享这个回答吗？在这里输入他们的电子邮件地址，我们将会在问题得到回答时通知他们.

trans-unit.source: We've kept is simple, with one search box. Enter what you're looking for and use the tabs to limit results to questions, doctors, topics, or groups.
trans-unit.target: 我们保持简单，只有一个搜索框。输入您想要查找的内容，然后使用标签将检索结果限制在问题，医生，话题或群组。

trans-unit.source: through your Virtual Practice.
trans-unit.target: 通过您的在线诊疗。

trans-unit.source: answering patient questions
trans-unit.target: 回答患者的问题

trans-unit.source: by doing what you do best
trans-unit.target: 通过做您最好的

trans-unit.source: for your compassion and medical expertise as expressed your answers. Win annual regional or national awards in each specialty and other special awards throughout the year.
trans-unit.target: 由于您在您的回答中所表现出的爱心和医学专业知识。赢得每一专科的年度地区或国家奖项以及其他特别奖项。

trans-unit.source: Download HealthTap Express for Medical Experts on iPhone, Android, and iPad
trans-unit.target: 在iPhone,安卓和iPad上下载为医学专家的HealthTap Express

trans-unit.source: Your Virtual Practice page is how users see you on HealthTap. It is the place where all of the expert content you create, Agree with, and curate appear. Your professional contact information and bio also appear here. This is the place to send existing and prospective patients to demonstrate your expertise.
trans-unit.target: 您的在线诊疗页面是用户如何在HealthTap上看到您。这是您创建，同意和策展的所有专家内容出现的地方。您的专业联系信息和个人资料也出现在这里。这里是传送现有的和可能的患者以展示您的专业知识的地方

trans-unit.source: Members can easily access relevant information that you share under five tabs: Answers, Tips & Health Guides (the content you've created), Feed (your HealthTap activity and the activity of your network), Network (your Network), About (your professional contact information and your accomplishments), and Award Wall (the Awards and Thanks you've received).
trans-unit.target: 会员可以轻松访问您在五个标签下分享的相关信息：回答，小贴士和健康指南(您创建的内容)，主页(您的HealthTap活动和您的网络的活动)，网络(您的网络)，关于(您的专业联系信息和您的成就)和奖墙(奖项和您收到的感谢)。

trans-unit.source: Your statistics are a reflection of your engagement on HealthTap. Raising your stats raises your rank among your peers and enhances your Trust Score, which helps get you featured to new and existing patients.
trans-unit.target: 您的统计数字反映了您在HealthTap的参与程度。完善您的统计数据有利于提升您在同行中的排名，并提高您的信任分数，这有助于您在新的和现有的患者中彰显特色。

trans-unit.source: Your Virtual Practice is the place where you can create content and interact with others on HealthTap. From here you can answer questions and see your latest activity. You can also Agree with content created by other experts and refer questions to them, as well as see recently active colleagues, and invite colleagues to join you on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 您的在线诊疗指的是您可以在HeathTap上创建内容并与其他人交流的地方。从这里，您可以回答问题，并查看您的最新活动。您也可以赞同其他专家所创建的内容并向他们提出问题，并看到最近活跃的同事，然后邀请他们在HealthTap加入您。

trans-unit.source: Your points and level indicate how active and engaged you are on HealthTap. Your activity level determines your visibility and reputation on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 您的等级和积分表示您在HealthTap上的积极性和参与度您的活动级别决定了您在HealthTap上的可见性和声誉

trans-unit.source: Build your Virtual Practice while creating professional consensus around the best content on HealthTap. Agreeing with answers adds them to your Virtual Practice and helps them become more visible to members and other experts.
trans-unit.target: 在与HealthTap最好的内容创造专业共识时创立您自己的在线诊疗。赞同答复时会把答复添加到您的在线诊疗中，并且有助于答复在面向会员和其他专家时更直观。

trans-unit.source: Message & Recommend
trans-unit.target: 留言与推荐

trans-unit.source: HealthTap recognizes that most doctors have several areas of practice that they are “known for” based on past training or cumulative clinical experience. Therefore we enable you to attract patients to your practice based on up to 5 Known for topics that can be changed at any time. You can also vote your colleagues up in specific categories to improve their standings.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap认可大多数医生的“专攻”领域是基于过去的训练或者累积的临床经验。因此您可以通过五个以内随时可以更改的专攻话题来吸引患者。您也可以在特定领域为您同事投票以提升他们的名次。

trans-unit.source: Promote Your Research
trans-unit.target: 促进您的研究

trans-unit.source: Highlight your published studies, add a user-friendly description of the findings, and even answer user questions about it (including Private Conversation requests). You can also add comments to any other published study on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 突出显示您发表过的研究，添加易于理解的关于研究发现的描述，甚至还回答用户问题（包括私人对话请求）。您还可以向HealthTap上的任何其他已发布研究添加注释。

trans-unit.source: Build your network of referring doctors and patients on HealthTap. This is one of the top ways to grow your DocScore and gain more visibility.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上建立您的推荐医生和患者网络。这是成长您的医者评分并获得更多知名度的最佳方法之一。

trans-unit.source: Thanks & Agrees
trans-unit.target: 感谢和赞同

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s new Publications feature expands the reach of your expertise. Studies in peer-reviewed publications are now highlighted on HealthTap, directly from your Virtual Practice. Your research will be highlighted to Members looking for related health information on HealthTap, and you can even add to the description of your work. Have comments on an existing study? We’ve got you covered – add comments to the publications and even answer public questions or engage in private conversations with members about any study listed on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的新出版物功能拓展了您的专业知识的范围。发表在同行评审出版物的研究现在突出显示在HealthTap上，直接在您的在线诊疗上可以看到。您的研究将突出显示给在HealthTap上寻找相关健康信息的会员，甚至您可以添加到您的工作描述中。对现有研究有评论吗？我们已经覆盖所有操作 - 向出版物添加评论，甚至回答公众问题，或与会员进行关于HealthTap上列出的任何研究的私人谈话。

trans-unit.source: When a patient is looking for your specific expertise, they will send you a private message. You will have the opportunity to reply and get reimbursed for your time and effort. Reimbursement is based on a fixed rate per initial reply and follow ups. You have the potential to earn from $100–$200/hour with typical usage.
trans-unit.target: 当患者查找您的专业知识时，他们将向您发送一条私人消息。您将有机会回复并得到您的时间和精力的补偿。补偿基于每次初始回复和后续行动的固定费率。在典型用途下您有潜在可能获得每小时$100到$200。

trans-unit.source: When an individual asks you a direct question, their basic information will appear at the top of the screen. Click their name to see their Health Activity and Health Profile.
trans-unit.target: 当患者向您直接提出问题时，他们的基本信息将显示在屏幕顶部。点击他们的名称以查看他们的健康活动和健康档案。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to answer this private message, just click the Answer button. If you don't wish to or aren't able to respond within 72 hours, you can instead click the "Sorry, I cannot help you" button below. Responding in a timely fashion will improve your Responsiveness and your DocScore.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要回答这条私人信息，只需点击回答按钮如果在72小时内您不想回复或无法回复，可以点击下面的“对不起，我无法帮助您”按钮。及时回复会提高您的反应灵敏和您的医者评分。

trans-unit.source: When you provide information that really hits the mark, you are likely to get a “Thank You” in return. Each “Thanks” that you receive gives your Helpfulness a boost! On the other hand, responses that are deemed to have missed the target will potentially be marked as “Not Helpful” and will result in a decrease in Helpfulness. You are more likely to get new private messages if you have a higher Helpfulness score.
trans-unit.target: 当您提供的信息确实解决了问题时，您会得到一个“谢谢”作为回报。每个您收到的“谢谢”都会提高您的乐于助人另一方面，被认为没有解决问题的答复可能被标记为“没有帮助”，并且将影响乐于助人指标。如果您有更高的乐于助人得分，您更有可能获得新的私人消息。

trans-unit.source: If you accept private messages through HealthTap, it is important either to answer questions as you receive them or to indicate that you cannot help right now. If you respond one way or the other within 72 hours, you will maintain a high Responsiveness score. You are more likely to receive new private messages if you have a higher Responsiveness rating.
trans-unit.target: 如果您通过HealthTap接受私人消息，重要的是在您收到问题时回答问题，或者表明您现在无法及时帮助。如果您在72小时内以某种方式回复，您将保持高的反应灵敏分数。如果您的反应灵敏等级较高，则您更有可能收到新的私人信息。

trans-unit.source: If you do not wish to respond, or cannot respond within 72 hours, you have the option of respectfully declining the message (by clicking “Sorry, can’t help right now”) and referring it to a colleague. Responding one way or the other preserves your Responsiveness rating.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在72小时不想回复或无法回复，您可以选择尊重地拒绝该消息（通过点击“对不起，现在无法帮助”），并将其转发给同事。回复单向或其他方式保持您的反应灵敏评级。

trans-unit.source: Your reputation, dictated by your activity and engagement in specific areas on HealthTap, is an important variable in how patients find and connect to you. Patients can filter their searches based on what's important to them.
trans-unit.target: 您的声誉由您在HealthTap上的活动和参与特定领域决定，这是一个患者如何找到并联系您的重要指标。患者可以根据对他们重要的内容来筛选他们的搜索。

trans-unit.source: After searching and filtering, matching doctors are shown in a list that patients can interact. DocScore, Known fors and other important data are shown in a snapshot. One click brings patients to your Virtual Practice or allows them to follow your updates and answers that patients can interact with.
trans-unit.target: 在搜索和筛选之后，匹配的医生将显示在患者可以联系交流的列表中。医者评分，专攻领域和其他显示在快照中的重要数据。患者通过点击进入您的在线诊疗，并关注您的更新与回答。

trans-unit.source: This is where you create Answers to questions on HealthTap. Answers should be concise (400 characters or less), friendly, and helpful. Add Topic tags to improve the visibility and accuracy of your Answers.
trans-unit.target: 这是您在HealthTap上创建问题回答的地方。回答应该简洁（400个字符或更少），友好和有帮助。添加话题标签以提高您的回答的可见性和准确性。

trans-unit.source: When an individual asks you a question, their age, gender, location and relation to your Known fors will become visible to you. You will also be able to see if the individual if this patient is in your HealthTap network.
trans-unit.target: 当用户向您提问时，您会看到他们的年龄，性别，地点和与您专攻领域的关系。您还可以看到该患者是否在您的HealthTap网络中。

trans-unit.source: Quickly and easily bring your answers to life by adding pictures and video from your own photo library or the internet. Appropriate images can be used to emphasize the meaning of the information you are providing.
trans-unit.target: 通过从您自己的照片库或互联网添加照片和视频，轻松便捷地为您的生活带来回答。合适的图像可用于强调您提供的信息的含义。

trans-unit.source: Selected medical students from top institutions around the country are personally invited to learn from the HealthTap Medical Expert Network’s best doctors in over 100 specialties. Participants learn how to interpret patient concerns and respond with answers that are both medically accurate and helpful.
trans-unit.target: 来经精挑细选的来自全国顶级学院的医学学生们获得个人邀请，向来自HealthTap医学专家网络中超过100个专科的顶级医生们学习。参与者学习如何理解患者的关注点，以及用医疗上准确和有帮助的回答回复患者。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap U students review real health questions and assist licensed doctors in creating personalized answers. Experienced doctor mentors review, offer feedback and edit those answers. Work that meets mentors' high clinical standards are cosigned and accepted for online publication.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap学院学生回顾真实的健康问题，并帮助有执业执照的医生创建个性化的回答。经验丰富的医生导师审查，提供反馈和编辑那些回答。满足导师的高临床标准的工作是在网上发布的。

trans-unit.source: Want more specifics? Check out our
trans-unit.target: 需要更多详细信息？查看我们的

trans-unit.source: Ask any health question and get quick answers from thousands of trusted, U.S.-licensed doctors. Get updated on fresh information in a real-time feed.
trans-unit.target: 咨询任何健康问题，并获得来自数千名可信赖的，拥有美国执业执照医生的快速回答。更新实时主页中的新鲜信息。

trans-unit.source: Ask one question; get multiple answers from trusted doctors across the country. Access your own personalized, relevant health feed that’s always up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: 询问一个问题; 从全国各地受信任的医生获得多个回答。访问您自己的个性化，相关的始终是最新的主页。

trans-unit.source: Receive daily TipTaps on topics that matter most to you. TipTaps are beautiful, bite-sized, tid-bits of health wisdom delivered to you by the world's best doctors!
trans-unit.target: 接收每日推心小贴士中对您最重要的话题。推心小贴士是由全世界最好的医生提供给您的最杰出的智慧。

trans-unit.source: Access our Doctor Directory to discover the right doctors for you! Search for trusted doctors in your area based on what’s most relevant to you. Make in-person appointments using our easy, digital tools.
trans-unit.target: 访问我们的医生目录，找到适合您的医生！根据与您最相关的内容，搜所您所在地值得信任的医生。使用我们简单的数字工具进行现场预约。

trans-unit.source: Send direct messages to the best doctor to answer your personal question for a small fee. These communications are private and HIPAA-secure. Like a house call, but online!
trans-unit.target: 用少量的费用向最好的医生直接发送消息，以解决私人问题。这些通信是隐私的和HIPAA加密的。就像一个出诊，但是是线上的！

trans-unit.source: Skip co-pays by asking doctors private, secure questions online. Save time with our appointment prep sheets.
trans-unit.target: 跳过共同支付，在线询问医生私人安全的问题。通过我们的预约预订表节省时间。

trans-unit.source: Immunizations, procedures, allergies and more: store your health activity in a HIPAA-secure environment online and access to it all at the click of a button or the pinch of a mobile device. We’ll sort it for you, timeline-style, to make it easy to present to your doctor at in-person appointments.
trans-unit.target: 免疫接种、临床操作、过敏等等：在HIPAA安全环境中将您的健康活动在线存储，并可以在点击按钮或移动设备进行访问。我们会为您按时间表风格排序，使医生在面对面见面中看起其来更容易。

trans-unit.target: 医生推荐的健康与

trans-unit.source: With HealthTap, you get all of the benefits of an optimized website and a robust audience of patients for free. And your interactions on HealthTap are completely secure and safe in accordance with HIPAA standards.

trans-unit.source: Having broad online visibility is critical to creating a thriving practice, but it can be costly and confusing to set up and manage. With HealthTap, you get all of the benefits of an optimized website and a robust audience of patients for free. And your interactions on HealthTap are completely safe and HIPAA-secure.
trans-unit.target: 具有广泛的在线可见性对于创建一个蓬勃发展的诊疗至关重要，但它可能是昂贵的，设置和管理起来很困惑。通过HealthTap，您可以免费获得关于网站优化和强大的患者受众的所有益处。您在HealthTap上的交互是完全安全的，并且HIPAA加密。

trans-unit.source: Create visibility. Manage your online reputation.

trans-unit.source: We are amazed by the passion, focus, and commitment demonstrated by tens of thousands of highly-engaged doctors on HealthTap. Leading doctors from across the country actively compete for national, regional and statewide recognition as top doctors in the categories displayed on the right:
trans-unit.target: 我们惊叹于数以万计的HealthTap高度敬业的医生所展示的激情，关注和承诺。来自全国各地的著名医生积极争取国家，地区和全州的认可，成为右侧所列类别的顶级医生：

trans-unit.source: TipTaps are useful, bite-sized pieces of health information that cover topics from healthy living to actively managing chronic conditions. As a HealthTap doctor, you can distill your experience and expertise into highly useful TipTaps that will help millions of people everywhere.
trans-unit.target: 推心小贴士是有用的，简洁的健康信息，涵盖从健康生活到积极管理慢性疾病的所有话题。作为HealthTap医生，您可以提炼您的经验和专业知识成非常有用的推心小贴士，这将帮助每个地方的数百万人

trans-unit.source: with recognition, online reputation control, new patients, increased Internet visibility and even monetary compensation. We’ll also help you get your name out into the mobile world with your own free, personalized app for patients to use.
trans-unit.target: 具有识别，在线声誉控制，新患者，添加的互联网可见性甚至金钱补偿。我们还将帮助您使用您自己的免费，个性化的应用程序让您的名字在移动世界中使用。

trans-unit.source: Do what you do best and get rewarded for it on the go –
trans-unit.target: 做您最好的，并得到潜在的奖励 -

trans-unit.source: for patients to use. Easily customize your photo, logo, and practice name.
trans-unit.target: 为患者使用轻松自定义您的照片，标志和诊疗名称。

trans-unit.source: Sign up to make it real
trans-unit.target: 注册使其真实

trans-unit.source: You can now communicate with patients online via online messaging through mobile devices in a safe and secure environment. You’ll also be compensated for your expertise.
trans-unit.target: 您现在可以通过移动设备在安全的环境中通过在线信息和患者交流。您还将因您的专业知识而获得报酬。

trans-unit.source: . Your DocScore determines how many credits you’ll receive per message.
trans-unit.target: .您的医者评分决定您每条信息可以收到多少信用。

trans-unit.source: Read what members and doctors are saying!
trans-unit.target: 阅读会员和医生在说什么！

trans-unit.source: Find out how
trans-unit.target: 了解如何

trans-unit.source: At HealthTap, we value trust and quality. That’s why we identify select top doctors in every specialty, and highlight them to patients and peers. We also provide these doctors with special privileges on HealthTap, including membership in ClubMD and status as a HealthTap Scholar.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap，我们重视新人和品质。这正是我们选择每一个专科中的顶级医生并将其向患者和同行作出推荐的原因。我们还为这些医生在HealthTap上提供特权，包括ClubMD和HealthTap学者的身份。

trans-unit.source: ClubMD members are doctors who regularly participate on HealthTap, and whose peers agree that the content they create and curate is high quality. Membership in this invitation-only club comes with privileges: doctors receive a ClubMD badge on their profile, are highlighted to patients, and help identify and influence the ranking of content on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: ClubMD会员是定期参与HealthTap的医生，而且他们的同行同意他们创建和管理的内容是高质量的。此仅限邀请俱乐部的会员拥有特权：医生在其个人资料上收到ClubMD徽章，突出显示给患者，并且有助于识别和影响HealthTap上内容的排名。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Scholars are a highly select group of leading doctors, and include the most engaged, respected, and helpful experts on HealthTap. The training, career accomplishments, and overall enthusiasm for HealthTap and its mission set these leaders apart. Members of this invitation-only group, identified by the Scholar badge on their profile, play a key role in curating the world’s best health information online.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap学者是一个精挑细选的顶级医生群组，包括在HealthTap参与度最好，最受尊敬和最有帮助的专家。HealthTap的培训，职业成就和整体热情及其使命使这些领导者分离。这个仅限邀请的群组的会员（由在其个人资料上的学者徽章标识），在管理世界上最好的在线健康信息方面发挥了关键作用。

trans-unit.source: Doctors who are members of the exclusive HealthTap Editorial Board are shaping the future of mobile health through their app recommendations and expert review of health information and services. Doctors who apply or are invited to join the Editorial board guide millions of people to medically accurate and helpful mobile apps and information.
trans-unit.target: 作为独家HealthTap编委会的医生正通过其应用程序建议和对健康信息和服务的专业审查来打造移动健康的未来。医生申请或被邀请加入编委会引领数百万人走在医疗准确和有帮助的移动应用程序和信息的道路上。

trans-unit.source: View the exhibit
trans-unit.target: 查看展览

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Medical School Competition is a friendly inter-school rivalry that highlights you, your classmates, and you alma mater and benefits millions of people everywhere. The challenge centers around the number of people helped on HealthTap, and having more participants gives you a greater chance of rising to the top - so rally your school by inviting alumni to join you in the competition.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap医学院竞赛是一个友好的学校之间的竞争，突出您，您的同学，您母校以及无处不在的数百万人的利益。挑战集中在HealthTap上帮助的人数，并且参与者越多给您排名上升的机会越大 - 所以通过邀请校友在比赛中加入您以召集学校。

trans-unit.source: The top medical schools will be awarded with special recognition from HealthTap and all participating alumni will be recognized for their contributions, compassion, and expertise. Don't miss your opportunity to become a part of history!
trans-unit.target: 顶级医学院将获得HealthTap的特别认可，所有参加的校友将因为他们的贡献、同情心和专业知识而备受认可。不要错过成为历史一部分的机会！

trans-unit.source: What you are "Known For" is a reflection of the advanced training you've received combined with your interests and the experiences you've had in your practice. You deserve tremendous recognition for your knowledge and expertise, and we want to give it it to you!
trans-unit.target: 您的“专攻”领域结合您的兴趣和您在诊疗中的经验所得到的先进训练的反映。您应该得到许多关于您的知识和专长的认可，而我们想给它授予给您！

trans-unit.source: Do you find yourself sometimes asking other moms how to deal with health-related questions for your pregnancy or children and wish someone could validate their opinions? What if all your trusted friends also had a medical degree? Wouldn’t that be nice?
trans-unit.target: 您发现自己有时会问其他妈妈如何处理与怀孕或孩子的健康相关问题，并希望有人可以证实他们的意见？如果您所有的信任朋友也有医学学位怎么办？那不是很好嘛？

trans-unit.source: You’ve seen it all firsthand as a mom — chickenpox at the age of 2, strep throat at the age of 5, a broken arm at 7, and countless runny noses. Your combined personal and professional experience as a “Doctor Mom” equips you with unique knowledge that enables you to truly connect with other moms. As a participating Doctor Mom you’ll be able to help women everywhere and:
trans-unit.target: 作为妈妈您在第一时间经历了这些- 2岁得水痘，5岁喉咙长链球菌，7岁手臂骨折，还有无数次流鼻涕。您作为“医生妈妈”的个人和专业经验使您具有独特的知识，让您真实地与其他妈妈沟通。作为一个参与其中的医生妈妈，您将能够帮助世界各地的女性：

trans-unit.source: Become a Doctor Mom
trans-unit.target: 成为一位医生妈妈！

trans-unit.source: With HealthTap you can now connect directly with a doctor who’s also a mom for an answer based on her first-hand experience. Doctor Moms have raised children of their own and can provide a special perspective:
trans-unit.target: 通过HealthTap，您现在可以直接与医生，同时也是一个妈妈沟通得到答复，基于她的第一手经验。医生妈妈亲自养育自己的孩子，她们可以提供一个特别的视角：

trans-unit.source: Ask a Doctor Mom
trans-unit.target: 询问一位医生妈妈

trans-unit.source: Your app. Your reputation. Your patients.
trans-unit.target: 您的应用程序。您的声誉。您的患者。

trans-unit.source: At HealthTap, we believe that the way to improve health care is through innovation and teamwork. Our APIs grant access to HealthTap's powerful wealth of knowledge and reputation data, an ever-expanding bank of high-quality content created by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors every day. Connect with us to power your apps with the world's' first Interactive Health engine.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap，我们相信，改善健康医护的方式是通过创新和团队合作。我们的API允许访问HealthTap的强大丰富的知识和信誉数据，一个每天不断扩大的高质量内容由数以千计的拥有美国执业执照医生创建的数据库。与我们联系，通过世界上第一个互动健康引擎为您的应用程序提供支持。

trans-unit.source: Doctor Authentication Made Easy
trans-unit.target: 医生认真使其变得简单

trans-unit.source: Provide doctors a simple, secure method to log in to your app. Allow them to skip the sign-up process and reduce friction to engage.
trans-unit.target: 为医生提供一种简单，安全的方法来登录到您的应用程序。允许他们跳过注册过程并减少互动中的摩擦。

trans-unit.source: Doctors!
trans-unit.target: 医生！

trans-unit.source: A Referral/Connections Graph for U.S.
trans-unit.target: 美国的转诊/连接图

trans-unit.source: For the first time ever, you can access comprehensive national data about who doctors trust and send their patients to, or treat patients with at the same time. You can have visibility and access to the "Circle of Trust" of any doctor on HealthTap!
trans-unit.target: 第一次，您可以访问全面的国家数据，关于医生信任谁以及把患者推荐给谁，或谁在同一时间治疗患者。您可以看到和访问HealthTap上的任何医生的“信任圈”！

trans-unit.source: Want to use HealthTap in a unique way? We'll work with you. If you have a compelling application of our data or services and our existing API calls don't meet your needs,
trans-unit.target: 想以独特的方式使用HealthTap吗？我们将与您合作。如果您有令人信服关于我们的数据或服务的申请，而我们现有的API调用不能满足您的需求，

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Developer Network hosted the first-ever Interactive Health Hack-a-thon ("hacking4health") in 2010. The event was a runaway hit with Silicon Valley developers who gathered in HealthTap's office to build innovative data-based health apps.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap开发网络在2010年主办了首次健康互动编程马拉松（“hacking4health”）。这次事件对于聚集在HealthTap办公室创建革新基于数据的健康应用程序的硅谷开发商是一个失控的打击。

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap's developer team is smart, agile and builds to your needs. Want to retrieve the data in a certain way that they don't support? They will work with you until you have a solution."
trans-unit.target: “HealthTap的开发团队很聪明、敏捷，并能满足您的需求。想要以某种方式检索他们不支持的数据？他们会与您一起工作，直到您有一个解决方案。

trans-unit.source: "Software developers have never had access to such a rich set of customized health data. HealthTap's API will serve as the de-facto data platform for third-party developers to leverage as they embark on an effort to revolutionize health care."
trans-unit.target: 软件开发人员从来没有访问过如此丰富的定制的健康数据。HealthTap的API将为第三方开发人员在他们开始努力革新医疗保健时借贷收购提供事实上的数据平台。

trans-unit.source: "We love the power that HealthTap unleashes to doctors and patients – and we wanted the reproduce that functionality for our community. So rather than re-inventing the wheel, we plugged our users directly into their service, and are unlocking the power of doctor-patient interaction right within our own web portal. Integration took us a fraction of the time it would have taken us to develop an inferior solution from scratch."
trans-unit.target: 我们赞许HealthTap为医生和患者带来的能量- 并且我们希望为我们的社区提供这种功能。因此，相对于重新着手于新方向，我们直接将服务应用到用户上，并且解锁了医患交流的权限整体化使我们利用时间间隙从零基础到开发了一个最低级的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: After approval, you'll receive a private API key, full documentation, and a liaison on our Product & Engineering team to support you throughout your integration.
trans-unit.target: 批准后，您将在我们的产品和工程团队中收到私人API密钥，完整文件和联络人，以便在整合过程中为您提供支持。

trans-unit.source: ClubMD membership is by special invitation only to a select group of the most active experts on HealthTap who create the highest quality, accurate, compassionate and helpful answers to member questions. We review the activities of experts, and select a limited number of experts to invite to ClubMD each month. Selection is based on the number and quality of helpful answers given, and on the number and quality of peer review Agrees. If you would like to be considered, feel free to let us know by sending an email to
trans-unit.target: ClubMD会员制度只邀请了HealthTap最活跃的专家，他们将会提高最好质量，准确，热情的以及有助的回答我们每月都会审核专家的工作，并且邀请数名专家进入ClubMD。筛选是基于专家给出的有用回答的数量和质量，以及同行评审对于专家回答的同意的数量和质量。可以通过HealthTap的媒体区访问演讲和媒体访谈。

trans-unit.source: With millions of new mobile devices activated every day, the proliferation of health and wellness apps has the potential to revolutionize how patients gain access to the best information and health services. Currently, there are more than 40,000 mobile health applications, and they vary widely in quality, helpfulness, and medical accuracy.
trans-unit.target: 随着每天几百万的移动设备被激活，健康养生方面的应用程序将会不停地升级，提供给患者最好的信息和健康服务目前，有4万多个手机健康应用程序，它们在质量，乐于助人和医疗准确性方面差异很大。

trans-unit.source: We believe that the best doctors can help millions of people identify which applications are the most useful and helpful. To facilitate this, we’ve created an Editorial Board to which the best doctors in the HealthTap Network are invited.
trans-unit.target: 我们相信最好的医生是可以帮助数百万人找到哪些应用是最有效并且有用的。为促进健康应用更有效的使用，我们已经邀请HealthTap网络内最好的医生创建了一个编委会。

trans-unit.source: With more than 40,000 mobile health and wellness apps, the opportunities to improve our health and well-being are growing fast, but so are overwhelming feelings of confusion. If you’ve ever browsed health apps you’ll know how difficult it is to measure the quality, reliability, and helpfulness of an app. To help you find the best apps for you and your loved ones, HealthTap’s AppRx is bringing together tens of thousands of the world’s leading doctors to:
trans-unit.target: 随着超过4万个手机健康应用程序的使用，我们的健康和福利的被提升的机会也将大幅度添加，但同时也造成了是大量的困惑如果您曾经浏览过健康应用程序，您会知道判断一个应用程序的质量，可靠性和帮助性是多么困难。为了帮助您和您的亲人找到最好的应用程序，HealthTap的AppRx汇集了成千上万的世界领先的医生：

trans-unit.source: Building a world-changing platform is exciting, inspiring, and challenging. Trying to make a change in people’s lives for the better is even more so. It takes the smartest and most compassionate people, with deep problem-solving capabilities, multidisciplinary skills, the ability to reduce comprehensive complex systems to their essence, and a thorough kindness of heart to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 建立一个改变世界的平台是令人兴奋，鼓舞人心和充满挑战的。试图改变人们的生活，使人们的生活越来越好它需要最聪明和最富同情心的人去达到成功，这些人需要具有解决深层问题能力，掌握多学科技能，具有化繁为简直接找到事情本质与核心的能力，以及一颗十分善良的心。

trans-unit.source: We believe our ability to marry healthcare and technology will have a great impact on the world, and will prolong the life expectancy of humankind. We’re excited about improving the efficiency of care, while enhancing the quality of people’s lives, and making people’s feel good every day.
trans-unit.target: 我们相信我们与健康医护紧密联系的能力将对世界产生巨大影响，并将延长人类的预期寿命。我们很高兴提高医护效率，同时提高人们的生活质量，使人们每天都感觉很好。

trans-unit.source: We value health and happiness. This means that you get full health benefits (health, dental, vision), one of Silicon Valley’s best PTO policies, healthy catered lunches, dinners, and snacks throughout the day, lots of great company events and outings, subsidized gym memberships, yearly retreats to fun places, and much, much more.
trans-unit.target: 我们珍视健康和幸福。这意味着您将获得全面的医疗福利（健康，牙科，视力），硅谷最好的PTO政策之一，全天候健康的午餐，晚餐和小吃，许多公司活动和郊游，健身房会员补贴，每年休假去有趣的地方，以及更多福利。

trans-unit.source: SmartHealth
trans-unit.target: SmartHealth

trans-unit.source: What is "SmartHealth"?
trans-unit.target: SmartHealth是什么？

trans-unit.source: SmartHealth is an extension of the Waikato DHB that allows the Waikato DHB to provide some of its health services in a virtualised manner (e.g. – the clinician and the patient can meet virtually via a computer, tablet, or smartphone rather than being in the same room face to face).
trans-unit.target: SmartHealth是Waikato DHB的扩展，其允许Waikato DHB以一种在线化的方式提供其一些健康服务（例如临床医生和患者可以通过计算机，平板电脑或手机在线见面，而不是在同一房间面对面）。

trans-unit.source: Q & A / Inform
trans-unit.target: 问答/通知

trans-unit.source: The Q & A / Inform service allows registered users to login to SmartHealth and search existing answers provided by qualified clinicians to health related questions. It also allows users to anonymously type in new questions that can then be answered by one or more qualified clinicians. Don't include information that identifies you (like your name) in questions posted to the QA / Inform area. Remember, doctors answering these questions will not see your Profile, so if your question requires a personal response, please do a virtual consult.
trans-unit.target: 问答/通知使用户能够登录SmartHealth并且找到由合格的临床医生对有关问题的回答。它还允许用户匿名输入新问题，之后可以获得一个或多个合格的临床医生的回答。不要在问答/通知区域提问时留下您的私人信息（比如您的名字）。您需要注意的是，医生在回答这些问题的时候不能查看您的个人资料，所以如果您需要提问私人问题的时候，您可以选择在线咨询。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of virtual consultations: Text and Video. All consultations are pre-booked appointments where a clinician and patient meet virtually through SmartHealth.
trans-unit.target: 有两种类型的在线咨询：文本或视频所有咨询都是提前预订的预约，临床医生和患者将通过SmartHealth见面。

trans-unit.source: At Waikato District Health Board ("Waikato DHB"), your privacy is important to us. This document gives you details about SmartHealth and how your information will be used and kept secure.
trans-unit.target: 在Waikato区健康委员会（“Waikato DHB”），您的隐私对我们很重要。这份文件将告诉您有关SmartHealth的详细信息，以及您的信息将会被如何使用以及保密。

trans-unit.source: Information that you provide or that your carer(s) provide to you while using SmartHealth services will be used to deliver health information and services to you and provide you with better care.
trans-unit.target: 您提供的信息或您的医护人员在使用SmartHealth服务时向您提供的信息将用于向您提供健康信息和服务，并为您提供更好的医护。

trans-unit.source: When you sign up to use SmartHealth, you will be asked to provide a range of information about yourself. This information along with your email address and password becomes your "Profile". The information that you will be asked for includes:
trans-unit.target: 当您注册使用SmartHealth时，您将需要提供一系列个人信息。这份信息连同您的电子邮箱和密码将一起进入到您的“档案”中。您要求的信息包括：

trans-unit.source: The minimum information that you must provide in order to use SmartHealth services are your name, email address and password. Giving more information will help your carer(s) provide you with better services and help you get more accurate information when using some of the self-service options within SmartHealth.
trans-unit.target: 您至少需要提供您的姓名，电子邮箱以及密码去使用SmartHealth服务。提供更多信息将有助于您的医护人员为您在使用SmartHealth中的一些自助服务选项时提供更好的服务以及获得更准确的信息。

trans-unit.source: A "Consult" within SmartHealth system will allow you to have either a video (using a computer, a video camera and a microphone) consultation or a typed / text consultation with a Waikato DHB clinician. During the consultation, the Waikato DHB clinician will update information about the consultation (e.g. information they provided you during the consultation such as diagnosis or treatment). This information will be stored in SmartHealth system and also sent to update your clinical record maintained at Waikato DHB and the Primary Health Organisation (e.g. your GP) that you are registered with, just as if they saw you in person.
trans-unit.target: SmartHealth系统内的 “咨询” 选项将允许您有一个视频咨询（使用电脑，摄像机和麦克风）或与Waikato DHB临床医生进行打字/文本咨询。在咨询过程中，Waikato DHB临床医生将更新相关咨询的信息（例如他们在咨询期间提供给您的信息，如诊断或治疗）。这份信息将存储在SmartHealth系统中，并发送以更新您在Waikato DHB和初级卫生组织（例如您的GP）保存的临床记录，就像他们亲自面对面为您看病一样。

trans-unit.source: A cookie is a tiny little file that's stored on your computer. It contains the address of the Web site and codes that your internet browser sends back to the Web site each time you visit a page there. Cookies from SmartHealth do not contain personal information or anything dangerous; they are useful in making your experience with SmartHealth a better experience. When you browse the Web and access a Web page, the Web server needs to know who you are if you want to do things that require logging in or putting items in a virtual shopping cart or completing any other process that requires that the Web site remember information about you as you move from page to page.
trans-unit.target: Cookie是存储在计算机上的一个小小的文件。它包含网站的地址和每次您访问一个页面时您的互联网浏览器发送回网站的代码。SmartHealth的Cookies不包含个人信息或危险内容; 他们使您的SmartHealth体验变得更好。当您浏览并访问Web页面时，如果您需要登录或将物品放入在线购物车或完成任何其他需要该网站记住有关您的信息当您从移动页面时的进程，Web服务器需要确认您的身份。

trans-unit.source: The information that you enter into SmartHealth will be used to provide you:
trans-unit.target: 您进入SmartHealth会使用到提供给您的信息：

trans-unit.source: Reminders (email and mobile notifications) to help you stay engaged with your health. You can manage the frequency and types of communications you receive by updating your account Settings.
trans-unit.target: 提醒（电子邮件和手机通知）将帮助您保持健康。您可以通过更新帐户设置来管理收到的信息的频率和类型。

trans-unit.source: The information that you enter into SmartHealth will be used by clinician(s):
trans-unit.target: 您进入SmartHealth临床医生会使用到的信息：

trans-unit.source: The information that you provide in your profile along with the information that the clinicians record while providing you services via SmartHealth will be stored in one or more of the following places:
trans-unit.target: 您在档案件中提供的信息以及临床医生通过SmartHealth提供服务时记录的信息将存储在以下一个或多个地方：

trans-unit.source: On a private, safe and highly secured computer storage system in the United States of America (called a "Cloud"). This system meets the information security standards of the United States of America and New Zealand.
trans-unit.target: 在美国，一个私人的，安全和高度安全的计算机存储系统（称为“云”）。这个系统符合美国和新西兰的信息安全标准。

trans-unit.source: On the secure clinical records systems maintained by the Waikato DHB. The same as if you met with a clinician face to face.
trans-unit.target: 在安全临床记录系统通过Waikato DHB维护。就像面对面的与临床医生见面一样。

trans-unit.source: On the secure clinical records systems of your Primary Health Organisation (such as a GP practice), if you are registered with one of these organisations. The same as if you met with a GP face to face.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已注册这些组织之一，在您的初级健康组织的安全临床记录系统（如GP诊疗）。就像面对面的与GP见面一样。

trans-unit.source: In order to meet both the New Zealand government and the Waikato DHB regulations, your information will be stored for up to 20 years following the date of your last treatment or care.
trans-unit.target: 为了满足新西兰政府和Waikato DHB法规，您的信息将在您最后一次治疗或医护之日后存储最多20年。

trans-unit.source: Generally only your team of clinicians from the Waikato DHB and your Primary Health Organisation will have access to your information. However, on occasion SmartHealth staff, Waikato DHB staff or others authorised by the Waikato DHB may also need to access your information in order to ensure that the system is working correctly, to fix any issues that might arise and/or to respond to any complaints, questions or concerns.
trans-unit.target: 通常只有来自Waikato DHB和您的初级卫生组织的临床医生团队才能访问您的信息。但是，有时SmartHealth工作人员，Waikato DHB工作人员或由Waikato DHB授权的其他人员也可能需要访问您的信息以确保系统正常工作，解决任何可能出现的问题和/或对任何投诉，问题或疑虑做出回应。

trans-unit.source: please re-consider!
trans-unit.target: 请重新考虑！

trans-unit.source: We're sorry to hear you'd like to unsubscribe this email
trans-unit.target: 我们非常抱歉的听到您希望取消此邮箱订购

trans-unit.source: we'll make sure to address your feedback as best as possible!
trans-unit.target: 我们会尽可能地回复您的反馈！

trans-unit.source: doctors can prescribe medication and refill prescripitons, which you can conveniently pick up at your local pharmacy. By collaborating with Quest Diagnostics, our doctors can also order and review lab tests through virtual consults. Simply visit one of the thousands of local test centers nationwide to save multiple trips to the doctor.
trans-unit.target: 医生可以开处方药并且再配方处方，您可以很方便的在您当地的药店取药。通过与Quest Diagnostics实验室合作，我们的医生还可以通过在线咨询去订购和审查实验室检验。只需访问全国数千个地方检验中心之一，以节省多次去看医生的次数。

trans-unit.source: Everyone could use a little support when striving for a goal. Having your own personal cheerleaders can mean a lot!
trans-unit.target: 当努力争取一个目标时，每个人都可以得到一点支持拥有您自己的私人拉拉队意味着很多！

trans-unit.source: but they're accurate. It makes me feel at ease as a new mom.
trans-unit.target: 而且是准确的。作为一个新的妈妈它让我很安心。

trans-unit.source: Modern medicine and healthcare too often emphasize “health” over “care,” focusing more on treatments and medications than on the human aspect of care. As patients, we have few opportunities to show our appreciation for the doctors who help us during challenging times.
trans-unit.target: 现代医疗和健康医护注重于强调”健康”超过”关怀”，更注重于治疗和药物而不是人自身方面的关怀。作为患者，我们很少有机会向在艰难时期帮助我们的医生表示感谢。

trans-unit.source: “Thanks doc!” is multimedia art installation taking viewers on a symbolic journey of care and gratitude, and highlighting the impact of caring for others by sharing knowledge and showing compassion. The piece uses actual words of thanks that patients have shared with doctors, demonstrating the often unspoken appreciation we feel for the doctors who help us overcome adversity and tend to us when we need it most.
trans-unit.target: “谢谢您，医生！”的多媒体艺术让观看者通过这些文本符号来表达关怀和感激，并且强调通过分享知识和表现同情对关爱他人的重要影响。患者通过使用特定的语言文本与医生分享他们内心的感激，证明我们虽然不常用语言来表达但我们还是十分感谢他们帮助我们度过苦难以及在最需要他们的时候无条件靠近陪伴。

trans-unit.source: The series of 18 panels (above) combines images of doctors with thank-you notes from patients. The installation was first displayed at the Stanford MedicineX Conference at the Stanford School of Medicine on September 29–30, 2012.
trans-unit.target: 18个面板系列（上图）结合了医生的图像和患者的感谢信。2012年9月29日至30日这个装置第一次在斯坦福大学的医学会议中展出。

trans-unit.source: Artists: Ron Gutman and Kathleen Donahue
trans-unit.target: 艺术家：Ron Gutman和Kathleen Donahue

trans-unit.source: As a patient consulting with doctors on HealthTap, you agree to engage with the practitioner in a respectful and appropriate manner. You agree to refrain from using inappropriate language and/or behavior.
trans-unit.target: 作为与HealthTap医生协商的患者，您同意以尊重和适当的方式与医生交流。您同意不使用不当的语言和/或行为。

trans-unit.source: You agree that you may not make demands for treatment in a consultation. Please understand that there are three types of virtual consults on HealthTap:
trans-unit.target: 您同意您不会在咨询中提出治疗要求。请理解HealthTap的三种类型的在线咨询：

trans-unit.source: Standard virtual consults: In these consults, doctors who have accepted you as a patient (whether for “on call” care, unless you already have an ongoing care relationship with the doctor) can provide care. You may receive an examination (within the limits of virtual care), provide a medical history, obtain an assessment from a physician, and receive a treatment plan as determined to be medically appropriate by the consulting doctor.
trans-unit.target: 标准在线咨询：在这些咨询中，接受您作为患者的医生（无论是否为“在职”医护，除非您已经与医生有持续的医护关系）可以提供医护。您可以接受检查（在在线医护的限制内），提供病史，获得医生的评估，并接受咨询医生觉得在医学上合适的治疗计划。

trans-unit.source: Introductory Consult: this is the first interaction with a new doctor or a doctor who has not yet accepted you as a patient on HealthTap. An introductory consult is not intended for the doctor to give you care. Introductory consults are for providing you with information or get to know the doctor and to determine if she or he can help you with your health concern (in person and/or through virtual consults). A doctor may need to invite you to her or his office for an in person appointment in order to accept you as a patient on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 介绍性咨询：这是第一次在HealthTap上与一个新医生或尚未接受您作为患者的医生互动。介绍性咨询的目的不是为了医生给您提供照顾。介绍性咨询是为您提供信息或了解医生，并确定她或他是否可以帮助您解决您的健康问题（亲自和/或通过在线咨询）。医生可能会邀请您到她或他的办公室进行个人预约，以接受您作为HealthTap上的患者。

trans-unit.source: Second opinion consult: this is a consult in which a doctor can provide you with information about a health issue or a second opinion on a prior diagnosis. A new diagnosis, treatment, or other care are not available in a second opinion consult.
trans-unit.target: 第二意见咨询：这是一个医生可以向您提供有关健康问题的信息或关于先前诊断的第二意见的咨询。在第二意见咨询中将不提供新的诊断，治疗或其他医护。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is intended to give you easy access to health information (and even care) on your computer or mobile device. As a HealthTap patient (with a HealthTap Prime membership or other access to consulting doctors on HealthTap), you are entitled to receive medically necessary and appropriate care, and you agree not to abuse or overuse the access to doctors provided to you. Overuse includes requests for multiple opinions on single medical condition HealthTap consults should not be used : to obtain numerous opinions on a single medical condition. In general, doctors may discourage this practice and may be hesitant to provide an assessment to those patients who attempt to seek multiple consults. In cases where there is an absolute medical necessity, it may be appropriate to do more than one consult in a day about a specific health issue, but you may also need to consider seeking in-person care or emergency services if the level of severity truly is at the point where multiple consults are warranted (especially if in-person care is recommended by a consulting doctor on HealthTap).
trans-unit.target: HealthTap旨在让您轻松访问您计算机或移动设备上的健康信息（甚至医护）。作为HealthTap患者（具有HealthTap Prime会员资格或其他访问HealthTap上的咨询医生的资格），您有权获得必要和适当的医疗医护，您同意不会滥用或过度使用医生的访问权。过度使用包括对单一医疗状况的多个意见的请求。HealthTap咨询不会被用于：在单个医疗状况下获得许多意见。一般来说，医生可能不鼓励这种做法，可能会犹豫向那些试图寻求多方咨询的患者提供评估。在有绝对医疗必要性的情况下，在一天内就一个特定的健康问题进行多次咨询是可行的，但如果严重程度的真实性是多方咨询所担保的，您可能需要考虑寻求面对面的医护或紧急服务（特别是如果面对面医护是HealthTap咨询医生推荐的）。

trans-unit.source: Even if you believe you need a prescription or lab test, you should not expect a prescription or lab test order from any given consult. Patients who are located outside the U.S. may receive prescription recommendations only; lab orders are not currently possible for patients located outside the U.S. If the practitioner deems it appropriate to prescribe treatment or order lab tests for the condition discussed in a virtual consult, then the prescription or lab test(s) may be ordered by the physician. Lab tests are currently ordered using Quest Diagnostics lab test services; it may not be possible to order all of Quest Diagnostics lab tests (if any) in all U.S. states at this time. . The following medication categories cannot be prescribed or recommended in virtual consults on HealthTap: DEA category I-IV medications, lifestyle medications (such as weight loss or hair loss medication), and U.S.-state regulated medications. It may be possible to get prescriptions for some psychiatric medications in HealthTap Concierge virtual consults, but doctors cannot prescribe psychiatric medications in HealthTap Prime virtual consults.
trans-unit.target: 即使您相信您需要处方或实验室检验，您也不应该期望任何给定咨询的处方或实验室检验。位于美国境外的患者只能获得处方建议; 实验室下单目前不能用于位于美国境外的患者。如果医生认为在线咨询中对于讨论的病症开处方或预定实验室检验是合适的，则处方或实验室检验可以由医生订购。实验室检验目前使用Quest Diagnostics实验室检验服务; 目前可能无法在美国所有州订购所有Quest Diagnostics实验室检验（如果有）。.以下药物类别不能出现在HealthTap的在线咨询的处方或推荐中：DEA类别I-IV药物，生活用药（例如减肥或脱发药物）和美国国家管制药物。有可能在HealthTap贵宾台在线咨询中获得一些精神病药物的处方，但医生不能在HealthTap Prime在线咨询中开精神病药物的处方。

trans-unit.source: There are cases when you may present with a condition that is long-standing for which you may have been taking a prescription for a long period of time. Even in this situation, it is up to the consulting doctor’s medical expertise and discretion to decide to order that prescription and for what duration. Please understand that in HealthTap Prime virtual consults, you and the doctor most likely do not have an established doctor-patient relationship, and best practice will be for the doctor to prescribe (if at all) a short-course of medication to hold you over until you are able to consult with your established doctor.
trans-unit.target: 这些情况是当您可能会出现长期存在的病症，您可能已经长期服用处方。即使在这种情况下，还是取决于咨询医生的医疗专业知识和自由裁量决定是否订购处方和持续时间。请理解，在HealthTap Prime在线咨询中，您和医生很可能没有确定的医患关系，最佳诊疗将是医生给您开短期药物治疗的处方（如果有的话）， 直到您能够咨询到您的指定医生。
