trans-unit.source: If you signed up for a free trial or limited-period discount HealthTap Prime account, and allow the trial or discount period to expire, your account will automatically convert to a standard paid subscription account (starting your full-price subscription period and recurring charges). For the first month of your full-price paid subscription only, you have a 72-hour grace period to notify HealthTap Support in writing if you do not want to continue the subscription and/or to request a refund of your first month’s full-price subscription fee. This grace-period does not apply if you have engaged in one or more consults after the free-trial period. You may cancel your subscription at any time, and your subscription will be valid through the then current pre-paid month. HealthTap does not offer partial-month refunds.
trans-unit.target: 如果您注册了一个免费试用或时段限制的折扣HealthTap Prime账户，并允许试验或折扣期到期，您的帐户将自动转换为一个标准的付费订购帐户(开始您的全价购买订购期和经常性费用)。只对于您全价购买支付的第一个月的订购，如果您不愿意继续订购和/或要求退款全价购买订购您的第一个月的费用，您有一个72小时的宽限期来书面通知HealthTap支持。在免费试用期之后，如果您有参与一个或更多的咨询，那么这个宽限期将不适用。您可以在任何时候取消您的订购,然后您的订购将通过目前预付费生效。HealthTap不提供分批月份退款。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime offers primary-care consults from specific physicians on HealthTap only. Consults for specialist care are not available on HealthTap Prime. HealthTap Prime consults are available under an “on call” model where you will be connected with the first-available HealthTap Prime physician. If you wish to or do select a specific doctor (including specialists) to consult, these consults are part of the HealthTap Concierge service, are not included in your HealthTap Prime subscription, and are subject to additional per-consult fees. HealthTap Prime may not cover the cost of consults that originated from searching for a specific doctor or specialty. Pricing for any Concierge consults will be shown prior to initiating such consults and by participating in such a consult you agree to pay the fees associated with such a consult.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime仅在HealthTap上提供特定医生的普通门诊咨询。HealthTap Prime不提供专家医护的咨询服务。HealthTap Prime咨询可在“即时”模式下使用，您将与首个可用的HealthTap Prime医师联系。如果您希望或选择特定的医生（包括专家）咨询，这些咨询是HealthTap贵宾台服务的一部分，但不包括在您的HealthTap Prime订购，并且需要额外的咨询费。HealthTap Prime可能不支付由于寻找特定医生或专业而产生的咨询费用。任何贵宾台咨询的价格将在开始此类咨询之前显示，并通过参与此类咨询，您同意支付与此类咨询相关的费用。

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for monitoring your financial accounts and statements, and HealthTap is not responsible for any charges actually or allegedly not authorized by any account holder. In the event that HealthTap agrees to provide you with a refund for any reason (including but not limited to claims of unauthorized charges), the maximum refund to which you will be entitled is sixty (60) days from the time of purchase. Unsubscribing from messages from HealthTap and/or uninstalling the HealthTap app do not automatically cancel any subscriptions you have on HealthTap, nor do these actions cancel your obligations to pay for any such subscriptions still active on HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: Anyone who visits the HealthTap office sees a lot of smiling. That’s because we believe in smiling — so much so that we've made it central to our culture, to who we are, and to what we do.

trans-unit.source: It’s not just that we HealthTappers love to smile, it’s that all humans intrinsically know that smiling is powerful! This simple act goes a long way toward improving your mood and the mood of those around you, reducing stress, and spreading happiness in a way that is utterly contagious. This is why we’ve made sure to incorporate this positive energy into what we build for you.
trans-unit.target: 这不仅是因为我们HealthTappers热爱微笑，更是因为所有的人内心深处都认为微笑很有感染力并且具有力量。这简单的行动却可以长远地提振您和身边人的心情，降低压力并充满感染力的传播快乐。这就是为什么我们十分确定地要将这份正能量融合进我们现在正在为您做的。

trans-unit.source: Top doctors on HealthTap can now give you their opinion about your regular doctor’s assessment of your health problem and how to treat it. Second opinions can help you make a more informed decision about your care.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的顶级医生现在可以为您常规就医的健康问题诊断提供建议并指导您如何治疗。第二个意见可以帮助您对您的医护做出更明智的决定。

trans-unit.source: As a patient, one of your most important rights is to get a second opinion about your diagnosis and treatment options. Being informed is a vital part of choosing a treatment. Good doctors understand the importance of being well informed and support a second opinions.
trans-unit.target: 作为一位患者，您最重要的权利之一就是获取另一位医生对您诊断和治疗选择的第二意见。被告知是选择治疗的重要部分。优秀的医生明白保障患者充分知情权以及支持第二意见的重要性。

trans-unit.source: 选择HealthTap绝对没错。一位肿瘤医师向我详尽地解释了我的诊断结果和治疗方案，这之后，我对我做出的决定充满信心。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap was definitely the right choice. The oncologist explained my diagnosis and treatment options in detail and afterwards, I was very confident in the decision I made.

trans-unit.source: About the reviews & methodology
trans-unit.target: 关于审查和方法

trans-unit.source: With more than 65,742 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network, we have 1,623,598 years of clinical experience on tap. We have asked our doctors to use this experience to rate the effectiveness and clinical usefulness of thousands of medications for medical conditions and other indications.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的医学专家网络拥有65742名医生，总计1,623,598年的临床经验随时可供您参考使用。我们要求医生根据这些临床经验对数以千计的药物做出有效性和临床帮助度的评分。

trans-unit.source: The result: HealthTap RateRx, the world’s first (and only) large-scale doctor rating of the effectiveness of drugs and treatments.
trans-unit.target: 结果：HealthTap Rate医生评测，世界上第一个（并且是唯一一个）大型的对药物与治疗有效性进行医生评分的系统。

trans-unit.source: A new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, RateRx presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice in more than 137 specialties. RateRx is the first national survey of U.S.-licensed doctors, soliciting independent feedback from physicians across the country about their real-world clinical experience treating a broad range of common conditions, and rating the medications used in those treatments. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个对于医生和患者来说都全新、独立的资源，Rate医生评测提供对于药物治疗有效性的评分。这些药物治疗是数千拥有美国执业执照的医生通过在超过137个专科领域的临床诊疗得出的。Rate医生评测是第一个对于拥有美国执业执照医生的全国性调查，征求全国的医生基于他们广泛临床经验的独立反馈，并对治疗手段中所使用的药物进行评分。Rate医生评测代表了第一个针对有经验的医生在他们各自的专业领域所使用的治疗特定情况患者的手段的全面性评估。与可能会报告在可控状态下的治疗的临床有效性的其他研究不同的是，Rate医生评测呼吁深入、长期、真实的顶级医生的经验，来展示医生了解到的哪些治疗计划对患者有效。

trans-unit.source: The RateRx study was conducted by HealthTap. HealthTap collects extensive information from doctors on, among other topics, the treatments of all health-related issues.
trans-unit.target: 通过HealthTap进行Rate医生评测的研究HealthTap从医生那里广泛收集所有其他方面有关健康问题的信息。

trans-unit.source: Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Based on their knowledge from clinical experience using the drug for that indication, contributing doctors were instructed to rate medications for their use with specific indications. The combined ratings for each treatment have been summarized into an aggregate rating that reflects doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are publicly visible, and anyone can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.
trans-unit.target: 医生被要求对药品治疗某一症状的临床有效性进行1到5星的打分。基于药品对特定症状的临床经验，参与信息收集的医生被委托对药物治疗的效果用特定的指标进行打分。对每一种治疗的综合评分被整合成代表着医生共同经验的总评分。参与评分的医生的简单资料是公开的，任何人都可以查看医生训练和经验的细节包括他们的专科和医学委员会认证。

trans-unit.source: Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. More than 567,000 doctors were invited to participate in the study (includes more than 67,000 doctors in the HealthTap Medical Expert Network plus 500,000 U.S.-licensed doctors in HealthTap’s extended doctor community). In addition to those doctors invited to contribute to the study, any U.S.-licensed doctor in good standing was eligible to participate by submitting a request to HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 所有声誉良好的拥有美国执业执照的医生都可以参与这次的研究。超过567,000名医生被邀请参与这次的研究（包括超过67,000名HealthTap医学专家网络的医生以及500,000名HealthTap的大医生团体的拥有美国执业执照的医生。除了被邀请参与研究的医生，任何有良好声誉的拥有美国执业执照的医生都可以通过提交申请参与研究。

trans-unit.source: Doctors could rate any medication for its effectiveness in treating any condition. For common conditions, medications known to be treatments for the conditions were presented alongside the conditions. Doctors could add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included in the list.
trans-unit.target: 医生可以评价任何药物在任何条件下的有效性。对于常见症状，已知的药物治疗方式会在症状的旁边注明。医生可以对任何新的没有在清单里的药物治疗方式添加打分。

trans-unit.source: RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank, based on average weighted ratings, from highest-rated to lowest, and only when there are sufficient data for a meaningful weighted average. The weighted average takes into account both the average rating and the number of ratings, discounting higher average ratings that are based on a smaller number of assessments.
trans-unit.target: Rate医生评测通过一种有次序的排列方式来显示每一种治疗方式对某一症状的效果。这种排列方式基于加权评分，从高到低排列。只有当数据量对于加权平均足够时才会对这一治疗方式其进行排列。加权平均分同时参照了平均分和打分数量，会对高平均分但是打分数量较少的评分进行扣分。

trans-unit.source: To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their "Known-for" topics).
trans-unit.target: 为了保证医生评估的无偏性，医生无法看到他同行已经打好的分数直到他自己输入了评分。推荐一旦被提交就无法更改，但是在提交打分之后，医生可以查看其它医生的评分并进行评论。患者和医生都可以从Rate医生评测评级系统中学习。患者受益于这些医生分享的集体智慧，使他们能够看到不同的治疗方法在相同的条件下是如何评价和审查的。医生会从他的同事的评分和评价中受益，能够通过查看参与评价的医生的资料来理解这些信息（资料展现了医生的教育背景和经历，他们的专长领域的训练，诊疗的年数，医者评分和他们的”专攻”话题）。

trans-unit.source: Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, but do not change the numeric value of the rating.
trans-unit.target: 评论作为一种可选的评价方式，经常被医生用来解释打分，或者用来分享药物是如何针对每一种症状被使用的细节。评论可以被阅读和评价，但是不会在数字上影响评分。

trans-unit.source: Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication.
trans-unit.target: 打分是基于药品的通用名称的，但是也会显示品牌名称，准许医生对特定的药品进行评分。显示提供的每个通用药物名称的品牌。该研究不会让相同药物的不同品牌名称之间的评级有所不同。

trans-unit.source: The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors were encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的针对每种症状的药物治疗方式已被列出以便评分，但是我们鼓励医生为任何一种症状添加治疗方式以保证新的治疗方式被纳入其中。医生被指示只有当他们有使用过某种药物治疗方式治疗特定的被讨论的症状，并且发现这种药物治疗方式对这种症状有效时才能将这种先前没有出现的药物治疗方式加入标准治疗方式的清单中。

trans-unit.source: RateRx is a living work. As an open and ongoing feature on the HealthTap platform, any U.S.-licensed doctor in good standing can contribute to this data at any time. RateRx data reflect the ongoing feedback and ratings provided by doctors based on their real-world use of medications in treating patients, serving as a unique, continuously updated resource for the efficacy of both existing and new treatments.
trans-unit.target: Rate医生评测是一项生活工作正是因为HealthTap平台有着开放的并且持续发展的特征，任何有良好声誉的拥有美国执业执照的医生都可以在任何时候完善数据。Rate医生评测的数据反映了医生基于现实中对患者的药物治疗的实时的反馈和评分，这些数据为现有的和新的治疗方式提供了独一无二的，同时也是最新的资源。

trans-unit.target: .包括App医生评测评分和报告的结果在内的内容，可以从HealthTap得到执业执照。为了详细的联系信息

trans-unit.source: HealthTap does not recommend or endorse any specific content or other information mentioned on our service. Please remember, that content on HealthTap (including but not limited to treatment options and ratings listed in RateRx): (i) is provided for informational and educational purposes only, and is designed to be used with common sense, and in connection with the advice of your doctor or healthcare provider; (ii) is for personal, household, educational use of a single individual, and commercial use or commercial distribution of any content is prohibited. For more information please see
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不推荐任何在我们的服务中提到的特定内容或其他的信息。请记住，HealthTap中的内容（包括但不限于在Rate医生评测中列出的治疗选项和评分）(i)是仅为获取信息和教育的目的提供的，需要与常识，您的医生或者健康医护提供商的建议相配合；(ii)是为个人，家庭，个人的教育而提供的，内容的商业用途或者商业性传播都是被禁止的。获得更多信息，请查看

trans-unit.source: Learn more about our methodology
trans-unit.target: 了解更多关于我的方法

trans-unit.source: A difference of less than 0.5 stars between treatments may not be statistically significant or meaningful. Differences of greater than 0.5 stars between two treatments displayed are always statistically significant. The weighted average rating is a Bayesian estimate of the true average rating, given the observed ratings so far. The formula combines the global mean rating (3.3 stars) with the observations as follows:
trans-unit.target: 不同治疗方法之间小于0.5星差距可能在统计学意义上不显著。两种治疗方法有大于0.5星的差异是一直在统计学意义上显著的。已有的评分的加权平均是真实平均评分的贝叶斯估计。方程根据以下的方式将全球平均评分（3.3星）和观测结合在一起：

trans-unit.source: The information we request at registration. That we do not use or share your Personally Identifiable Information, other than as described in our Privacy Statement
trans-unit.target: 我们在注册时要求的信息。我们不使用或分享您的个人身份信息，除了我们在隐私权声明所描述的情况。

trans-unit.source: When we say we care about your privacy, we mean it. Privacy policies are important documents, but many people don't read them because they are long, confusing, and written in "legalese."
trans-unit.target: 当我们宣布注重您的隐私时，我们会做到。隐私政策是重要的文件，但是许多人不阅读他们引文他们长，令人迷惑并且用法律术语撰写。

trans-unit.source: We've designed our Privacy Statement with you in mind, creating links to the most common questions about HealthTap and HealthTap Premium Services (including Prime and Concierge) and how these services work where privacy issues may be involved. Everything in written in plain, easy to understand language.
trans-unit.target: 我们与您在心中编撰了隐私权声明，创建关于HealthTap和HealthTap高级服务（包括Prime和贵宾台）的最常见的问题和当会牵涉隐私事项时这些服务是如何来运作的链接。一切都写成简单易懂的语言。

trans-unit.source: that describes our core beliefs about privacy and your core rights as a user of our services. These documents are located on our

trans-unit.source: By continuing to use HealthTap, you agree to this Privacy Statement and any updates to it. This means that if the Privacy Statement changes, you agree to these changes if you keep using HealthTap. When this policy is changed (other than for typographical corrections or minor changes that do not alter its meaning), we will update the "last modified" date at the top of the policy. We may provide a summary at the bottom of the policy, describing the types of changes made.
trans-unit.target: 您持续使用HealthTap代表您同意隐私声明和它的任何更新。这意味着如果隐私声明更改了，您保持使用HealthTap的行为代表您同意这些更改。当政策更改了（除了印刷错误或者不改变意思的不重要更改），我们会会在政策的最顶部更新“最近一次修改”的日期。我们会在政策的底部提供一个总结，描述做出更改的类型。

trans-unit.source: Your use of HealthTap is anonymous. Your Personally Identifiable Information (your real name, date of birth, email address and other such information) is not visible to others. Staying anonymous on HealthTap is easy - simply don't post personally identifiable information (such as your name) in your questions or other content visible to others.
trans-unit.target: 您使用HealthTap是匿名的。您的个人身份信息（真实姓名，出生日期，邮箱地址和其他同类信息）不对其他人可见。在HealthTap上保持匿名是容易的-只要不要在您的问题或其他可以被其他人看到的内容中，发布个人身份信息。

trans-unit.source: No. Your questions are anonymous. Only the questions, not your identity, are publicly visible.
trans-unit.target: 不能，您的问题是匿名的。只有问题，没有您的身份，是公开可见的。

trans-unit.source: Like an in-person patient-doctor interaction, HealthTap Prime and HealthTap Concierge are confidential but not anonymous services. When using Premium Services, some Profile information (including your real name and health information from your Profile) is visible to doctors with whom you enter into consults. Your personal contact information is never visible on HealthTap to other members or doctors.
trans-unit.target: 就像直接的的医生与患者之间的交流，HealthTap Prime和HealthTap贵宾台是秘密的但不匿名的服务。当使用高级服务时，有一些描述信息（包括真名和您资料中的健康信息）可以被您所咨询的医生看到。您的个人联系信息是永远无法被HealthTap的其他会员和医生看到的。

trans-unit.source: Yes. HealthTap and HealthTap Premium Services use bank-level security and encryption. We meet HIPAA security standards for all interactions subject to HIPAA security regulations. We use a variety of technologies and procedures to help protect the security of your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
trans-unit.target: 是。HealthTap和HealthTap高级服务使用的是银行级安全和加密。我们符合HIPAA安全标准，因为所有的交易都是受制于HIPAA安全规则的。我们使用了广泛的技术和流程来保护您的个人信息免受未授权的登录，使用和披露。

trans-unit.source: Your Profile contains the information you provide when you create a HealthTap account, including your name, email address and date of birth. You can add optional health information to your Profile, like personal data, health goals, medications, conditions, and other information, which helps to personalize your HealthTap experience. You choose what health information to add to your Profile through using HealthTap and adding information to your Profile.
trans-unit.target: 您的个人简述包含当您创建HealthTap账户时提供的信息，包括您的名字，邮箱和出生日期。您可以选择性的添加健康信息到您的个人简述中，比如您的个人数据，健康目标，药物治疗，病症和其他信息，这些信息可以帮助您个人化您的HealthTap体验。您在使用HealthTap并添加信息到您的个人简述时，可以选择在您的个人简述中添加什么健康信息。

trans-unit.source: Yes, you can add, edit or delete optional information appearing in your Profile at any time. You can edit, but not remove, certain information (like an email address) required for login and to use HealthTap, and doctor consult notes. You have a "right to amend" your health records and can add information to your consult notes or health record to make it more accurate or complete, or have a disagreement with noted in your health record, or update other profile information by submitting a request to HealthTap support (by phone, secure online form submission or email).
trans-unit.target: 是的，您可以在任何时候添加，编辑或删除出现在您资料中的选择性添加的信息。您可以编辑，但是不能移除注册，使用HealthTap和医生咨询记录需要提供的信息（如电子邮箱地址）。您“有权利修改”您的健康记录并且可以在您的咨询记录或者健康记录上添加信息来使您的信息更加精确或完整。您可以对您的健康记录中的记录提出异议，也可以通过提交获得HealthTap支持的申请来上传其他的个人资料信息（通过手机或者邮箱提交安全的在线表格）。

trans-unit.source: On HealthTap other members and doctors cannot see your Profile or the health information in it. trans-unit.source: We use information collected through your use of HealthTap to provide you with information about our current or future services, to enable the services we provide, and otherwise as described in this Privacy Statement. This Privacy Statement describes the ways that we use or disclose your information. In support of these uses, we may use personal information to:
trans-unit.target: 我们使用在您使用HealthTap过程中我们收集到的信息，为您提供我们现在或将来提供的服务的信息，也让我们提供的服务得以实现，除此以外您的信息将会根据隐私权声明中叙述的条款处理。这份隐私声明描述了我们使用和公开您的信息的方式。为了支持这些用途，我们可能会使用个人信息：

trans-unit.source: No. Your identity is safe with us and is not for sale. We do not sell Personally Identifiable Information.

trans-unit.source: Aggregated information is information from multiple members that is not associated with any individual user account; statistics are summaries of information, not associated with any individual user account; de-identified data does not include Personally Identifiable Information. Aggregated information and de-identified data and statistics are used to run and improve the services provided on or through HealthTap. This information may also be used by us or provided to our partners for purposes of research and analysis.
trans-unit.target: 整合信息是来自与任何单独用户帐户不相关联的多个会员的信息; 统计信息是与任何个人用户帐户无关的信息摘要; 去标识的数据不包括个人身份信息。整合信息和去除标识的数据和统计信息用于运行和提高HealthTap提供的服务。这些信息也可能被我们使用或提供给我们的合作伙伴用于研究和分析。

trans-unit.source: Yes, you can share certain information from HealthTap using sign-in services social media services such as Facebook and Twitter. Please consider any impact on your privacy and anonymity when posting content to public services. Content posted to these services will be governed by the respective privacy policies of those services.
trans-unit.target: 是的，您可以使用社交媒体设备登录服务（如Facebook和Twitter）从HealthTap分享某些信息。在向公共设备发布内容时，请考虑对您的隐私和匿名性的任何影响。发布到这些设备的内容将受到这些服务的相应隐私政策的约束。

trans-unit.source: Like most online services, HealthTap uses cookies. All browser cookies we use are encrypted. We use session ID cookies and persistent cookies to enable you to sign in and to help personalize HealthTap for you. Using cookies simplifies the delivery of relevant content and allows you to retrieve information you previously provided making use of HealthTap features easier. We link the information we store in session cookies to personally identifiable information you submit while on HealthTap. You have the ability to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline some or all cookies if you prefer. If you choose to decline all cookies, you may not be able to use interactive features of HealthTap or other websites that depend on cookies.
trans-unit.target: 跟大多数网上服务一样，HealthTap也使用cookies。我们使用的浏览器cookies是加密的。我们使用session域名和持久的Cookie，使您能够登录并帮助为您个性化HealthTap。使用Cookie简化了相关内容的递交，并允许您检索之前提供的信息，使HealthTap功能的使用更容易。我们将存储在session Cookie中的信息链接到您在HealthTap上提交的个人身份信息。您可以接受或拒绝Cookie。许多网页浏览器自动接受cookies，但是您通常可以在您的浏览器设定中修改来按您的意愿拒绝一些或所有cookies。如果您选择拒绝所有Cookie，您可能无法使用HealthTap或其他依赖于Cookie的网站的交互功能。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap or the Medical Experts on HealthTap may provide you with information about external service providers ("External Service Providers") that may be of interest or use to you. HealthTap does not provide these External Service Providers with any Personally Identifiable Information about you, without your express consent.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap或HealthTap的医学专家可能会通过外部设备提供者（“外部服务提供者”）向您提供您可能感兴趣的信息。在未经您明确同意的情况下，HealthTap不会向这些外部服务提供商提供任何有关您的个人身份信息。

trans-unit.source: You may reach us by contacting our support team via email or you may write to us at our most current address. Please see our

trans-unit.source: We value your privacy. This Privacy Statement describes how we will protect and handle the personal information that you provide to us through our web, mobile and related services. Among other things, the HealthTap Privacy Statement explains:

trans-unit.source: When we say we care about your privacy, we mean it. Privacy policies are important documents, but many people don't read them because they are too long, are confusing, or are written in 'legalese.'
trans-unit.target: 当我们宣布注重您的隐私时，我们会做到。隐私政策是重要的文件，但许多人不读他们，因为他们太长，太复杂，或由法律术语书写而成。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, we’ve designed our Privacy Statement with our members in mind, creating links to the most common questions members may have about the site and how it works where privacy issues may be involved. We’ve also written everything in plain, understandable language.
trans-unit.target: 因此，考虑到我们的会员，我们设计了隐私声明。在关于网站的最常见的问题上，以及在工作中可能涉及到的隐私问题上，我们都创建了链接。我们同样写过平易的难以理解的东西。

trans-unit.source: that describes our core beliefs about privacy and your core rights as a user of our site. These documents are located on our

You select a name under which you appear when using the Site (a Public Profile Name). You can stay anonymous by selecting a confidential Public Profile Name and by keeping that private. HealthTap uses bank-level security and encryption. More about our security measures can be found

trans-unit.source: Yes. Your account and Health Activity information are secure and password protected.
trans-unit.target: 是。您的账户和健康活动信息是安全并受密码保护的。

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can close your account at any time by signing into your HealthTap account and choosing “Delete Account” from your Account Settings. You will receive an email confirming that your account has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 是。您能随时通过登录您的HealthTap账户并在账户设置中选择“删除账户”来关闭您的账户。您将收到一封确认您的帐户已被删除的电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap allows members to “connect with” doctors. HealthTap does not reveal your real name or any other Personally Identifiable Information to doctors when you Follow or Connect with them. If you request a Private Conversation with an expert on HealthTap, and an expert accepts this request, your name and Health Activity will be visible to that expert.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap允许会员“连接”医生。在您与医生联系沟通的过程中HealthTap不会向他们泄露您的真实姓名或其他个人可识别信息。如果您在HealthTap上请求与一位专家进行对话并获得许可，您的姓名与健康活动将对该名专家可见。

trans-unit.source: Yes. After you sign up for HealthTap, we will send you a message welcoming you to our community and thanking you for joining us. After that, HealthTap may occasionally send messages on the HealthTap message system or to an email address you provide to us. No one likes Spam, so we do not send our members Spam. As described elsewhere in this Privacy Statement, HealthTap may also send you notifications (which you can turn off) and important messages to the email address listed in your Account Settings.
trans-unit.target: 是。在您注册了HealthTap账户后，我们将会向您发送邮件欢迎您加入我们的社区，同时对您的加入表达感谢。在注册之后，HealthTap会不时通过网站信息系统或您提供的邮箱地址向您发送信件。没有人喜欢垃圾邮件，因此我们不会向我们的会员发送垃圾邮件。如前在这个隐私声明中所述，HealthTap会向您列在账户设置中的邮箱地址发送关于通知和重要消息的邮件。

trans-unit.source: Yes. While HealthTap does not monitor the information exchanged in Direct Messages/Private Conversations, HealthTap doctors are required to keep these communications confidential and private, much like they would for an in-person doctor-patient interaction.
trans-unit.target: 是。尽管HealthTap不监控直接信息和私人对话的交流，但是HealthTap的医生被要求对这些对话保密，就像他们是在做私人的医患互动。

trans-unit.source: Questions and answers on HealthTap are for general education and information. Only general, informational questions are permitted. For specific, personal health questions, always ask your own doctor or healthcare provider. (HealthTap Medical Experts are not your personal doctor or healthcare provider, and their answers to questions are not personal or for personal use.) For a small fee, you can also ask a specific HealthTap Medical Expert a question by starting a private health conversation [Conversation].
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的问题和回答是普通教育和信息。只允许一般的信息问题。对于具体的、私人的健康问题，请您咨询您的私人医生或是健康医护提供者。（HealthTap的医学专家不是您的私人医生或是健康医护提供者，他们对于问题的回答也不是针对个人的或是可用作私人的。）您可以通过支付一笔较小的费用来与一名具体的HealthTap的医学专家进行私下对话式的提问。

trans-unit.source: For a small fee, you can ask a question to a specific Medical Expert on HealthTap. The doctor has a limited period of time to respond. These questions are private (not visible on HealthTap to other members or doctors) and secure. The doctor you ask the question to will be able to see information contained within your Health Activity and can aslo see you real name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过支付一笔很小的费用来向HealthTap上一名具体的医学专家提问。医生回应的时间有限这些问题是隐私（对HealthTap上其他会员和医生不可见）且安全的。接受您询问的问题的医生将会有权看到您的健康活动信息和您的真实姓名。

trans-unit.source: Yes. Unlike publicly visible questions and answers on HealthTap, you can provide Personally Identifiable Information in an Episode question and follow up.
trans-unit.target: 是。与HealthTap上公开可见的的问题与回答不同，您可以在一个片段式问题及其跟进中提供个人可识别信息。

trans-unit.source: We use personal information collected through HealthTap, including health and wellness information, to enable the services we provide, and as described in this Privacy Statement. This Privacy Statement describes the ways that we use or disclose your information. In support of these uses, we may use personal information to:
trans-unit.target: 我们如在隐私声明中所述那样使用通过HealthTap收集的个人信息来使服务可行，包括健康信息。这份隐私声明描述了我们使用和公开您的信息的方式。为了支持这些用途，我们可能会使用个人信息：

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can edit or delete information in your Health Activity by signing in to your HealthTap account and editing your Health Activity. Once you edit or delete a record, you cannot retrieve it. Information in Private Conversations cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 是。您能通过登录您的HealthTap账户并编辑健康活动来对其信息进行编辑或删除。一旦编辑或删除记录后，您将无法检索该记录。无法删除“私人对话”中的信息。

trans-unit.source: We use cookies to enable you to sign in and to help personalize HealthTap. Using cookies simplifies the process of delivering relevant content and allows you to retrieve the information you previously provided, so that you can easily use the site's features. We use both session ID cookies and persistent cookies, and all browser Cookies we use are encrypted. We link the information we store in session cookies to personally identifiable information you submit while on our site. You have the ability to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline some or all cookies if you prefer. If you choose to decline all cookies, you may not be able to use interactive features of this or other web sites that depend on cookies.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用Cookie让您登录并帮助您个性化HealthTap。使用cookies简化了提供内容的过程，并允许您检索您以前提供的信息，以便您可以轻松地使用该网站的功能。我们同时使用会话识别cookies和持续性cookies，我们使用的所有浏览器cookies都是加密的。我们在网站上将您提交的个人可识别信息与我们储存在会话cookies中的信息连接起来。您可以接受或拒绝Cookie。许多网页浏览器自动接受cookies，但是您通常可以在您的浏览器设定中修改来按您的意愿拒绝一些或所有cookies。如果您选择拒绝所有cookies，您可能不能使用基于cookies的这个或其他网站的互动特征。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap does not share your Personally Identifiable Information (for example, your real name or email address) with anyone unless you permit it. When you enter into a private health conversation with a doctor on HealthTap for a fee, you permit your Personally Identifiable Information to be made available to this doctor. HealthTap works by helping you find reliable and personalized health information. As part of this service, HealthTap may provide you with information about external service providers (“Service Providers”) that may be of interest or use to you (for example, a health clinic). HealthTap does not provide these external Service Providers with any Personally Identifiable Information about you, without your express consent. Service Providers cannot access your Health Activity or other health and wellness information through HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap除非在您允许的情况下，否则不会和他人分享您的个人可识别信息（比如您的真实姓名或邮箱地址）。当您付费与HealthTap上一名医生开始私人健康对话时视为您允许使您的个人身份可识别信息对其可见。HealthTap的运营理念是帮助您找到可靠的私人健康信息。作为服务的一部分，HealthTap会给您提供您可能感兴趣或对您有益的外部服务商（比如健康诊所）。HealthTap在没有您明确的同意下不会向这些外部服务商提供任何关于您的个人身份可识别信息。服务提供商不能通过HealthTap获得您健康活动或其他的健康信息。

trans-unit.source: Some members may want to share personal information with a Service Provider. You can always do this on your own. If we allow this in the future, before you share any information with a Service Provider through HealthTap, we will require you to confirm that you agree to any such sharing. As used in this question and answer, “Service Providers” does not include HealthTap Medical Experts.
trans-unit.target: 一些会员会希望和服务提供商分享个人信息。您可以自己做这个。如果我们在未来允许这项行动，我们会在您通过HealthTap与服务提供商分享任何信息之前要求您确认您同意这些分享行为。作为问答的一部分，”服务提供者”不包括HealthTap的医学专家。

trans-unit.source: Yes. By continuing to use HealthTap, you agree to this Privacy Statement and any updates to it. This means that if the Privacy Statement changes, you agree to these changes if you keep using HealthTap. When this policy is changed (other than for typographical corrections that do not change its meaning), we will update the "last modified" date at the top of the policy. We also will provide a summary at the bottom of the policy, describing the types of changes made.
trans-unit.target: 是。您持续使用HealthTap代表您同意隐私声明和它的任何更新。这意味着如果隐私声明更改了，您保持使用HealthTap的行为代表您同意这些更改。当政策更改（除非是不影响内涵的印刷错误的改正）时，我们会将最后修改日期更新到政策顶端。我们也会在政策底部提供一个描述变化类型的梗概。

trans-unit.source: The CDC and the United States Preventive Services Task Force (USPSTF) recommend that Baby Boomers (those born 1945–1965) and high-risk individuals get a simple blood test to screen for Hepatitis C Virus (HCV). If left untreated Hepatitis C can cause liver damage, cirrhosis, liver failure, and other medical problems. If you meet screening guidelines,
trans-unit.target: 疾病控制中心和美国预防服务工作组(USPSTF)建议新生儿一代(1945 – 1965期间出生的)和高危个体进行一个简单的血液检验来检测丙型肝炎病毒(HCV)。如果不及时治疗丙型肝炎可能会引起肝脏损伤，肝硬化，肝功能衰竭和其他健康问题。如果您达到了筛选指标，

trans-unit.source: No. HealthTap is not an ACA-compliant line of coverage, but rather an ancillary solution to bridge your clients' deductible gaps. It is the perfect wrap for a CDHP skinny plan, and is proven to streamline claims utilization both in the group fully-insured space and the group self-insured space. In fact, we typically drive healthcare savings of over $50 per employee per month for these organizations.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不是符合ACA标准的覆盖范围，而是一种辅助解决方案，以弥补客户的可扣除差额。它是CDHP瘦身计划的完美包装，并且被证明可以在组保险空间和组自保险空间中简化索赔利用。实际上，我们为这些机构的员工每人每月省下了至少50美金健康医护费用，这是我们的特点之一。

trans-unit.source: Yes. The various languages doctors speak are included in their profile. If your client is interested in speaking to a doctor in a different language, they will have to schedule a virtual appointment through HealthTap Concierge (additional cost). If the client is interested in talking to a doctor immediately, they will be connected to whichever doctor is currently available regardless of the language they speak.
trans-unit.target: 是。说不同语言的医生都记录在他们的档案中。如果您的客户对用另外一种语言与一个医生交谈感兴趣，他们将会被安排一个通过HealthTap贵宾台进行的在线预约。（此服务会产生额外费用）如果客户倾向于与医生进行即时交谈，无论哪一位在线的医生，无论他们说什么语言，都会联系到这位客户。

trans-unit.source: Pre-purchase distribution: Licensee agrees to pre-purchase at the Base Price at least the Minimum Number of annual Qualified Subscriptions upon execution of this Agreement. Payment for this purchase shall grants Licensee the right to: (i) sell these Pre-Purchased Subscriptions at any price, for which Licensee shall receive from HealthTap all Subscription Agreement Fees collected by HealthTap for these Pre-Purchased Subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: 预购分销：根据此协议，执业执照人同意以基准价格预先购买至少基本数量的合格的产品订购。本次付款应授予执业执照人以下权利：(I) 以任何价格出售这些预购订购，执业执照人应从HealthTap收到HealthTap为这些预购订购收集的所有订购协议费用。

trans-unit.source: Revenue Share Subscriptions. Licensee agrees to Licensee pay the Revenue Share Distribution Fee. The price for this fee is set forth in Exhibit A. This shall entitle Licensee to sell memberships for the Licensee Commission set forth in Exhibit A.
trans-unit.target: 收入分享订购。：执业执照人同意被许可人支付收入分配费。此费用的价格在附录A被提出。这应授予执业执照人出售会员资格以得到佣金的资格。佣金问题在附录A中有被提到。

trans-unit.source: Term. The initial term of this Agreement shall be for one (1) year from the Effective Date (“Initial Term”), and shall automatically renew for additional one (1) year terms (each a “Renewal Term”) unless Licensee provides Licensor with written notice of its intent not to renew at least ninety (90) days prior to any such Renewal Term. HealthTap may terminate this agreement for convenience upon thirty (30) notice to Licensee but in the event of such termination Licesee shall retain the right to sell any Pre-Paid subscriptions under the terms of this Agreement for the applicable Calendar Year.
trans-unit.target: 条款。本协议的初始期限为自生效日期（“初始期限”）起一（1）年，并自动续约一（1）年（每次为“续约期”），除非被许可人向执业执照人提供 书面通知其意图在任何此类续订期限前至少九十（90）天不续订。HealthTap可以在向被许可方发出三十（30）条通知后终止本协议，但如果终止，执业执照人应保留在适用的日历年根据本协议的条款出售任何预付费订购的权利。

trans-unit.source: Prescriptions, referrals, reminders & more
trans-unit.target: 处方，转诊，提醒等

trans-unit.source: By dividing apps into 30 separate categories, AppRx and the HealthTap Annual AppRx Report help users make sense of the vast landscape of health and wellness apps. The independent reviews provided by doctors on HealthTap help both patients and peer doctors learn which apps are medically sound, useful in supporting health or wellness goals, and easy to learn and use. The ratings reveal some surprising recommendations for best apps that might otherwise be missed.
trans-unit.target: 通过将应用程序分为30个不同的类别，App医生评测和HealthTap年度App医生评测报告帮助用户了解健康应用程序的广阔景观。HealthTap上医生提供的独立评价帮助患者和同行医生了解哪些应用程序在医学上是健全的，有助于支持健康或健康目标，以及易于学习和使用。对于那些容易被忽视的最好的应用程序，评分显示了令人惊讶的意见。

trans-unit.source: Affiliate wishes to promote Company’s services (“Affiliate’s Promotion”), described below (“Promoted Services”), and disseminate a customized Affiliate link provided to Affiliate by the company (“Affiliate Link”) to a landing page on the Company’s website and mobile apps (“Company Apps”) through which consumers can pay for the Promoted Services. Affiliate’s Promotion may take place through Affiliate’s website, apps, social media accounts, or other channels (“Affiliate Channels”).
trans-unit.target: 联盟计划希望宣传公司的服务（“联盟推广”），以下所述（“推广服务”），并向公司网站和移动设备的目标网页（“Affiliate Link”）提供一个定制的Affiliate链接应用程序（“公司应用程序”），消费者可以通过这些应用程序支付推广服务。联盟推广活动可通过联盟网站、应用程序、社交媒体帐户或其他渠道（“联盟渠道”）进行。

trans-unit.source: a. Company shall provide Affiliate with a custom Affiliate Link directed to a specific landing page (the “Affiliate Landing Page”) on the Company’s website and/or mobile apps (the “Company Apps”). Affiliate agrees that Affiliate is only entitled to compensation, as further set forth herein, for customer sign ups generated directly from this Affiliate Link.
trans-unit.target: a.公司应向关联公司提供定向到公司网站和/或移动应用程序（“公司应用程序”）上的特定目标网页（“关联企业目标网页”）的自定义关联企业链接。关联公司同意，只有直接从此关联企业链接生成的客户注册，关联企业才有权获得进一步阐述的赔偿。

trans-unit.source: c. Commissions are held for a period of 2 months from any purchase to protect Company in the event of any chargeback that may occur. Company shall pay all Commissions accrued and payable to Affiliate within fifteen (15) days of the first day of each month after such holdback period (the “Commission Payment Date”). Company may withhold any Commission payments as well as any actual chargeback fees for which the Company is liable that are generated through transactions from sign ups through the Affiliate Link (“Affiliate Chargeback Fees”), from any Commission Payments to Affiliate. If at any time Affiliate’s Commission Payments balance is negative as a result of Affiliate Chargeback Fees, Company may suspend or terminate the Affiliate Link or Affiliate’s participation in the Affiliate Program.
trans-unit.target: c.购买者持有的佣金的两个月期间，保护公司可能发生的任何退款。公司应在扣除期后（“佣金支付日”）后，每个月第一天之后的十五天内支付应付给联盟的所有佣金。公司可以把佣金付款给关联公司，扣留委员会付款以及通过会员链接（“会员退款费”）注册交易产生的实际退款费。如果由于联盟退款费用，联盟佣金付款余额为负值，公司可以暂停或终止联盟链接，或联盟伙伴参与联盟计划。

trans-unit.source: d. If on any Commission Payment Date, the amount of total Commissions accrued and payable to Affiliate is less than $25.00, then such accrued and payable balance shall be held over to the following month, and paid together with the Commissions due for that month. If at any time, the balance of accrued and payable Commissions is held over for 2 consecutive months, then Company shall pay all accrued and payable Commissions to Affiliate in the third month, regardless of the total amount owed. Payment is made via the Affiliate PayPal account or other account permitted by Company. Affiliate is responsible for any payment processing or PayPal fees associated with delivery and receipt of payment and understands and agrees that payments received will be reduced by any such fees..
trans-unit.target: d.如果在佣金支付日期时，支付给关联公司的佣金总额小于25.00美元，那么应计和应付的余额应持续到下个月，并与该月到期的佣金一起支付。无论任何时候，应计和应付佣金的余额持续2个月，则公司应在第三个月支付所有应计和应付佣金给关联公司，不论欠款总额。通过联盟PayPal帐户或公司允许的其他帐户进行付款。联盟负责与交付和收到付款相关的付款处理或PayPal费用，并理解和同意收到的付款将通过此类费用减少。

trans-unit.source: f. Nothing in this agreement guarantees that Affiliate will be successful or make any money under the program. Affiliate understands that no compensation is guaranteed for any efforts made.
trans-unit.target: 在这个协议中,没有任何条款保证附属公司会在项目中必然成功或者盈利.子公司理解任何努力都不能保证赔偿金。

trans-unit.source: b. Either Party shall have the right to terminate this Agreement at any time and for any cause. The Company may terminate this Agreement without notice. The Affiliate must give written notice to Company at least 30 days prior to the intended date of termination.
trans-unit.target: 任何一方在任何时候,都有权以任何原因终止该协议。公司可以终止本协议，恕不另行通知。附属公司必须至少在预定的终止日期30天前书面通知公司。

trans-unit.source: . During the Term the Practice shall be liable to HealthTap for License Fees. These fees may include an annual base fee (if any) and/or transactional license fees (i.e. a per- consult fee). The License Fees are set forth or referenced in Schedule B (“License Fees”) for the Licensed Services. The annual base (if any) License Fee shall be paid in advance by the Practice and when due. In payment of the transactional License Fee, the Practice hereby authorizes HealthTap to: (i) collect and deposit, on behalf of the Practice, in a bank account in the name of HealthTap, the consultation fee for the Remote Medical Consultation conducted by the Practice; and (ii) deduct and retain the License Fee from the consultation fee collected by HealthTap prior to payment in full of the annual base (if any) license fee and then remitting to the Practice the remaining portion of the consultation fee for the Remote Medical Consultation. Remittances to the Practice shall be made on a regular basis, on or about the first of every month or otherwise as set forth in Schedule B. License Fees are subject to change at any time.
trans-unit.target: .在合同期限内，诊疗应对HealthTap的执业执照费用承担责任。这些费用可能包括年度基准费（如有）和/或交易执业执照费（即每次咨询费）。执业执照费用在执业执照服务附录B（“执业执照费”）中会列出或涉及。年度基本（如果有）执业执照费用应由Practice预先在到期时支付。在支付交易执业执照费用上，诊疗特此授权HealthTap：(i) 代表诊疗，以HealthTap的名义在一个银行账户内收取及存放诊疗所进行的远程医疗咨询的咨询费用; (ii)在缴付全数年度基准（如有的话）执业执照费之前，从HealthTap收取的咨询费中扣除及保留牌照费，然后向远程医疗咨询费余下部分 。给诊疗汇兑款项须定期大约在每月第一天或附表B所载的其他日期进行。执业执照费用可随时更改。

trans-unit.source: . In the event the Licensee Fee is not collected by HealthTap or otherwise is insufficient or remains unpaid in full forty-five (45) or more days from the date such fee is due and owing from the Practice to HealthTap, HealthTap may, in its discretion, terminate this Agreement.
trans-unit.target: .如果执业执照费用未由HealthTap收取或以其他方式不足或仍未从该费用到期之日起45天或更多天内到期，并且从HealthTap诊疗中扣除，HealthTap可自行决定 ，终止本协议。

trans-unit.source: . The Practice shall be responsible for and shall pay or reimburse HealthTap for any sales, use, import, excise, value added or other taxes or levies associated with this Agreement and the Licensed Services, excluding any taxes based on the net income of HealthTap, unless customer is tax exempt and provides documentation of such.
trans-unit.target: .诊疗应负责并支付或报销HealthTap与本协议和执业执照服务相关的任何销售、使用、进口、消费税、增值税或其他税费，不包含基于HealthTap净收入的任何税收；除非客户是免税的，并提供文件。

trans-unit.source: . HealthTap may, from time to time, in its sole discretion provide Updates to the Practice, such updates may be provided across the platform in the cloud. For purposes of this Agreement, “Updates” means corrections, changes and improvements to the Licensed Services that (i) relate to the operating performance of the Licensed Services, but do not change the basic function of the Licensed Services; (ii) are intended for general commercial use in connection with the Licensed Services; and (iii) are provided generally to HealthTap’s other customers without additional charge. Updates do not necessarily include new releases or versions of the Licensed Services for which HealthTap, in its sole and exclusive discretion, imposes an additional charge. HealthTap may, however, in its sole and exclusive discretion, provide Updates to the Practice that include new functionality. Any and all Updates are deemed part of the Licensed Services and shall be protected and governed by the terms and conditions of this Agreement and subject to the license granted in Section 1.
trans-unit.target: .HealthTap可能会不时自行决定为诊疗提供更新，此类更新可能会在云平台上提供。对于本协议，“更新”指可以在以下方面对执业执照服务进行更正，修改和改进，（i）与许可服务的运营绩效相关，但不改变许可服务的基本功能; （ii）用于与许可服务有关的一般商业用途; （iii）通常提供给HealthTap的其他客户，无需支付额外费用。更新不一定包括执业执照服务的新版本，HealthTap将根据其唯一和专有的裁量权，征收额外费用。然而，HealthTap可自行决定向诊疗提供包含新功能升级。任何和所有更新均被视为执业执照服务的一部分，并受本协议的条款以及第1节中授予的许可条件的保护和约束。

trans-unit.source: . The Practice acknowledges and agrees that the Licensed Services constitute valuable and confidential proprietary information and intellectual property of HealthTap, that are protected under civil and criminal law and under the laws of patent, copyright and trade secret, and, except as expressly provided herein, shall not be disclosed in any form by the Practice to any unauthorized third party. Each Party agrees that all information supplied by one Party and its affiliates and agents (collectively, the “Disclosing Party”) to the other (“Receiving Party”) including, without limitation, (i) source code, trade secrets, databases, designs and techniques, engine protocols, models, displays and manuals, and the selection, coordination, and arrangement of the contents of such materials; and (ii) any unpublished information concerning research activities and plans, customers, marketing or sales plans, sales forecasts or results of marketing efforts, pricing or pricing strategies, costs, operational techniques, strategic plans, and unpublished financial information, including information concerning revenues, profits and profit margins will be deemed confidential and proprietary to the Disclosing Party, regardless of whether such information was disclosed intentionally or unintentionally or marked as “confidential” or “proprietary” (“Confidential Information”). The Licensed Services shall be deemed Confidential Information of HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: .诊疗承认并同意，执业执照服务构成HealthTap有价机密的专有信息和知识产权，受民法和刑法以及专利、版权和商业机密法保护，除非本协议明确规定，不得以任何形式向任何未经授权的第三方披露。各方同意，一方及其关联方和代理（统称为“披露方”）向另一方（“接受方”）提供的所有信息包括但不限于（i）源代码、商业秘密、数据库、设计和技术、协议引擎、模型，展示和指南，以及这些材料内容的选择、协调和安排; （ii）关于研究活动和计划、客户、营销或销售计划，销售预测或营销活动结果、定价或定价策略、成本、运营技术、战略计划方面未发布的信息，和未发布的财务信息（包括收益、利润和利润率）将被视为披露方的机密和所有权，无论此类信息是有意还是无意地披露，或是否标记有“机密”或“所有权”（“机密信息”）。执业执照服务应被视为HealthTap的机密信息。

trans-unit.source: . Confidential Information will not include any information or material, or any element thereof, whether or not such information or material is Confidential Information for the purposes of this Agreement, to the extent any such information or material, or any element thereof: (a) has previously become or is generally known, unless it has become generally known through a breach of this Agreement or a similar confidentiality or non- disclosure agreement, obligation or duty; (b) was already rightfully known to the Receiving Party prior to being disclosed by or obtained from the Disclosing Party as evidenced by written records kept in the ordinary course of business or by proof of actual use by the Receiving Party; (c) has been or is hereafter rightfully received by the Receiving Party from a third person (other than the Disclosing Party) without restriction or disclosure and without breach of a duty of confidentiality to the Disclosing Party; or (d) has been independently developed by the Receiving Party without access to Confidential Information of the Disclosing Party. It will be presumed that any Confidential Information in a Receiving Party’s possession is not within exceptions (b), (c) or (d) above, and the burden will be upon the Receiving Party to prove otherwise by records and documentation.
trans-unit.target: .机密信息不包括任何信息／材料或其任何元素，无论此类信息或材料是否为本协议中的机密信息，在任何此类信息／材料或其任何元素的范围内：(a) 先前已广为人知，除非通过违反本协议或类似的保密协议/义务/责任而变得普遍已知; (b) 通过普通业务过程中保存的书面记录或接收方能够证明的，在披露方披露之前已被接收方合法得知的; (c) 接受方从第三方（披露方除外）正当地获知，不受限制且不违反披露方的保密义务; 或(d) 由接收方独立开发，没有参考披露方的机密信息。应假定在上述情况(b)，(c)或(d)中，接收方拥有机密信息，但需承担通过记录和文件证明的责任。

trans-unit.source: . Each Party recognizes the importance of the other’s Confidential Information. In particular, each Party recognizes and agrees that the Confidential Information of the other is critical to their respective businesses and that neither Party would enter into this Agreement without assurance that such information and the value thereof will be protected as provided in this Section 6 and elsewhere in this Agreement. Accordingly, each Party agrees as follows: (a) the Receiving Party will hold any and all Confidential Information it obtains in strictest confidence and will use and permit use of Confidential Information solely for the purposes of this Agreement; (b) the Receiving Party may disclose or provide access to its responsible employees who have a need to know and may make copies of Confidential Information only to the extent reasonably necessary to carry out its obligations hereunder; and (c) the Receiving Party currently has, and for so long as it possesses Confidential Information of the Disclosing Party, it will maintain in effect and enforce, rules and policies to protect against access to or use or disclosure of Confidential Information other than in accordance with this Agreement, including without limitation written instruction to and agreements with employees and agents who are bound by an obligation of confidentiality no less restrictive than set forth in this Agreement to ensure that such employees and agents protect the confidentiality of Confidential Information. The Receiving Party will instruct and require its employees and agents not to disclose Confidential Information to third parties, including without limitation customers, subcontractors or consultants, without the Disclosing Party’s prior written consent; and will notify the Disclosing Party immediately of any unauthorized disclosure or use, and will cooperate with the Disclosing Party to protect all proprietary rights in and ownership of its Confidential Information.
trans-unit.target: .每个缔约方承认他方机密信息的重要性。特别是，每一方承认并同意，他方的机密信息对其各自业务至关重要。如果得不到此类信息及其价值在本协议第6节和其他条款的保护，任何一方均可拒绝签署。因此，每一缔约方都应同意：(a) 接收方将严格保密地获取机密信息，并仅为本协议的目的使用和允许使用机密信息; (b) 接收方可以披露或向其负责员工提供访问权限，这些员工需要知道机密信息并可能在合理必要的范围内复制信息，以履行其义务;(c) 接收方目前掌握，并只要掌握披露方的机密信息，应有效执行规则和政策，以防止机密信息被访问、使用或泄露，包括但不限于与受保密义务约束的员工和代理签订书面指示和协议，受本协议规定，以确保此类员工和代理保护机密信息的隐蔽性。如未经披露方事先书面同意，接收方应指示并要求其员工和代理不向第三方披露机密信息，包括但不限于客户、分包商或顾问; 如遇任何未经授权披露或使用机密信息的情况，应立即通知披露方，并将与披露方合作保护其保密信息的所有权。

trans-unit.source: . Each Party acknowledges and agrees that due to the unique nature of Confidential Information there can be no adequate remedy at law for any breach of its obligations hereunder, that any such breach or threatened breach may allow a Party or third parties to unfairly compete with the other Party resulting in irreparable harm to such party, and therefore, that upon any such breach or any threat thereof, each Party will be entitled to appropriate equitable remedies and may seek and obtain injunctive relief from a court of competent jurisdiction without the necessity of proving actual loss or posting of a bond or other security, in addition to whatever remedies either of them might have at law or equity. Any
trans-unit.target: .每一方都应承认并同意，由于机密信息的独特性，在任何一方违反其义务的情况下，法律上没有足够的补救措施。任何此类违约或潜在的违约都有可能导致一方或多方与另一方不公平竞争，从而对缔约方造成不可弥补的损害。因此，在任何此类违约或潜在违约的情况下，每一缔约方均有权获得适当的公平补救，并向有管辖权的法院寻求并获得禁令救济，而无需证明实际损失、张贴债券或其他证券，以及他们在法律方面可能存在的补救措施。任何

trans-unit.source: . Except as otherwise specifically provided herein, no remedy referred to in this Agreement is intended to be exclusive. No delay by either Party in exercising any of their respective rights or remedies hereunder shall be deemed to be a waiver of such rights or remedies. No waiver by either Party of any rights under this Agreement or breach by the other Party hereunder shall in any way be a waiver of any such rights in the future or any future breach. Any waiver, amendment or modification of this Agreement must be in writing and signed by the party against whom enforcement is sought.
trans-unit.target: .除非另有特别规定，与该项协议有关的补救措施都有效任何一方在行使各自的权利或补救措施时出现延误将被视为放弃这种权利或补救措施。任何一方放弃本协议下的任何权利或另一方违反本协议下的任何权利将视为以任何方式在未来或未来违约情况下的弃权。任何对于此协议的弃权、修正或更改行为必须采用书面形式并由寻求执行的另一方签署通过。

trans-unit.source: . Neither Party shall assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other Party, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld. Furthermore, the Practice acknowledges and agrees that the Licensed Services may not be sublicensed or otherwise transferred voluntarily or by operation of law to any third party. Any attempted assignment, license, sublicense or transfer by the Practice, whether voluntary or involuntary, shall be void and shall be grounds for immediate termination of this Agreement. Subject to the foregoing, this Agreement shall be binding upon and shall inure to the benefit of the successors and permitted assigns of the parties hereto.
trans-unit.target: .任何一方预分配该协议需预先获得另一方的书面同意，书面同意不可被不合理扣留。再者，诊疗承认并同意执业执照服务不可发放从属证书，不可自愿转让，不可依法转让给第三方。诊疗任何试图分配，许可，发放从属证书或转让的行为，不论自愿还是非自愿，都将视为无效并据此视为立即结束本协议根据前述事项，该协议具有约束力并使继承人和同意分配双方获益。

trans-unit.source: . This Agreement and the rights of the parties hereto shall be governed by the laws of the State of California without regard to principles of conflict of laws. In the event of any litigation arising out of, or relating to, this Agreement or the breach thereof, the venue for any such action shall be in the State or Federal courts located in Santa Clara County, California.
trans-unit.target: .该项协议和到目前为止的当事人权利取决于加利福尼亚州的法律规定而无关法律兼容性原则。任何诉讼的发生，只要是关于该协议或起于违反合同的行为，其审判地都在位于加利福尼亚州，圣克拉拉郡的州或联邦法院。

trans-unit.source: . If any provision of this Agreement is held to be invalid or unenforceable for any reason, such provision shall be conformed to prevailing law rather than voided, if possible, in order to achieve the intent of the parties and, in any event, the remaining provisions of this Agreement shall remain in full force and effect and shall be binding upon the parties hereto. The captions of this Agreement are solely for reference and have no legal effect whatsoever and shall not in any way affect the interpretation or construction of this Agreement.
trans-unit.target: .若该协议中的任何条款被视为无效或由于某种原因无法强制实行，这些条款的制定需遵照现行法而不是被废弃的法律，如有可能，为满足双方的目的，无论如何，该协议的其余条款应保留其原有的效力及影响力，对双方都应有约束力。该协议的题注仅供参考，不具任何法律效力，也不会在任何方面影响该协议的诠释及撰写。

trans-unit.source: . Neither Party shall be liable for damage due to any cause beyond its control, including, without limitation, acts of God, acts of civil or military authority, labor disputes, failure or delay of suppliers or systems, including communications and power systems, fire, sabotage, war, embargo or acts or omissions of the other Party caused by any of such events.
trans-unit.target: .协议双方不必对由于不可控力导致的损失负责，包括但不限于天灾，民事行为，军方行为，劳动纠纷，供应厂商或系统的失误及延误，包括通讯及电力系统，火灾，破坏活动，战争，禁令或是由另一方据上述情况引起的作为或不作为。

trans-unit.source: . The Practice shall comply with all applicable laws and regulations, including, but not limited to, those laws and regulations governing its use of the Licensed Services. HealthTap shall comply with applicable laws and regulations in its performance of this Agreement and the provision of the Licensed Services.
trans-unit.target: .诊疗应当遵照所有适用的法律法规，包括但不限于规定执业执照服务使用细则的法律法规。HealthTap应当遵照所有适用于该协议执行及执业执照服务条款的法律法规

trans-unit.source: . No notice or other communication shall be deemed given unless sent in any of the manners, and to the persons, as specified in this paragraph. All notices and other communications hereunder shall be in writing and shall be deemed given: (a) upon receipt if delivered personally to a Company officer; (b) upon receipt if mailed by registered or certified mail receipt requested, postage prepaid; (c) at 5:00 p.m. on the business day after dispatch if sent by a nationally recognized overnight courier; or (d) via e-mail notification:

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime provides primary care virtual consults with doctors licensed in your state for limited diagnosis, care and prescriptions (as appropriate). HealthTap Concierge lets you connect with your doctor for viritual consults using the HelathTap platform, or with other doctors for second opinions or one-time consults for minor conditions that can be addressed and resolved, in the sole opinion of the doctor, via a virtual consult. HealthTap Premium Services can be a great resource between doctor visits, but are not a substitute for in person doctor visits, your primary care doctor or your primary care doctor’s independent judgment about any symptom, condition, or the appropriateness or risks of a procedure or treatment for a given person. HealthTap Prime is not health insurance and is not a substitute for health insurance.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Prime提供普通门诊在线咨询与在您的州拥有执业执照的医生的诊断，医护和处方（适当时）的医生。HealthTap贵宾台可以让您与您的医生使用Helathtap平台进行在线咨询，或提供其他医生的第二意见或通过在线咨询以医生的独家观点,在处理和解决次要条件后,进行一次在线咨询。HealthTap Prime服务是一个巨大的医生咨询资源，但不能代替私人的医生的建议，不能代替您的普通门诊医生或您的普通门诊医生对于任何症状，情况的独立判断，还有对于适用性,一个手术风险或特定患者治疗的独立判断。HealthTap Prime不是健康保险而且不能替代健康保险。

This means that the choices you make about your health are, and always will be, your own choices.

trans-unit.source: “With a newborn child, it’s hard to do anything or go anywhere such as the medical centre. This app save me the time it would take to go to the doctor when it's not necessary. And when I needed advice late at night, HealthTap docs replied quickly and I didn't need to wait till the next day when the doctors are open.“
trans-unit.target: “有了新生儿，很难做任何事情或去任何地方，如医疗中心。这个程序节省了我去找医生所要花费的时间。当我在深夜需要咨询时，HealthTap文件可迅速回复，我不需要等到第二天医生开门。

trans-unit.source: “My son who's now 12 years old was born with several congenital issues. After several surgeries over the years, he's now a healthy child of 12 years. If I need any help or any tips, I find it on HealthTap, not only for him also for the whole family! It really helps!“
trans-unit.target: “我现在12岁的儿子出生时有几个先天的问题。经过这些年的几次手术，他现在是一个12岁健康的孩子。如果我需要任何帮助或任何小贴士，我发现可在HealthTap获取，它也为整个家庭服务！这真的有帮助！”

trans-unit.source: “I wish I had HealthTap Prime when my mom had a stroke and was in a coma. It would've been amazing to get an immediate second opinion instead of paying $1000 out of pocket. My mom was bed-bound, so I had to coordinate doctor appointments for her, find a handicap-accessible van, then suffer the waiting room with her. Now, I can use HealthTap in minutes for a virtual consult.“
trans-unit.target: “当我的妈妈中风和昏迷时，我希望我有HealthTap Prime。您不用支付$ 1000就可立即获取意见。我的妈妈是在躺在床上的，所以我不得不协调她和医生的会诊，要找到一个残疾人士访问面包车，并提供她的候诊室。现在，我可以在几分钟内使用HealthTap进行在线咨询。

trans-unit.source: “I love having my own private doctor on call, whenever I need him. All it takes is just a few taps on my smartphone. Best of all, I can consult with him via HD video or chat!“
trans-unit.target: “我喜欢每次我当我有需要时都有我自己的私人医生。它所需要的只是我的智能手机上的几个步骤。最棒的是，我可以通过高清视频或聊天与他协商！

trans-unit.source: “This app has improved my life vastly. I’ve had more questions than answers for a while now. It’s unreasonable to call my doctor every 5 minutes. The caring and expert doctors have been a lifesaver and brought me so much peace of mind!“
trans-unit.target: “这个应用程序已经极大的改善了我的生活。有那么一小会儿我的问题多过回答。每隔5分钟打电话给我的医生是不合理的。关怀和专业的医生一直是救星，带给我这么多的安心！

trans-unit.target: 由医学专家或其他健康医护专家在HealthTap上所创建，提交或验证的网站上的内容（统称为“专家内容”）需遵守以下附加条款和条件。（当我们使用术语“内容”时，这一术语即专家内容。）作者或发布此类内容的第三方（“海报”）对其内容负全部责任。虽然我们希望您觉得专业内容的很有帮助，但我们和海报对于在专家内容所提供的任何关于医疗条件，行动或应用药物的信息的不做出任何声明或保证 。发帖者全权负责其内容。由于您对专家内容或这一网站的使用，专家内容的海报或此类海报的雇主或供应商绝不会根据任何法律理论对您或其他人造成的任何损害或任何直接、间接、特殊、偶然、示范性、后果性的损害或其他损害负责，包括但不限于侵权、合同、严格责任或其他，即使被告知此类损害的可能性。在不限制以上所述的一般性的情况下，海报（以及此类海报的雇主和／或供应商）对HealthTap没有任何责任：（a）全部或部分由海报的行为、疏漏、疏忽，在采购、编辑或提供信息期间或通过专家内容所造成的损失或损害；（b）不管由什么所引起的此类信息的错误、疏漏或不精确，或传递信息的推迟及间断；（c）依赖于此类信息的任何决定的形成或行动的采取或不采取。这意味着您不应该依赖于专家内容以及在此基础上做重要的医学或其他方面的决定，这同时意味着海报对于您对内容做的或不做的不负责任。对于医疗建议、治疗或诊断，请咨询您的私人医生或专业健康医护提供者。您同意赔偿并保持海报（以及海报的雇主和／或供应商）免于由任何第三方作出的索赔或要求，包括律师费，因为（1）您通过专家内容发布或提供的任何内容，（2）您使用专家内容或这一网站所违反的法律，（3）您使用专家内容、应用程序及其包含的信息所做的一切。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap, its licensors, its suppliers, or any third parties mentioned on HealthTap are not liable for any personal injury, including death, attributable to or caused by your use or misuse of HealthTap or Content (including member supplied Content or Medical Expert supplied Content). Any claims arising in connection with your use of HealthTap or any Content must be brought within one (1) year of the first date of the event giving rise to such action. Remedies under these Terms and Conditions are exclusive and are limited to those expressly provided for in these Terms and Conditions.

trans-unit.source: Licensed doctors may apply to be and participate as Medical Experts on HealthTap. Physicians whose licenses are or become suspended or revoked, for any reason, are not permitted and agree not to participate in any way, including but not limited to submitting Content to HealthTap, as a Medical Expert on HealthTap. HealthTap may expand the network to include other licensed medical experts.
trans-unit.target: 拥有执业执照的医生可以申请并作为医学专家加入HealthTap。执业执照因任何原因或被吊销或撤销的医生是不允许申请，也同意不以任何方式参与，包括将内容提交到HealthTap作为HealthTap的医学专家也不被允许。HealthTap可以扩展网络以包括其他拥有执业执照的医学专家

trans-unit.source: Feel Free to share your professional clinical expertise though answers that are evidence-based and consistent with accepted standards in the medical community. HealthTap is for general questions. Refrain from using language that suggests an answer is provided for a single member. Unless you are in a Private Conversation with a user on HealthTap, refrain from answering questions that solicit your individual opinion as a single Medical Expert. Avoid answering questions or providing answers that suggest a duty of care and a doctor-patient relationship.
trans-unit.target: 自由地分享您的专业临床专业知识，当然那是基于证据和符合医疗界的公认标准内。HealthTap是为一般性问题。避免使用那些能够表明回答是由一个会员提供的语言。除非您是以私人谈话的形式与一个用户在HealthTap交流，否则作为一个医学专家避免回答那些征求您个人意见的问题。避免回答问题或提供关于照顾的义务和医生与患者关系的建议。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap permits Medical Experts to receive questions directly from specific members in Private Conversations. You will receive compensation for participating in Private Conversations according to the additional terms of the [HealthTap License Agreement and Business Associate Agreement], which are incorporated herein by reference.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap允许医学专家直接在私人的谈话收到特定会员所提的问题。根据附加条款[HealthTap的执业执照协议和业务合作协议]，您将收到补偿通过加入私人的谈话，所有这一切都被引入作为参考。

trans-unit.source: Medical Experts may not post Content to Public Areas on HealthTap in exchange for compensation of any kind, including but not limited to as a paid consultant to any entity (including any company or organization) or individual. Medical Experts should ensure that any conflict or potential conflict of interest does not affect or appear to affect his or her contributions of Content to the HealthTap. Medical Experts may receive compensation for Private Conversations on or through HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 医学专家不得将内容发布到HealthTap的公共区域，以换取任何形式的赔偿，包括但不限于作为任何实体（包括任何公司或组织）或个人的付费顾问。医学专家应该确保任何冲突或潜在的利益冲突都不影响或不能影响他/她在HealthTap咨询平台上所贡献的内容。通过在HealthTap的私人对话，医学专家可以获得补偿。

trans-unit.source: Private Conversations are private health information Q&A sessions between doctors and consumers
trans-unit.target: 私人咨询是医生和消费者之间的私人健康信息问答

trans-unit.source: You may upload appropriate content to HealthTap and rights in submissions to HealthTap are governed by the HealthTap Terms of Use. Information in your Virtual Practice and any submissions to a Public Area of HealthTap are not confidential. Outside of these, we ask that you keep confidential all information exchanged between us and all information exchanged between you and HealthTap members in Private Conversations. You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when you use HealthTap, including necessary privacy and HIPAA requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将相应的内容上传到HealthTap，提交到HealthTap的权利受HealthTap使用条款的约束。您的在线诊疗中的信息和HealthTap公共区域的任何提交信息将不会保密。除此之外，我们要求您保密我们之间交换的所有信息和您与HealthTap会员之间在私人对话中交换的所有信息。您同意在使用HealthTap时遵守所有适用的法律和法规，包括必要的隐私和HIPAA要求。

trans-unit.source: means all confidential and proprietary information, whether received orally, in writing, or by or through a product, that is designated as confidential or that reasonably should be understood to be confidential given the nature of the information and the circumstances of disclosure. Confidential Information includes the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Participant submissions, information, and data, the HealthTap Services, and HealthTap’s: technology and technical information, product designs, business and marketing plans, and business processes. Confidential Information excludes any information that: (i) is or becomes generally known to the public without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap; (ii) was known to Subscriber prior to its disclosure by the HealthTap without breach of any obligation owed to the HealthTap; (iii) was independently developed by Subscriber without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap; or (iv) is received from a third party without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 不论是经口头，书面还是通过产品被指定为机密或根据信息的性质和披露的情况理应合理地保密的所有机密和专有信息。机密信息包括本协议，参与者提交，信息和数据，HealthTap的服务条款和条件：技术和技术信息，产品设计，业务和营销计划和业务流程。保密信息不包括以下任何信息：(I) 是公众已知的或普遍知道的，而不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; (ii) 在HealthTap披露之前已为订户所知，且不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; (iii) 由订户独立开发，且不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; (iv) 从第三方收到，而不违反对HealthTap的任何义务。

trans-unit.source: Participants can pay for Private Conversations, and HealthTap shall collect these Conversation Fees. Subscribers can also provide Participants with a promotional code, which allow for a Private Conversation without a Conversation Fee (when such promotional codes are used, Subscriber shall not receive any compensation for any such interaction). Conversation Fees collected from Participants will be distributed to Subscriber by check or money transfer (using a service such as PayPal) after both (i) the total of the Subscriber’s Conversation Fees exceeds $100 (each a "Payment Distribution") and (ii) Subscriber request, and such distribution to Subscriber shall be the total of all collected Conversation Fees minus the applicable License and Subscription Fees. Conversation Fees and License and Subscription Fees are subject to adjustment pursuant to HealthTap policies and procedures
trans-unit.target: 参与者可以支付私人对话，HealthTap应收取这些对话费。订购者还可以向参与者提供促销代码，允许在没有对话费的情况下进行私人对话（当使用此类促销代码时，订购者不会因任何此类交互而获得任何补偿）。当(i) 订户的对话费用总额超过100美元（每个为“付款分配”）和(ii)订购者的要求和所有收集的对话费减去适用的执业执照和订购费用的总和时，向参与者所收取的对话费会分发给订购者来确认费用（比如使用PayPal等服务）对咨询费用和执业执照和订购费可根据HealthTap政策和程序进行调整。

trans-unit.source: Either party may terminate this Agreement without cause upon thirty (30) days written notice; upon such termination by Subscriber, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap and any such participation shall reinstate this agreement; upon such termination by HealthTap, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap. This Agreement may be terminated with cause (i) upon thirty (30) days written notice by non-breaching party of a material breach to the breaching party if such breach remains uncured at the expiration of such period; (ii) immediately, if a party becomes the subject of a petition in bankruptcy or any other proceeding relating to insolvency, receivership, liquidation or assignment for the benefit of creditors, (iii) immediately, upon notice by HealthTap upon a breach of any of Sections 3, 4 or 7(D).
trans-unit.target: 任何一方均可在三十（30）天书面通知后立即终止本协议; 在订户终止后，订户同意不再参与HealthTap上的任何进一步私人对话，任何此类参与都将恢复本协议; 在HealthTap终止后，用户同意不再参加HealthTap上的任何进一步私人对话。本协议可能因以下原因被终止：(i) 如果违约行为在违约行为期限届满时仍未得到解决，则违约方在三十（30）天内书面通知重大违约行为; (ii) 如果一方成为破产申请或与破产，接管，清算或转让有关的债权人的任何其他诉讼的主体，(iii) 在HealthTap违反任何第3，4或7(D)条。

trans-unit.source: Each party represents and warrants that it has the legal power to enter into this Agreement. This Agreement does not create a partnership, joint venture, agency, fiduciary or employment relationship between the parties. This Agreement is the entire agreement between Subject and HealthTap relating to its subject matter, and replaces any prior agreements concerning its subject matter. If there is any conflict between this agreement and a mutually signed written agreement between HealthTap and Subscriber related to HealthTap, the signed written agreement will control. If HealthTap provides a translation of the English language version of this agreement, the English language version of this agreement will control if there is any conflict. If HealthTap chooses not to enforce any provision of this Agreement, HealthTap retains the right to enforce it in the future. This means that the failure to enforce any provision of this Agreement does not constitute a waiver of that provision. If any provision in this Agreement is found to be unenforceable, it and any related provisions will be interpreted to best accomplish the essential purpose of any unenforceable provision. Neither party may assign any of its rights or obligations hereunder without the prior written consent of the other party (not to be unreasonably withheld); provided, however, HealthTap may assign this Agreement without consent of Subscriber, in connection with a merger, acquisition, corporate reorganization, or sale of all or substantially all of its assets. Any attempt by a party to assign its rights or obligations under this Agreement in breach of this section shall be void. Subject to the foregoing, this Agreement shall bind and inure to the benefit successors and permitted assigns. This agreement is governed by California law, excluding California's choice-of-law rules. THE EXCLUSIVE VENUE FOR ANY DISPUTE RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT IS SANTA CLARA COUNTY, CALIFORNIA. YOU AND US CONSENT TO THE PERSONAL JURISDICTION OF THESE COURTS. Nothing in this agreement limits either party's ability to seek equitable relief. All notices under this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been given upon: (i) personal delivery; (ii) the second business day after mailing; (iii) the second business day after sending by confirmed facsimile; or (iv) if by HealthTap to Subscriber, the second business day after sending by email. Notices shall be directed to the party’s current known address, and if by email to HealthTap, to: notice@healthtap.com.
trans-unit.target: 各方声明并保证其有权签订本协议。本协议不构成双方之间的合伙，合资，代理，受托或雇佣关系。本协议是主体与HealthTap之间关于其议题的完整协议，并取代任何先前关于其议题的协议。本协议是主体与HealthTap之间关于其议题的完整协议，并取代任何先前关于其议题的协议。如果HealthTap提供本协议英语版本的翻译，则在有冲突时以本协议的英语版本为主。如果HealthTap选择不执行本协议的任何条款，HealthTap保留将来执行它的权利。这意味着未能执行本协议的任何条款不构成对该条款的放弃。如果发现本协议中的某条款不可执行，则其和任何相关条款将被解释为最佳实现了任何不可执行的条款的初衷。未经另一方事先书面同意，任何一方均不得转让其任何权利或义务（不得无理拒绝）；然而，假如，HealthTap可能在未经认购人同意的情况下转让本协议，用于合并，收购，公司重组或出售其所有或大部分资产。任何一方违反本条规定转让本协议项下的权利或义务的企图均属无效。根据上述规定，本协议对受益继承人和允许受让者具有约束力。本协议受加州法律控制，不包括加利福尼亚的法律选择规则。与本协议有关的任何争议的独家场地是加利福尼亚州圣克拉拉县。您和我们同意这些法院的个人司法管辖权。本协议中没有任何规定限制任何一方寻求平等救济的能力。本协议下的所有通知均为书面形式，并应视为已发出：(I) 个人交付; (ii) 邮寄后第二个工作日; (iii) 经确认传真递交后第二个工作日; 或(iv)如果通过HealthTap发送给用户，通过电子邮件发送后的第二个工作日：通知应直接发向当事人当前已知的地址，如果是通过邮件，发到notice@healthtap.com。

trans-unit.source: The License and Subscription Fee shall be the License and Subscription Fee Percentage. The License and Subscription Fee Percentage is a percentage of the Conversation Fee that ranges between Twenty and Twenty-Five Percent of the Conversation Fee based on the DocScore of the Subscriber. Each separate transaction in a Private Conversation, such as a question and a follow up question, shall each be subject to a Conversation Fee.
trans-unit.target: 执业执照和订购费应是执业执照和认购费的百分比。执业执照和订购费用百分比是对话费的百分比，其范围介于基于用户的医者评分的对话费用的二十和二十五之间。在私人对话中的每个单独的交易，例如问题和后续问题，每个都需要支付对话费

trans-unit.source: The Term of this Addendum shall be effective as of the commencement of the term of the Agreement, shall automatically renew with the Agreement, and shall terminate when the Agreement terminates. If this Addendum is amended, the Addendum shall renew as Amended.

trans-unit.source: Yes. Your use of HealthTap is anonymous. Your real name, date of birth, e-mail address, and other Personally Identifiable Information are not visible on the site to other users. You select a name under which you appear when using the Site (a Public Profile Name). You can stay anonymous by selecting a confidential Public Profile Name and by keeping that private. HealthTap uses bank-level security and encryption. More about our security measures can be found
trans-unit.target: 是。您使用HealthTap是匿名的。您的真实姓名，出生日期，电子邮件地址和其他个人身份信息在网站上不会显示给其他用户。您的真实姓名、出生日期、电子邮件地址和其他个人身份信息不会显示给其他会员。您可以选择隐秘的公开资料名称并将其私有化，以保护您的隐私。HealthTap使用银行级别的安保和加密。有更多关于我们的安保措施可被发现

trans-unit.source: Yes. Your e-mail address is not displayed in your Public Profile, and is never visible to other users on HealthTap. For more information about how we keep your Personally Identifiable information safe and secure, see

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can edit the data in your Health Activity by changing or deleting it at any time. The changes you make are permanent. You will be asked to confirm any changes or deletions from your Health Activity before they are made final.
trans-unit.target: 是。您可以随时在健康活动中通过更改或者删除编辑您的数据。您所做的更改是永久的。在最终决定之前，系统会要求您确认健康活动中的任何更改或删除。

trans-unit.source: Yes, but only if you choose to publicly display this information. Other users see Health Activity data that appears in your Public Profile – but they will never see Personally Identifiable Information about you, such as your real name or e-mail address. You control what information is publicly visible through your Privacy & Sharing tab in your settings. You can limit visibility of information to everyone, connections, or no one.
trans-unit.target: 是的，但只有当您选择公布这个信息的时候。其他用户可以在您公开资料中查看健康活动数据–但他们看不见您的个人身份信息，比如您的名字或者您的邮箱。您可以通过保密和公开功能控制您允许别人看到的公开信息。您可以将信息的可见性限制为每个人，联系的人或没有人。

trans-unit.source: Yes, but only if you choose to publicly display this information. Other users see Topic and Checklist data that appears in your Public Profile – but they will never see Personally Identifiable Information about you, such as your real name or e-mail address. You can control what information is publicly visible through your Privacy & Sharing tab in your settings. You can limit visibility of information to everyone, connections, or no one.
trans-unit.target: 是的，但只有当您选择公布这个信息的时候。其他用户可以在您公开资料查看话题和清单–但他们看不见您的个人身份信息，比如您的名字或者您的邮箱。您可以通过保密和公开功能控制您允许别人看到的公开信息。您可以将信息的可见性限制为每个人，联系的人或没有人。

trans-unit.source: Every user has a Public Profile. Your Public Profile is how other users will see you on the Site. Your Public Profile is your Public Profile Name, and an image or avatar you choose (your Public Profile Picture). It does not contain any Personally Identifiable Information, unless you put such information in your Public Profile Name or Public Profile Picture. Do not use your real name, picture or any other Personally Identifiable Information in your Public Profile Name and avatar. Each user’s Public Profile is linked to that user’s Health Activity, so that all users on the Site can find similar Public Profiles, and so that we can all share in communal health learning.
trans-unit.target: 每个用户都有一份公开资料。您的公开个人资料是其他用户在网站上看到您的方式。您的公开资料包含您的名字，以及您选择的照片或头像（您的公开资料照片）。它不包含任何个人身份信息，除非您将此类信息加入您的公开个人资料名字或公开个人资料照片中。不要在您的公开个人资料名称和头像中使用您的真实姓名，照片或其他任何个人身份信息。每个用户的公开资料都链接到该用户的健康活动，以便网站上的所有用户都可以找到类似的公开资料，而且在公共健康学习方面分享。

trans-unit.source: As this example shows, some of the information stored in you Health Activity is displayed in your Public Profile. Your real name, and other Personally Identifiable Information, are never shown in your Public Profile (unless you put it there). You can turn off sharing of various site features, including Health Activity sharing, at any time.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子表明，储存在您健康活动的一些信息会显示在您的公开资料中。您的真实名字，和其他个人身份信息，绝不会在您的公开的资料中出现（除非是您自己填写的）。在任何时候您都可以停止不同网站功能的公开，包括健康活动的公开。

trans-unit.source: IF YOU CHOOSE TO SHARE INFORMATION OUTISDE OF HEALTAP, THIS IS YOUR CHOICE. THERE IS ALWAYS A CHANCE THAT INFOMRATION YOU SHARE OUTSIDE OF HEALTHTAP MAY BE USED IN AN ATTEMPT T IDENTIFY YOU OR MAY BE USED IN WAYS THAT YOU OR HEALTHTAP CANNOT CONTROL.
trans-unit.target: 如果您选择在Healthtap以外的地方公开信息，这将会是您的个人选择。您在HEALTHTAP以外的网站所公开的信息总是会有可能被用作尝试识别您的个人身份，或者被利用在Healthtap以及您自己都无法控制的方面。

trans-unit.source: Yes. Every user of HealthTap, whether or not the user is a caregiver or care recipient, must have a different account. Currently, a parent may add a separate child’s account through their account.
trans-unit.target: 是。每一位HealthTap 的使用者，无论是一个医护人员还是被医护者，都必须使用不同的账户。目前，家长可以通过其帐户为孩子添加一个单独账户。

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can close your account at any time by signing into your HealthTap account and choosing “Delete Account” from your Account Settings. You will receive an e-mail confirming that your account has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 是。您能随时通过登录您的HealthTap账户并在账户设置中选择“删除账户”来关闭您的账户。您将收到一封电子邮件，确认您的帐户已删除。

trans-unit.source: Each HealthTap user has a Public Profile. HealthTap allows users to find other people who are similar to them by navigating through the site. Each user's Public Profile contains information that is visible to other users on HealthTap. To protect your identity, your real name or other Personally Identifiable Information is never displayed in your Public Profile.
trans-unit.target: 每个用户都有一份公开资料。HealthTap允许用户通过浏览这个网站去发现其他与自己相似的人。在HealthTap上，每一位用户公开的资料都包含着对其他用户可见的信息。为了保护您的身份，您的真实姓名以及其他个人身份信息绝对不会显示在您的公开资料中。

trans-unit.source: When one user follows another, the follower will see certain information about the user being followed. This information includes certain updates that the user being followed provides to HealthTap and that appear in the Public Profile of the user being followed.
trans-unit.target: 当一位用户关注另一位用户时，关注者将会看见被关注用户的特定信息。这些信息包提供给HealthTap的被跟踪用户的更新, 以及出现在用户的公开资料中。

trans-unit.source: Yes. Only connected users can send each other messages. If you choose to accept a connection, you will be able to send and receive Messages (through your HealthTap Messages Box) with your Connections.
trans-unit.target: 是。只有已连接的用户才能互相发送消息。一旦您接受了关注请求，您就可以与关注好友（通过HealthTap的对话框）发送和接收信息。

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can un-connect from a Connection at any time through your Account Settings.
trans-unit.target: 是。您可以在您的账户设置中随时取消对别人的关注。

trans-unit.source: Yes. After you sign up for HealthTap, we will send you a message welcoming you to our community and thanking you for joining us. After that, HealthTap may occasionally send messages to your HealthTap Messages Box, or to an e-mail address you provide to us. No one likes Spam, we do not send our users Spam, and we have a strict No-Spam policy. As described elsewhere in this Privacy Statement, HealthTap may also send you notifications (which you can turn off) and important messages to the e-mail address listed in your Account Settings.
trans-unit.target: 是。在您注册了HealthTap账户后，我们将会向您发送邮件欢迎您加入我们的社区，同时对您的加入表达感谢。在那以后，HealthTap将会不定时地给您发送消息，或者发送至您提供的邮箱地址。没有人喜欢垃圾邮件,我们从不给我们的用户发送垃圾邮件户,并且我们有一个严格的谢绝垃圾邮件政策。如同本隐私权声明描述的一样,HealthTap也可能在您的帐户设置列出的电子邮件地址上给您发送通知(可以关闭)和重要信息。

trans-unit.source: Yes. Connected users can send each other Messages through the HealthTap message system. Only users who are Connected can exchange Messages. Messages will appear in your HealthTap Messages Box. Additionally, your e-mail address will be used to notify you that you have a message on HealthTap. You can turn off this notifications feature at any time through your Account Settings.
trans-unit.target: 是。相互关注的用户可以通过HealthTap 的消息系统给对方发送消息。只有已连接的用户可以相互发送消息。消息将显示在您的HealthTap消息盒子中。另外，您的邮箱地址将会用来提醒您在HealthTap上收到了新消息。任何时候您都可以通过账户设置来关闭这个提醒功能。

trans-unit.source: Questions and answers on HealthTap are for general education and information. Only general, informational questions are permitted. For specific, personal health questions, always ask your own doctor or healthcare provider. (HealthTap Medical Experts are not your personal doctor or healthcare provider, and their answers to questions are not personal or for personal use.)
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的问题和回答是普通教育和信息。只允许一般的信息问题。对于具体的、私人的健康问题，请您咨询您的私人医生或是健康医护提供者。（HealthTap的医学专家不是您的私人医生或是健康医护提供者，他们对于问题的回答也不是针对个人的或是可用作私人的。）

trans-unit.source: . If we are unable to remove this information for any reason, we will let you know that we are unable to do so and why. You can control what is visible in your Public Profile through your Account Settings.
